Very nice way to chat with friends online, as well as meet new people from communities. The new changes to the format are helpful. Only thing I hate about discord at the moment is when I scroll through and there is a message with the highlight effect it will sometimes copy to my clipboard.

Though as time went on i realized that you kept making the interface more and more complex when it doesn't have to be. I wouldn't say go back to the original but perhaps go back two interface updates and i wouldn't think twice on giving this 5 stars, and i i was to give you a review a week ago it would have been that

Discord devs what the hell are you thinking? Discord interface is FINE the way it is. Okay I don't understand all the negative comments about the design, you've made it so easy and straightforward to use, it works without flaw, and the calls are never laggy making it easy to play and talk at the same time. The desktop app is great, mobile not so much. The mobile app is becoming increasingly more and more clunky and awkward to use. Visually, it looks horrible. I have a bigger phone screen, and it seems like the buttons are positioned and sized for a smaller one. Things are uncomfortably large and there's no way to scale things down. Great! I love the amount of moderation and effort put in to guarantee efficientcy and top performance. I've been using Discord for 2 years and it's been a blast. Google Hangouts allows up to 150 people in a chat, but limits its video calls to only 25 people per call (with the 10 most active participants shown at the bottom of the screen). This works for those who have small group meetings or just want to chat with a few friends. Zoom, on the other hand, allows users to have up to 100 participants in a video call. The Gallery View feature lets you see up to 49 of these participants on one screen.

Hangouts is my go-to app for chat simplicity. To fix notification sounds not playing, try to make an explicit sound selection: Settings / (account) / Messages / Advanced -> Sound: Default notification sound (or other selection). Nothing was selected in my case, and apparently the default "App provided sound" no longer works with recent updates.

The latest update reset the ringtone from 'Hangouts Message' to 'App provided'. To restore 'Hangouts Message', go into Settings > [your account] > Notifications Messages > Advanced > Sound. Then use Media Storage to choose 'Hangouts Message' (or any other ringtone you want). NOTE: 'Settings' refers to settings within the Hangouts app, not the system settings.

Nice features, but lacks UI and notification consistency. Chat media store is among the worst, not loading all pictures and videos from a conversation and taking a long time when it does. You also cannot send voice recordings on the PC version. Audio/video quality is OK, but it does not take advantage of fast networks although HD calls have been promoted for a decade. Skype does not allow you to use it in split-screen mode with another app which is a big drawback for me.

Skype has been a key app for me since it began. I love the option to turn on answer calls automatically and the option to automatically share video. I like the new high quality audio features for podcasters. I wish it was easier to search conversation histories and to export conversations. Integration with Microsoft ToDo and OneNote would be good. I like that I can mute others if needed. I read complaints that sounded like they wanted Skype to be more like Zoom: No thanks, just be reliable.

This update of the app keeps cutting out the bottom line of messages sent on skype. If this gets fixed, it would be 5 stars. I have really enjoyed using this app in previous versions, and the desktop version. It is easy to keep in contact with people. You can message, voice and video call.

Sound and video quality are OK but the default notifications need some work. The game keeps freezing mid game the you get stuck missing turns also battle to draw new card from deck all this started since the last update. Its very upsetting as I loose game due to the freeze the the game carries on in the back ground.

This game had a lot of potential, especially since there was finally a real version of the clickbait ad games that people see a lot. Unfortunately, the levels are extremely short (only one action per level), and there is a video ad between each one, so you're pretty much seeing an ad every minute at the very least. This game could do extremely well, but the constant bombardment of ads just kills any enjoyment of what little gameplay there actually is.

This is actually a really good game. In ads, it's not false advertising, it's the actual game. My daughter loves this game. But, this game isn't too perfect. First of, the dialogue bubbles. I can tell Arial is the font used for it. Second of, the story. I know it's supposed to have different events to save the girl but most of the events feel random and out of place. The character customization was a unique idea, but I don't get the room customization. This is a good game, 4/5.

It is totally an illogical game. I mean how can u erase a tank ??!! Really that's so dumb . And whenever a gun comes in the option it is always a fake one ... HOW ?? Plus this girl cannot even use a chainsaw. This game also has too many ads every time you finish a level an ad is there waiting for you. I have never written this long game review.

It needs a few different alternative missions, it claims to be just like the fake adds we see but its missing the ones with the lava and women pulling sections to fred something. There are a ridiculous amount of ads and ive paid £2.99 to be free of them.. However, you still have to watch some ads. Please add some more types of puzzles! This game could be amazing! And calm it on the flecking ads. Futhermore why does the girl always gotta wear heels? 😂

So many ads that the game is basically unplayable and if you turn of WiFi and Mobile Data you can't get any rewards, the game is also unrealistic with choices and it is kind of addictive but the addiction goes away around level 5 and goes plain boring, I will not recommend this game to anyone and play one of the featured games as they are good.

Terrible. Heres a few reasons why...I downloaded this app, then right when I clicked it my whole screen glitches. I can exit out and go to a different app and no glitches. It was an extreme glitch. well I've completed this game just now.. I was looking for this kinda game.. but the choices seemed to be a bit stupid and unrealistic.. What is the point of making a game that has 5 seconds of gameplay followed by a full screen ad? Congratulations, instead of maintaining a large player base that consistently play your game for months on end, you instead get players (like me) who play 2 levels and see 2 ads before they decide to uninstall the "game" that is really just an app for ad viewing. Oh, and you also get many 1 star reviews (like you have now). No thanks, I'll pass. Games like this should be banned from the app store.

It's alright. I think there should be more of a Choose Your Own Adventure story instead of levels. If you do ONE thing wrong, it makes you start the level over. I think you should make it where the character does what you tell it and it doesn't die immediately.

Yea let's place an ad every time you win. Oh? Ads when you lose. Too many damn adds, you get like 15 ads in a minute. Here's how game updates work for this game: introduce new feature, fix one thing, break other things. I love this game but the app has room for lots of improvement. Making sure everything works properly (new features and content included) and polishing existing features seems like it's the lowest priority for them.

Love the game, new features are literally a life saver not only with the virus going on but also I'm disabled can't walk very far. Sometimes I'm in a lot of pain so can't leave home and the new features will allow me to do raids more often & get gifts to send my friends more often! I was hoping eventually there'd be features for players that can't get out of the house much, took a virus to make the company consider doing so but better late than never! Hopefully they stay!!!! Thank you!!!!

I love this game. The only thing I do not like when we battle and we get "weak connection" and then the opponent can attack you but you are standing still.. Please do something about this ASAP I have lost numeros battles when my Pokémon are stronger then I just stand there doing nothing. This needs to bee Fixed ASAP!!!! The osy I portent to me on Pokémon go is battle an growing Pokémon and earning stardust and I caot battle with this "weak connection".......

By far my favourite mobile game available, nostalgia and all that. However, Niantic got greedy. Game is littered with bugs, Go Battle League is a disaster and not fun IMO, in app purchases are overpriced, customer service is virtually nonexistent and since they finally patched the literal game breaking Samsung S20 bug after a month of not being able to play, at the time of this review my phone has recorded 72 app crashes and excessive battery usage since 24th April 2020. Samsung S20 Ultra.

You have access to my previous review which showed the admiration I have for Nintendo. But you are bringing this historical reputation to the ground with the PvP battle system. Why is it that specifically in the ticket battles the game always freezes in favor of my opponent. My Pokemon paralyzes while the loser opponent takes the opportunity to damage them. It happens significantly more times in the paid battles. If it was only once I would understand, but hundred times? I want my tickets back!

This game gives me too many problems and rarely ever works properly. I've always needed a hot-spot or Wi-Fi connection for the game to play smoothly and even then it can give me problems. The game isn't as player friendly as it once was or says it will be and updates bring new items and new evolutions and Pokémon in seemingly random order. Not what I was expecting after so much hype.

Glitches/stops working A LOT. Gets more&more broken every update. Fast internet, phone = battles still a JOKE. App shuts off/freezes as you sit there dying to people who have exotic dragons. Maddenly boring as it is frustratingly glitched. LOL at it taking FIFTY+ balls, some "excellent" master balls, to catch ONE battle-won pokemon. Guess Niantic really wants to get paid money for more balls, huh? Game is a malfunctioning waste of space on your phone unless you like being upset and stressed out.

The AR+ feature still does not work for me at all. It crashes my game every time. It has been 5 months since the buddy update came out, and that's when it started doing this. It worked just fine before, and many others I know have absolutely no issue. It shouldn't be my phone, I have a Samsung Galaxy Note 9, so everything should be powerful and functional enough for it to work. If there is a fix for this, I'd love to hear it.

New update keeps freezing for the S20+, so i can't actually play the event that is going at the moment 👍👍 maybe a better support system as well, one that doesn't need to to go through the app for bugs like this one.. More communication with all of us who can't use the app at all, letting us know that it's been acknowledged and you're trying to fix the game 😰 (really just want to be able to play these new events that you posted heaps about....)

I love the game but One issue I have is.. I can put out multiple numbers of my pets at different poke stops & if they all get sent back on the same day I only get a max 50 coins (even when they are at the stop for days at a time) ... But yet if I put my pet at a stop & its not there but a few hrs I wont get the full 50 coins.. not cool. we have no other way of earning coins in the game👉without spending loads of money..

This is my absolute favorite game and niantic does a good job consistently rolling out new features. The only reason it didnt get 5 stars from me is because of niantics poor communication with the community and seeming unwillingness to implement some quality of life improvement like animation skips. Really you can count this as like a 4.8 out of 5 rating though

My son loves the game and I think it's pretty cool thank you not too bad be better if they're extra controls. The one thing that I like about the game is it gets kids the opportunity to get out and walk and that's what our country I know the Obesity is a big factor in our country with us being the number one epidemic in the world or not as far as obesity so if we could cut that down it would be great obesity cell kudos to you guys for implementing that into a game thank you

I love the idea of remote pass, but I used two passes to see if anyone would join the raid and no one did, so i closed out of the raid and let the timer run out thinking I'll get my passes back, but to my surprise i did not get them back. I feel like if i closed out and did not do the raid, i should get my passes back.

It's an awesome game with very active updates. I am loving what the team is don't for making the game more interesting in lockdown. No 5* as there is no way a new player can do gym battle or raid. I started playing when lockdown started and have not chosen any faction as I couldn't visit a gym and no gyms nearby. Now I can't choose a faction or keep my pokemons in gyms and earn some coins to buy some pokeballs and other passes and all.

After a while you realise all they want is your money. It's not fair to the casual gamer at all. They throttle revives and potions. Trying to collect high tier raid pokemon is next to impossible at times. You can throw a million perfect throws and they'll still break free and run away. Unless your willing to invest your entire life and salary into this game it feels like its rigged against youAlso the teams aren't balanced and promotes bullying in gyms. Cannot hold any for any time where I live.

I love this game, theres only a few things I would change. 1, legendary raids. I dont have 20 people who can walk around and do raids with me, and I'm in a smaller city so not as many players are doing raids when I wanna do it, so it's impossible for me to win any. I'm almost level 30 and I've never once done a legendary raid because I was always the only person who would join. 2, my buddy pokemon wont bring presents. the bonus heart dissapeared. he is almost an ultra buddy.

Played since day one. Updates are slow. The most addicting thing is catching all the various Pokemon. The battle system vs other players is inconsistent and infuriating. I've never been a fan of how this game makes you play by it's schedule regardless of what you're life may have in store (raids, rocket events, etc). At this point I'm just waiting for the option to export all the Pokemon to Pokemon Home and then I'm going to cut and run.

Since the most recent update the way the specials menu is presented has changed. You are no longer able to see all options shown at once, instead the one you click on is what is shown. You then click on another one and the one you have just had open closes. Sounds fine, but when they keep mixing up everytime you open up another one, with 6 different options to choose from it is getting really annoying trying to find the one I am after.

Have played on and off since 2016 and it's still a fun game to play when out with friends. Probably not highly requested, but I really enjoy customizing my avatar. Having more options for hairstyles and overall customization would be awesome. Also, a bit of an increase in the pvp battles you can do per day. I feel like right now it's too little, especially being stuck at home in quarantine.

I've loved the game ever since I started playing, but the latest update seems to have a problem with renaming pokémon. I can rename them, but I can't seem to see where the bar I type the text with. It's just harder to use especially if you want to customize the names with IVs and PVP percentages.

Why is it in the battle league people are able to use multiple charged moves for the same pokemon? And with amazing speed. Almost like they have 2 charged moves that are charging at the same time. At first I thought the game might just be glitching, because pvp connections are pretty poor. But this happens to me AT LEAST once every round of matches (5 matches in a round). For all the money you guys make off this game, the very least you can do is invest in some decent servers

Was a really good game and worth 5 stars until I got the S20+.Everytime I log into the game it works for a Max of 5 seconds and it's been that way for the last 2 weeks. Im usually a daily 2hr+ a day player, put money into the game and all of the extra events but it seems Niantic is slack when it comes to responding to customers and fixing problems. I know I'm not the only one too with the s20. They need a way better customer support system. When all the problems are resolved I'll put my 5*back

Random animations constantly ruin your throws, plus the animation time is so long it eats into raid times (180 seconds for a raid but by the time GO is off the screen it's at 170, no wonder my crew and I are always losing). Also, pokestops rarely give healing items anymore, this game has turned into a cashgrab, with RNG in the GO Battle League Matchmaking being just as broken as everything else in this now clustertruck of a game.

It's a good game and the developer has done a lot to fix it, though this last update wiped out the ability to the the Pokemon Go Plus, which is disappointing. Glitches happen, and that's all well and good, but Niantic has a tendency to take their time in fixing their mistakes. I enjoy the game itself, and fully appreciate the fact that they are trying to adapt the game to be less social during the pandemic.

The game is very good, a good way to pass the time if you're terribly bored. There's only a few downsides that I personally have. One of them is the Pokemon Go Battle League. I hate that you can't choose which league you want to fight in but are just forced to fight in the Master League at the moment. I do not have strong enough pokemon to do so, so it's just constant losing, which is fine but really takes the fun out of it when you sit there with a 2000 CP pokemon and go up against 4000 CP

Love the game but they need to allow movement from home and a lot more functionality especially during this Covid19 situation. They know exactly what they could do and make money but choose not to make the game freely playable by everyone everywhere and not leave the house. There are plenty of stops and gyms on my screen that I can not reach. What a joke.

Game is still the same, which is good. In this update I noticed they changed the way raid battles looks, and let me tell you, it's not for the better. It looks like how trainer battles look and that was a terrible choice to make. I personally lime having the health bar in raids being in the corner and on top of that, I can no longer see how much charge I have on my charged attack if i have one stored up. Terrible update that needs to be reverted immediately.

There is a major oversight on the fact that the player can't decline an encounter "reward" for battle league. If you already have that pokemon, why should the player waste about 50 ultra balls on it? Already have the same pokemon more than six times. And running away doesn't decline the "reward". So I'm literally stuck from any progress on the battle league. Unable to battle for more than a month now. So please just make a new button to decline the encounter. It's annoying and a shame.

The game is totally bugged and the support is atrocious. I just used the new functionality for remote raids and it consumed my paid pass and kicked me out of the battle, robbing me also of the chance to catch the pokemon. I tried to report this and I couldn't event get in contact with a human being to help with my issue. Really disappointing.

Doesn't record walking accurately. Walk .8 km and it records only .1 km . We should be able to get incubators for less coins or on special during lockdown. Takes forever to hatch eggs even with the half distance, especially since the distance is incorrect. Have location on and adventure sync (google fit installed) and it is still inaccurate.

So i purchased in game items. An item didnt work the game froze and the item was gone and did not do what it was supposed to. Essentially my item was stolen from me. If something like this happens. Niantic will not refund you for the item. They will not replace the item. They will just keep refering to their useless troubleshooting webpage and do absolutely NOTHING to refund you DO NOT WASTE MONEY ON IN GAME PURCHASES. If something goes wrong they do not care that they have stolen your money!

There are many players living in such locations where gyms can't be seen in the screen, i would kindly request you to show gyms which has raid in the nearby even if the gyms is not nearby. So that we couldn't get stuck in research challenges and can use the remote raid pass...I don't want to miss some part of game due to this. So please make an update regarding this.

Completely biased for urban trainers. I wanted to complete the throwback research and here I am stuck at level 2 due to raid. Is belonging to rural areas and catching Pokemon in wild isnt the true spirit of Pokemon. I am heartbroken that I won't be able to make the challenge. I will not rate more than 1 unless raids are removed from timed research.

With the new #Covid19 pandemic going around it was made impossible for players to place their pokemon into gyms. But I have a suggestion Niantic: Make it possible for us to gain pokecoins with the help of battling! If you get 5 wins in the league you could gain like 50 pokecoins or/and you could have your pokemon walk to gyms! If you select a gym nearby and select a pokemon to guard it it will walk over to it and will take time depending on how many meters you are away from the gym! Good idea?

I have played this since the beginning and have thoroughly enjoyed it until recently. A few months ago, the game stopped recording steps. I put in tickets over and over and have been ignored. I am missing out on large parts of the game because of this and I am about done with it. My other health apps and my watch all record that I'm walking at least 8km a day and this app records nothing! Oh and to make it better, I cant even seem to find the "contact us" link on the app anymore!

The new update to fix this issue did not resolve it for me. I still have no pokeball button on the left of my screen and my device is not visible in the settings. Updates that break aspects of the game and completely dismissive responses from niantec. I'm an idiot that paid £50! for the pokeball plus, and now the app won't acknowledge it's existence, a known issue for Android users, but no sign of an update or any kind of compensation. Really disappointing.

I love pokemon. I have since I was young. I never could get my hands on a ds, but thankfully pokemon go is mobile! I love this app! Its utterly amazing. I have caught 2 shinies so far. Love this app. Just wish updates didn't take so much space. Otherwise, a good app. I highly recommend this game!!!

I played that game before like 1 year ago once. I really like Pokemon that's why I decided to play this game even though I barely play games. As a new player I logged in this game but when it was loading it kicked me out from that app I don't know why but I exited the game itself. I tried multiple time but it didn't happen. I didn't get to play.

It's a very good game but it needs some mini games :( I'm lvl 21 been playin for 1 month >:3 EDIT: Thank you for the battle Mini game it really helps and now I can just go and battle my friends instead of having the scan their code me and my brother really enjoyed this game!And battle players I don't even know and it helps me get a lot of things when I need pokéballs or incense!

I would rate this a five downloaded it today used to play it all the time.I know niantic wont respond to this but it would be useful to add something like a joystick because lots of countries are on lockdown due to the current virus. This would make the game playable i leave in a small area where a pokemon spawns in my street once a day so the game is unplayable for me because im on lockdown. So please add something to make the game still playable when we are in lockdown. IF U DO THIS THANKS!

Not only that the app constantly freezes my phone, no, the updates are so huge in space and data, that I need to delete apps from my phone in order to install newer versions of PoGo. By now I'm really considering deleting the game because it's just not worth it anymore. It also now can't be installed on my Galaxy S8 anymore. Great.

I dont typically write reviews, but this game has me so frustrated i cant help voicing my disdain. Bottom line, too many ads! Several ads after each level, you watch an ad more than you play the game! This game was obviously made as a cash grab and has little effort put into it. Don't bother downloading it.

This game is a waste of time there is ad after every game and it's annoying. Even if u do click "Skip ad" it won't skip. And most of the ads are 30 seconds or more and it's boring to don't download this game because if u do ur wasting your time and you are going to regret if u do download this app. If kids play this app some of the ads are inappropriate for kids that play so don't download that way u don't regret anything because, u didn't download it. Ik the ads are for money. Trashy game!😡😡

Game is fairly fun however ads are a bother. Like most free games they offer double rewards after a level if you watch an ad or you can opt out and hit "no thanks" however if you hit "no thanks" they still play an ad...not following the thought process there. Probably the main reason i'll uninstall the app.

After the very first level, the game offered me the to triple the points I earned if I watched a video. When I selected "no thanks" it played the video anyway. If that's the level of respect they show for their players, there is no reason to continue playing. If I could give this game 0 stars, I would.

This game is great! Although it has one ad after every level but i already got used to it. And after 20 days of playing this i got all the skins! You can even upgrade your character and give them cool weapons! I just wish all the other people that join you get the same items and skin.

This is a good game just gets a bit boring after a while but can I help everyone out, they keep saying about the adverts but here's a tip: turn your WiFi off and play like that, you get no adverts at all and makes the game so much more enjoyable!

This game is great if you like spending more time watching ads than playing the game. Or if you like gameplay that has minimal decisions to make. Or if you like every mechanic designed to make you opt into watching additional ads.

It's a fun game. At the end you have to fight another team from another country. If you are bigger you'll win. I have only played one level and I enjoy it. It is a bit boring. There are so many skins to unlock! Download Now!!

It was a fun game to play to pass time but you watch more ads then you play the game. After every lvl. And for everything you want to unlock ( hats). Even if you say no thanks they still make you watch a ad. I do not recommend downloading from this company for all games.

Ads after every play, game is a fun time killer, however you play for 10 or 15 seconds then are required to watch 30 second video.. I've played for 5 minutes and 4 minutes of that was watching ads just to play again 🤦🏻‍♂️

The ads omg everybody is telling you make LESS ads I hop soon there will be a 0 star and when you want more members you can't go back and get them!Also a little creepy when i first came onto the game it wasn't a sky it was a horror face out of Annabelle!!! A little bit sketchy.🤔🤨😤🤬
It was fun even when getting hit it's kind of hilarious I enjoy this game. The thing that kept me from giving this 5 stars is the ads, like seriously sometimes they can be so obnoxious.

The game itself could be fun but the ads totally put weigh the game. The first 4 levels there were 5 ads. Each of those levels took 5-10 seconds and each ad was 15-30 seconds long. I am fine with some ads in games but in here there is more ad time then game time
ads every 10 seconds. Fun idea. I love stick figure fighting, but the No Thanks button to skip ads doesnt work and you have to watch a 20 second ad every 10 seconds. Uninstalling after level 3.

U have to watch an advertisement for every completed game. The game probably last 20 to 30 seconds to complete for beginning but the advertisement is at least 30 to 60 seconds. You decide if it worth to install this nonsense.

I like the game. But an ad after every level. Even when I click no thx. yeahh no. I wouldn't mind every other honestly. I'm not picky, I understand that they are how u generate revenue just we still want to play the game
Riddled with ads. Typical freemium game riddled with so many ads that its unplayable. When you spend more time watching advertisements than you do actually playing the game, thats a problem...

This game makes me mad because there is far too many ads reason. 1. too many ads 2. Because watch an add no coins 3. If you up grade your player notning! 5.because there is an ad then reward 6. Because you have a 999%chance of geting an ad and a 1%chance of geting no ad
The ads are ridiculous. Google should have a limit on ads. I don't blame the developers but Google to not take any action even when the number of ads in most games on the market is now ridiculous.
This game could have been alot better but no you just want to shpw ad and earn money. No concept of level you win or lose you go to next level.

Could be fun if it wasn't for the endless ads. 80% of the time is wasted on ads. Game asks if you want to watch an ad to get extra gold but you will get to watch it anyway even if you choose"no thanks".
15 seconds of playing followed by a minute of unskipable ads. Not worth anyone's time. I tolerate ads. It's a free game. This is unbearable.
There are so many ads after each game is there is atleast one ad. Also every time you recieve a gift you need to watch an ad to open it, and every ad is 30 seconds long...
Fine. The two problems are the advertisements and how it takes a looooong time to play the next level.
There are ads after every level. I spent more time watching ads than playing. Otherwise, it'd be fine, but the constant interruptions make the game unplayable

It's good but the ads the ads come in when you touch things after and before it's really not worth it unless you just want queens prizes or you can just lose out I really don't care about coins I care about playing the game that's my rate
Rubbish, unplayable! Way to mutch advertising between every level.... I wouldn't call it a game but an app designed for publicity with some playable moment in between them......
Overall a fun game but my one idea to the game is to add more dance moves. But it's a fantastic game. And what's the last level number?
You have to watch an ad after every 20 seconds of gameplay. Completely unbearable.
Could be a fun game but you're forced to watch ads constantly to get back to the game or out of menus without an option to back out.
The ads kills every joy the game gives you, plus the game is too easy. There's no challenge what so ever

Bit rubbish, there are way to many ads, purchased game as only cost like £2. Waste of money though, you get coins to purchase strength and weapons although you never seem to get stronger. After about level 40, the gifts are all the same and it takes you about 2/3 times to win a level. Was enjoyable in the begging. Bored and going to uninstall now. 2.5 stars.
We are not here to play but only to see the ads after every match there is a ad after every match there is option to see as to unlock things very bad just ads ads and ads

A mind-numbing game requiring little skill and less strategy, a perfect fit for skill-impaired players with numb minds. Levels follow a predictable and repeating pattern and power-ups have no discernible effect on game-play or advancement. Ads (clearly the #1 player complaint) CAN be turned off. C'mon people, it's called AIRPLANE MODE! But, honestly, the ads break up the monotony of a game that anyone over the age of 5 will tire of within 10 minutes.
This game has so many adds. There is always ablack screen popping up and the adds are not even there. I suggest they should not add adds every time we finish a level or die.
The game is good itself and I do recommend it to people but the ads dont have to be as frequent yes obviously include in the game just not after every level.
Game would freeze up in the middle of a game with an ad. Its a little annoying.

After every level, even though I click the option that doesn't give me extra coins for ads, I still get ads. At first it was every so of yt en but now its after every level. The graphics aren't there and this game doesn't even feel like it has a proper menu or anything. It just feels like its model characters with simple collisions and that's it. No real score or even something that makes you feel accomplished.

Really terrible. They place the next level button between a banner ad and a video ad. Very very scummy. The game looks fun in the trailers but it's boring, repetitive and there's actually no challenge unless you take it upon yourself to try and lose and most levels are impossible to lose. Way too many ads and you don't actually get rewards, you have to work towards earning the ability to watch an ad to get the reward. I wouldn't support this. Get something else lol

It's just really boring. It takes little to no skill, at least in the levels I played. You just hold your finger down and the game plays itself. Its ad-ridden and likely uses up a ton of battery AND likely datamines a ton of your personal information without permission. Definitely avoid this game, it's a waste of time, battery, and storage.
You can't skip the ADS!!! the game itself is fine but fu*k your ads come on let me skip them!!! Forget the rewards let me play!!!!!
Instantly got bombarded with ADDs. Poor gameplay and they asked me after 10 seconds of playing to leave a review. No problem. Don't download this game.
Too many adverts far too often, spoils the game and only because of this I would not buy it even to remove the adverts.

I don't usually write reviews, but this game is annoying, not about the ads just yet, the gameplay itself is fine however its very dull, no sound effects? No animation of fighting, misleading ad, they just go and crash into each other. I don't feel satisfied playing this game as I thought I would. This game needs waaay more stuff to be added to it and remove the damn 30 second ad after every single level. You literally made a simple game to milk a couple of bucks from people. Not nice at all.

There are so many ads its unreal even when I was without internet and mobile data. The game is pretty fun just so many ads honestly if they cant make games with no ads then all they want is money. Seriously get rid of the ads and it's a great game lots of fun but an ad every 30 to 40 seconds come on you can do better!
It's not good! Please make it like that we buy weapons and shields not upgrade it. So we can change it. Please make it in next update.
The adverts are too much so you can't play it's pointless don't waste your time unless u want to watch a advert every 20 seconds

This is a really fun game, but there are a couple things. First of all, the ads are INSANELY annoying, and you have to play 5 times to unlock a skin which u have to watch ANOTHER ad to even get. Airplane mode helps, but it is still very annoying. Another thing is all the levels are basically the same, and the bosses you have to at least do 2 runs before you can beat him, because he takes out 5 people with one attack -_-. Also, you cant fully go to the edge and theres not many skins to unlock...

The game itself is okay but the ads are crazy. There's an ad after every round. Even when you choose not to watch the ad for a prize, you still have to watch an ad. The ads are about a minute long and the rounds are seconds long. In my opinion, you have way more ads than gameplay making this game unplayable. Uninstalling unfortunately.

Far too many ads. The game is hardly playable when every single action, aside from ACTUAL gameplay brings up an ad. Die? Ad. Start a new level? Ad. Deny watching an ad for extra coins? Ad. Finish watching an ad to get extra coins? Ad. Dont waste your time, unless you really wish to pay $3 for no ads (the game isnt worth the cash, in my opinion).
Ad comes up after every try. even you choose not get any bonus by clicking "No Thanks".
Playable on flight mode, if on a network, you could spend more time on ads then gameplay

Upgrading your stats does literally nothing. It's always a 1:1 ratio in the final fight. The bonus keys make you think you can get the headgear from the start of the bonus, but in reality you have to watch 3 ads to get it because it's always in the last set of keys. Good toilet game, but a seriously lack of content and actual progression.

AD SIMULATER. Way too many adds. After every level, which last for a few seconds there is a 10 to 30 sec add. Even if you click the clearly hidden no thanks button (it is under the watch an add to double your money button, but is a very dark grey with no button outline so it is very hard to distinguish from the black background) it will still play an add making the no thanks button pointless.
Too many ads. You literally have more ad time than play time.

Fun concept and fun gameplay, but way too many ads. There is an optional ad between each level that can get you coins in game, but if you say no you still get the ad but with no reward. It seems like 50% of the time you're playing and 50% of the time you're waiting on ads.

Played this for an hour. For some reason there is a little mini game between my ads. The mini game is alright but we all downloaded this for the ads, I'm surprised they were able to sneak this in. When you die there is an ad, when you click anything there is an ad. They may aswell called this game "join and watch ads" because that's 90% of this app. Enjoy

You get an ad every second gameplay no matter what.... They're not really fast paced or anything either. You can earn coins, but you get a lot more extra if you watch vids... The "no thanks" option is under the watch vid for more coins opt, it's also grey so you can barely see it. To me it's fun for 10x game plays

This game is fun and a time killer. I have many suggestions. It would be cool if you added weapons like swords axes barons etc. And in the end instead of breaking the door there would be a cannon cart which would break open the castle door. Two different modes for attack and the other mode for defence. And also you should add different types of weapons and stuff which you can use to defend your Fort such as mortars to bomb your enemies traps trenches and you can even send out some people out

It's like a game you would make in your high school programming class... but the beta version you hadn't worked the bugs out of yet. It randomly picks a premade level from about 15 unique ones. So it gets repetitive pretty quickly. Power ups are vague and there are no instructions or explanations. Fun for 30 minutes... if you can wait for the ads. There's a mandatory quarter to half minute ad after every half minute level.

After level 4 you get an ad after pretty much every level and they are a bit tedious. To put it in perspective, so far the levels are less than 10 seconds in length, you spend more time in an ad than actually playing the game you downloaded. Also ran into a 'prize' in a level. What did I win? An unskippable ad. I'll try a few more levels but it's not really worth it if the ads keep at this pace.

[beat the game] So not a bad game necessarily. I'm sure the ads get obnoxious, I wouldn't know I only played it offline. If you play it with ads I'm sure it would be over too quick. Dont bother buying powerups they do literally nothing. Beat the game in about 5 days of smoke breaks. Really just not enough content I suppose.
Good time filler. Couldn't cope with the 30sec advert every level. Uninstalling.

Too many ads, every 5 seconds it's an ad you must watch. No way to skip then unless you purchase the app, the thing is it's not worth the $. I wouldn't even mind the ads if you could play more levels between watching ads or if the levels were longer but the levels last from 5 to 20 seconds and then you're forced to watch a 30+ second ad video unless you are willing to purchase the app. I just couldn't stand it, I thought I was going to lose my mind so I had to delete the app.

I love this game it awesome!!! but I don't know why the name is join & clash please someone tell me why Good game 👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍 not thumbs down thumbs down bad! Thumbs up good!!!!!!
