Repetitive, dull, and riddled with ads. There are some levels that are rigged for you to fail and you know what that means? More ads. The key chests are rigged that you have to watch 3 ads in addition to the three keys you earn because, get this, no matter which chests you pick the special skin will always be in the very last chest you open. Total waste of time.

Kind of fun ... the fights at the end of the runs are my favorite part. The fights made it important to pick up men along the way but no sound or sound effects made it feel underwhelming. Short runs and long ads were the deal breaker for me and there were ads for everything .. ads at the end of every round, ads to claim prizes, sound for ads but not for the game??? get outta here!

Perfectly reasonable game but there are a few problems with the overall product. Firstly you'll spend more time watching adverts than you will playing. Every time you unlock new headgear you have to watch another advert to retrieve it and when you fight the big bosses at the end of every level the coins you've spent improving your weapon and shields do absolutely nothing regardless of what level you get to.

If i could give this app 0 star rating than i would cause it is basicly an ad simulator like most people i can't go out so what is the point of ads.ahhhh.DO NOT INSTALL THIS APP UNLESS YOU WANT TO WATCH ADS ALL DAY.
This would be fun if you didn't have to sit through five times as many ads 1 level is long. Lame.

Pros - Fun! Love the different skins and the obstacles. Cons - -Upgrades are completely meaningless. No matter how much you upgrade attack, Heath or income, it doesn't change. You only collect 200 unless you watch an add. -WAY TOO MANY ADS. -The "prizes" you get end up being duplicates of skins you already have. - The keys, always unlock the same prize. "25" coins. Please change these and it would be a perfect game.

The game is fine itself but the problems are that when you buy something with your coins it does nothing like what's the point of buying it if it does nothing and there is so many ads that you feel like you want to explode! I would give this a five star review. One more thing that annoys me is that when you want to get hats but you have to watch ads like if there was not enough ads. And when you get hats they offer you the same hats your already have. Finally it's very dull. Don't reccomend.

After each level, replay, or getting keys, you have to watch 2 commercials. Each level is 10 secs long and each commercial is 5-15 second long. You spend 4x as much time watching commercials as you do playing. I Immediately uninstalled this game. I am not going to be forced to pay to remove ads, I will gladly remove this game from my phone though.

The game purposely leaves the least amount of people you can get before the battle. This way the other team can always win. It is unfair and not recommended to play. The other team will always have double the amount of opponents. Tip- be smart and ADD MORE people
I'm enjoying this game but the ads are ridiculous to the point where I can't be bothered to play anymore.
Literally a damn ad every single time you complete a run. 0 out of 10.

It's an ad app with a mini game between ads. By the time I got to level 4, I had seen 7 ads, and I didn't do the optional ads either. So it works out to every 10 minutes of being in the app, six of those minutes will be ads. Such a horrible ratio. The mini game between ads seems to have some potential.

You gotta love the unskippable 30 second clickbait ads everytime you either pass or fail, at the bottom there are ads that seem like ads you'd see from a porn site such as a "hey papi" text "she wants to chat". The game is very basic in its controls and idea between it with nothing special. I feel like most of the development went into the dance animation when you pass a round.

Downloaded it, thinking it could be a time killer. Seemed simple enough. Unistalled it after less than 5 minutes. Every level has a bonus option of watching an ad for bonus coins, or watching an ad because you refused to watch an ad for bonus coins. Levels take each, at least in the beginning less time to complete than the ad aftwards runs for.

It would be an awesome game if you didnt have to watch an ad every time you click a button. It gave me three ads in a row with every click trying to continue my game, I uninstalled after the 2nd time not giving me an ex to exit even after the ad was through. So many ads they dont even come up correctly. lame.
Way too many ads, game isn't worth the constant ad barrage.
Way too easy, every level is the same. Really boring. Too many ads

Gameplay is rather simple but really loveable, but the ads after every single level? Its just stupid, theres a choice, watch a video and get in game currency, or watch a video and get nothing I understand you get paid for ads and all that jazz, but every level? Its just daft, i uninstalled it after a few levels.

So this game is fun, although.... my issue is that it gives you an option to play ads, but after so many it will not play any more, so I press no thanks. And then it forces me to watch an ad. If you are going to limit the ads then let me know, but honestly if you do just dont give the option.

Fun concept, but WAY to many adds! And I do not like that no matter what you have to watch one. Just a heads up you might as well pick the add that will give you something. Yes its longer but at least you get something. Uninstalling!

It takes 10sec to complete a level and between EVERY SINGLE LEVEL is a 30 sec add for different games. The adds can't be longer than the game how boring. Couldn't even get into it cause I spend more time on adds than the game.

Way too many ads. 30 seconds of gameplay just to be forced to watch 2 minutes of ads. Its ridiculous. Theres no point on opting to not watch an ad for a reward because it forces you to watch a full one anyway and doesn't give you the bonus reward. I'd love to play it if I could actually play it.

Ads everywhere! Here's a free gift, but first, claim it by watching an ad! Hey here's a hat as a reward for going through the levels, bit first, claim it by watching an ad. Level finished, claim your 600 coins by watching an ad, you can only skip it by waiting for 5 seconds and tapping on the nearly invisible "No thanks" text (yes, text, not button). Oh, I forgot to mention the 30 second ads after every level.

Fun concept, but it's ability to read my finger's movements on the screen had a bit of lag compared to other games I've played. AND any time a button would offer to double or triple the amount of coins I won by watching a video, the button wouldn't even work!! Seemed like a cheap con rather than a glitch.

It is horrific how bad the user experience is. There is 3 times as many ad's as there is actual game time. Even when you click no thanks to watching an ad, it is greyed out and forces you to watch the ad's anyway.

Game does everything so you will watch ads. You can sneeze and an ad will show. You can get every figure in the level and not beat the boss only to be forced to watch an ad, than later the boss starts with the lives you left him with - meaning you weren't meant to beat him, only to watch an ad. Aweful aweful game.

Random ads pop up, yet the ads to get prizes and claimed prizes don't work. when when you purchase the upgrades, Health money, and strength or whatever, it remaines unchanged. this game is the worst game in the history of all gaming, and whoever created this game should be fired. because they don't know what they're doing
Entirely ads. Don't want to watch an ad for coins? Here's an ad for no coins! Hurray! ...
I gave It a 1 star because why so many ads one game = a minute or 30 seconds of doing nothing like take some ads out people

Not quite as advertised. Is the ad, after you get your figures through the gauntlet, they fight the red guys. In the game, they just run into them and fall over. The controls are also pretty boring, just move your finger to move your character. 3/5 because boring

Scam just a cash app for the developer. You watch more ads than play the game and have to pay $3 for no ads but even the game itself could be fun but they threw it together just to load it with ads and make money. All the reward chests you can "choose" just have 50 coins their all the same. No effort was put into this.

It is the type of game that says hey watch this ad and get 3x points then you say no thanks and it says okay then watch this ad. If you enjoy the gameplay however which I found to get old fast you can swipe up to open your tabs reopen the game and it will open it where you were without playing the ad which will save you about 20 seconds depending on the ad length
I really like this game because it has less ads. I LOVE THIS GAME!!!🥰😻🤩😍❣

This game is not worth my time. Every time i get alot of people there is about doubled amount of people i have on the enemies team and i always lose! This game is like forcing you to die in first try and give you ads for dying. Also there is no noise and when there is a ad, it is super loud.

Its not that bad but it constently gives me ads. Its like glitch! It was so close to driveing me insane so i did was other people would do. I uninstalled the game. If ur reading my note thing. DONT INSTALL IT!!! P.S if ur thinking of buying anything..DONT!

First, I installed this game expecting it to have mazes/puzzles to solve. In 57 levels, I've had only two mini games (which are the mazes/puzzles). So, in reality, this is only a match-3 games. Second, I enjoy a challenge, but I installed this game only 4 days ago. For the past 3 days, I've been stuck on level 57. Why would they put such a difficult level so early in the game? Uninstalling.

Game is fun and addicting. One thing they need to do though , is offer a different way to get power ups and lives. Like watch an ad or complete an offer. Unfortunately my Google account is frozen due to suspicious activity and I can't purchase any lives or power ups, so another way too would be great. All other games do. I can't find a team with any active players , so somehow when you search for a team, they need to weed out the ones that have old accounts and don't get played.

An unbelievably aggravating "game". Game play is limited without buying more time. The levels become increasingly more difficult to clear in the number of moves allowed without purchasing additional boosters or buying or collecting occasional diamonds. These can only be accessed by paying $2.99 when the bank is filled with 50 gems, and then only once. Then the bank resets again, requiring another purchase. A complete waste. Deleting.

The puzzles get more and more challenging. It takes patience and persistence to beat a level. Sometimes it costs money. You can decide how much, how little money, or if any, you want to spend if you want to beat a level. It's fun to decorate the aquariums. The decorations are very attractive. The fish are fun to watch and have very developed personalities. It is very relaxing to take a few moments to watch them. Everything about this game is of high quality.

From my expectations from an hilarious add which made me laugh and download to find myself playing a childish and boring game (which can be a bit addictive though). After 20 mins playing in a loop the same boring thing, I wrote this review and uninstalled it. Note that the game works perfect in terms of user experience, visuals, sounds and interfaces. Makes even use the logic, which if you are a child or don t have anything better to do, can be fun. Not for my case. Misleading advertise

The game was not as advertised. Matches start off well. Close level 150, if you want to beat it. You'll have spend personal money, if not it could take you 10+ times to beat the match. The game will give free lives for an our or more. However you don't get to activate it when you want. It starts, and you are stuck. If I could give this game a rating it would be -5 star.

I like others downloaded this game expecting the game that was shown on their ads. This is not the game at all. There were a few mini games that were what I was expecting, but only 2 and I played too level 87. Also the levels get too difficult to beat without spending money. I admit I got caught in the trap and spent some money to pass some levels and it just kept getting worse. I am very disappointed.. I have uninstalled the game and will not download or play any others from this maker!!!

I love the game. I've been playing it for a while. I'm up to level 2217. So far I've only spent $3 on and that was only at first until I realized you didn't have to. you can earn everything you need by beating levels. No ads unless you choose to watch and when you do watch you earn coins or diamonds. The only complaint I have is occasionally you can only watch a couple ads in a day. most the time you can earn enough in a day to buy a power pack.

This game is a nightmare! I'm on level 1388 and EVERY level at this point is Super Hard! It's impossible to win levels on your first try unless you use several boosters otherwise you have to do each level over and over. Boring. The game is also rigged, nothing random about where boosters are placed. About 70% of the time you're left with one tile to clear and out of moves. It's VERY frustrating. This is when they ask you to buy extra moves! A genuine waste of time.

I came from an advertisment and was excited to play, i saw the reviews but downloaded anyway because i wanted to see if the game is still good despite the false advertisment. I am greatly disapointed in it. I didn't like the game at all. It's a candy crush type of game and not a tunnel game. It could have been at least save the fish kind of game. This is VERY different from what they showed on the advertisment. Really disapointed. EDIT 10/04/20 : I rechecked and nothing has changed in the game.

All Playrix game and I do mean all will advertise one thing but trust me none of their games are as advertised. They will show you some very fun and what would seem challenging puzzles but since playing fishdom I have only manage to see two of what they advertise. This is true in all other games that I have tried but later quit. Basically if you want another version of Candy crush then go for it. SMH!!!

It is difficult to beat superhard levels without any help or bombs as lives exhaust. Better to make a bit easy so to enjoy playing fishdom.really it is difficult to beat superhard levels and also on timeout levels.better make easy. All boosters bombs and bomb blasters come only at last move. What's it's use. It seems like given but no use. Many times number of moves are less. especially in playing in time level. Time is not sufficient. When we loose ,we loose all boosters.

I have continued to see advertisements for this game so I finally downloaded. A few days later I jump into play a game that was nothing like what I thought it was. Seriously disappointing. However the game is cute, you earn money quick and it's a good past time. I'm sure with motivation you could build a cute aquarium.

Game is fun, it does get to be frustrating and one just wants to delete game. Need more minnie pull the pins to save the fish after levels, that's why I downloaded game. On levels boosts need to come in the middle of level and at the end not all at the beginning. This would help on the super hard levels due to not enough times you can move before you lose. Also on the timed levels.

This game feels rigged unless you pay for additional boosters or diamonds which let you win otherwise impossible levels. And yes, the advertisements were very misleading for this app. Ive maybe done two minigames...after completing over 60 levels. There's no option either to replay previous levels to at least get more coins...though coins are useless if you want to do more than decorate your aquarium. Coins should have the function of purchasing boosters. But yep, those cost real money

The game's ok at first, but gets to be more difficult as you advance. So you end up playing a screen level for a long time, which is not fun and boring. Update: this game has gotten worst in the last month.They took away your ability to get boosters and looks like have decreased the number of moves you get on some screens. BORING TO THE MAX. People play these games to win. If you made the game easier, then prople would play it more, instead of uninstalling the game.

The game is fun and I love filling and decorating the aquariums. But you have to spend a LOT OF MONEY to advance and progress through harder and harder levels. I found myself spending sometimes $5.00 to $10.00 or more per level. And then as much as $200. to $500. per MONTH on this game which is TOTALLY RIDICULOUS! BUT YOU GET SICK OF BEING ON THESE LEVELS, ALL OF WHICH ARE TOO HARD, SO YOU SPEND way too much $$ to buy boosters and lives and go forward. I am quitting! I CAN NOT AFFORD THIS GAME!

Match 3, not what the ads show. Since there's no way to report the ads is not the game gameplay. Every 5 levels there is a chance to play a "minigame" that has a chance of being related to the ads. Tapping anywhere on the screen will close the reward window and the minigame will be gone. Just spotted the dev reply 07-Apr-2020, the fake minigames were just added and only for those under level 20 so there's 4, maybe 5 of them?

YOUR ADS ONLY SHOW THE MINI GAMES. The game does not play as shown in the ads. It's just another match 3 game. Occasionally you get a chance to play a "mini game" which is where you save the fish from perils. But I am up to level 18 & so far got the "mini game" only twice at the very beginning. I'm already bored with this game. If I wanted to play Candy Crush over & over again, I would have downloaded Candy Crush. YOU SHOULD INCLUDE MORE MINI GAMES. FALSE ADVERTISING!!

Terrible. The game was advertised as a game where you pulls pins to save a fish, however one I installed it and played the first level, all it is was a Candy Crush clone! While they do have minigames, the pin pulling ad was portraying this as the main game, not some Candy Crush gameplay. If you're about to download the game because of the ad, don't.

I love this game. Great for passing time and challenging at times but exciting to push through. I'm on level 800 somewhat and haven't spent any money on it. Don't know why some people complain about spending money. I love this game. One suggestion tho, give credit/coins for the unused 3 extra moves when not used. Thank you Fishdom. Keep it up. Please help. It's been 4 days that it's saying to upload an update but it freezes and nothing happens. No update and I'm not able to play? My progress???

This game is veeeeeeeeeeeeery FUN! In fact, I could say there's nothing I disliked, but there was. The levels are quite easy, but when I met a hard level I can't play, I have to wait for the next day to get boosters as daily bonuses or wait until there was a new star in the beauty scale, and also, there are no minigames in my experience, so this is what I disliked. I hope you can make games better next time!

I enjoyed a fair few hours on this game. Even spent a bit of money on it when I started getting into the levels 200 onwards. Now up to about 410 and despite being quite good at puzzles, I am just jumping on every day to waste 5 lives, plus any gifted lives, smacking my head on a brick wall at a difficult level. Every now and then I luck in early and slide past them. I would.happily have enjoyed this game, semi regularly spending money on it. Now it is just frustration. 5/5 to start. 1/5 to end.

Gameplay is nothing like advertised. There is no problem solving aspect to it (which is what I was led to believe from seeing it advertised on other games I was playing). After more than 200 levels, waiting for possibility that the game would turn into what was shown on its ads, I am uninstalling.

Great premise and look of the game, but it is difficult to play without spending money. You have to wait until the next day's bonus, fish feeding etc. It's difficult to win enough levels and therefore money to keep the game going. It's difficult to win bombs or lightning. When you do win a level the money reward isn't that great. It would be better if you could gradually build up money or diamonds by playing frequently, rather than being pushed to spend money. Bring back Nemos Reef :/

Just read the other reviews. I was also drawn in by ads portraying this as a pull the pin to save a fish type game. Those are actually mini games that I only encountered a few times. This game, though entirely different than advertised, is fun on it's own merit; however, it leaves much to be desired. Compared to similar games, it's pay to win. Some levels are simply impossible without the power ups. Perhaps make in game currency "diamonds" go further or a little more readily aquired in game?

I entered this game in hopes of saving a fish, this game is about decorating a fish tank. Also, when you have to play another game of 3 or 4 in a row, the little purple octopus comes on the screen and tells you "you are out if moves no matter how many blasts you make. This is tiring. But I will continue to try and win.

in-app advertisement for this game always show the fish trying to escape a puzzle. However, when you play the game that is very very rare that you get a puzzle with the fish escaping it's always one of those jeweler candy crush type games.there are a million of those games out there why are there another. I would love this game if that's what you did was solve a puzzle to let the fish escaped but no that's not how it is.

Took me a bit to get into it, but have come to really enjoy the game. I feel that some of the latest updates puts the player at a disadvantage. Have no way of seeing if its WORTH paying/jewels for the extra 5 moves. And w/b nice if it asked "are you sure" when you accidentally hit the "play on" button & spend jewels you didn't want to. Also would be REALLY nice to have a "vacation button", when I leave town I go where there is no signal & can't access the game to feed my fish.

I was enjoying the game until I got stuck for ages at a level. I'm still STUCK at that level! It seems to me that you do not want me to pass that level without spending tons of money. I'll spend money but not in this ridiculous way! If I get too frustrated, I just might uninstal it. I did that with games that made me mad, like CANDY CRUSH! So please people at Fishdom, games can be difficult but not FRUSTRATING! This Covid 19 thing is bad enough. Please do not add to it. Thank You!

I kept seeing this app's ad on another game I was playing. The ad showed that it was a puzzle type game. After I downloaded it & played it for a little while I figured out that it wasn't like the ad showed, at all. It just one of those candy crush type games that you have to match similar items in a certain amount of moves. The ad is very deceiving, had I known what it truly was I would never have downloaded it, so be warned. I am deleting this app, hope this was helpful to who ever reads this.

I was really looking for something different, but this is just like soda crush, candy crush, bejeweled. It's fun decorating the fish bowl, but its expensive and without the addition to the game I was looking for there's no need to keep playing. I was looking for the obstacle course where you choose which choice you want to make, but once I installed I see that it's a hoax to get us to install the game. Again it's fun just hate being misled!

Game is engineered to manipulate players into spending money!!! You get stuck on several levels trying to pass DOZENS of times...unless you pay!! The more you spend, the more it takes!!! Also the bombs don't blow up all the pieces as you claim!! And drop your way over priced deals & fix things so they are fair play!!! God damn greedy people!!!😡

Money grabbing! This game only wants you to spend money! Once you got to a certain level you need to buy extras in order to progress on to the next level! I've been stuck on one level for days & no matter how I try I can never clear the nuggets to go on to the next level! This game only wants you to spend money so you can progress, & they want a lot of your cash! If I can't progress I'm ditching this game!

The game is fine. It isn't as advertised though. I was intrigued by the mini-games in the ad. There were about 3 in the beginning, but nothing since, and I've played up to 150 levels. It's an average candy-crush type game while you gain coins and bonuses to build an aquarium. I'd give a higher rating if not for the deliberate false advertising in the ads.

Fun, but not what's advertised. I downloaded this game thinking I'd be getting a fun maze game like their ads show. And while I did have the option to do 2 mazes, that was it. Two and done. The rest of the game is just like CandyCrush. Totally disappointed. And not at all ok that they are falsely advertising the gameplay. I did give it 3 stars though because the game you do get is still fun and addicting.

I love This game. Its got me hook line and sinker! It has great interactive gameplay and graphics. But buyer beware! Unless your spending money! Progress gets very slow and very boring! I'm sorry I've wasted a lot of good money! Sometime I wish I never would have started playing fishdom in the first place! BEWARE! Some times you wont want to put it down. Sincerley RubyTuesday

I downloaded the game to play the fish swimming through the maze, they call that a mini game. But you hardly ever get to play that mini game! You have to play a typical game where you match like shapes next to each other, to beat the puzzle. I'm on level 35 and I've only played the Mini game 3 times, and the games are getting harder so I'll probably never play the mini game again? Misleading advertising for this game, you shouldn't advertise the mini game!

It's a fun game, my only issue, actually biggest issue is why should we pay for the Jewels in the " bank" that WE earned clearing levels! Extremely annoying. You play and clear level after level and earn them then they want money to get them! Also lives! You run out after short time you have to wait or use your money to buy. Instead of just being a fun game. Should make more of way of earning gems instead of charging money for those who can't afford and who enjoy the game itself.

Out of the hundreds of times I have seen this games ad. None of the normal game play in shown. Just the lava, water puzzle. Which I have not see yet. The graphic are good and it seems like a nice game but, that is not what this game looked like. This is Misleading. Try it to see if you want but it is not what is in the ad.

I really like this game. I really like how we can organize our aquarium its really amazing that we can buy fishes. But it was not same as l have seen in ads. I really like that fishes communicate with each other but l want something that l can also talk to them. There is 1 more thing called fishy bank! You need to pay to open it and l really do not like it. I want to reset my game but l m unable to do it. I tried to delete and doenload again but it didn't work it started from same level.

Not as advertised. Wanted to play a game to save a cute fish. Got match-3. I've played to level 150, got three simple mini-games in the very beginning. Nothing after. Boo. Purchases appear costly compared to other games. Designed to waste them so you'll buy more. Won't get my money. Their other games are similarly deceptive.

Expensive $4-5 to beat ONE level.It's $60-100 an hour to play. There is no way to get any help on levels except by chance or paying alot of money. I tried it a couple of times to see what it costs and it is ridiculously expensive. Especially after the first 2-3 levels. Unless you someone on lockdown that is really, really rich and want to play a puzzle game for $3-5 for 2-4 minutes of game time. AVOID this game. Or be prepared to take days to beat one of the upper levels.

Money grabbing game. The game will trick you into thinking you're good at solving or you're lucky and getting all these bonuses. Until your luck runs out, you get stuck at level 49, 50, or 51, or maybe a little further, and then you realize can't beat the level without any powerups or boosters or whatever you wanna call them and then it prompts you to spend money to get those power ups. Don't waste your time and energy unless you like spending money in games. Two Dots is better.

Money, money and money... The game comes to a stage, where the player struggles for ten times or even more to jump the level. How do you succeed the level? Of course, you pay for helpers... Free playing shall take time and shall require patience, I know but making the player repeat the same level over and over again and fight for something impossible to beat, is not the way of making money.

It takes too long to recieve hearts, 30 minutes for one heart. Please speed it up. Maybe gift us with hearts for every level we make through, and the left over bombs etc that we did not use or explode on a passed level, should be kept for us to use when we want, as I get into the game I get to a hard level with not enough lives and too many blocks and waisted boms etc that was not used which gets chucked away, please gift us with more so we can actually enjoy the game.

What I want to say is I'm very disappointed with this game because I see the ads and then when I installed the game it turns out just a puzzle game like candy crash... Just match that's all... It's totally different 100% from the ads, if you want to make a game app please make same as it looks like from your ads 😑

I have never seen one of the save the fish puzzels from the ads which is why I downloaded the game in the first place and at this time I've gotten into the upper 900s. However the main game is nice enough to not get uninstalled. I wish the decor store could be sorted by price especially since the "happy rating" increases with cost. Also the timed levels can be really annoying since waiting for animations to finish and waiting for the blocks to refill takes up time

very colorful and pretty. wish i could put more fish in aquarium. also, i like the springtime, flower one. why cant i still use it? i dont want the holiday stuff. I am having trouble because the game is forcing me to update. Only it stalls. I cant update and I cant play. Im afraid if I uninstall and reinstall i will lose my progress. Grrr! Update! Dropped a star because I had an hour of freeplay and it disappeared.

Removing 3 stars because of the updates being mandatory to get the game to open. It WAS working just fine until you forced me to update it beyond my tablet's capacity to run it. Literally takes 10 minutes to even load! Haven't been able to play it since the last update, which I didn't even need.

If you are looking for new ways to improve fishdom, I have a suggestion. When we beat levels and win a reward like 2 or 3 free hours of straight play, we work so hard at beating levels we shouldn't have to claim the reward and the time starts right away. We should be able to keep that 2 or 3 hours and play it whenever we want. Not everyone has the time to play right then and we shouldn't have to lose our reward because of it. If there is a way to pause it, then please let me know?

It takes the fun out of the game when you are on the same game for three to four days. This is my favoret game but it makes me want to shut it off and put the game away. Also 25 to 30 minutes betweem games is far to long of a punishment. I have been on this same game for days now it is driving me total nuts. So i guess i will have put the game away or find something else to play (SAD). LOVED THIS PICTULAR GAME.

This game is basically cool and beautifull.. sorry but I have to change my rate from 5 stars to 3 stars, because there are some unsatisfying features on this game. 1. The levels are too hard.. 2. We just get a little bonus for every passing level which is not balance with the decoration cost.. 3. We only have 5 lives and each lives recovered at least 25 mins.. that takes long time just to wait it.

I really like this game, it is challenging and fun to decorate. My biggest problem with this game and why I gave it 3 stars...you HAVE to purchase the piggy bank EVERY TIME you get to 50 diamonds....just to keep what you have EARNED playing the game. In all honesty, I probably won't be playing much longer as I am NOT going to repeatedly pay for something I have earned!!!

WhenISell an item I dont get all my coins or vouchers back. there has been some events were we went in first place and it did not give us as many power ups coins or gems and it has been really annoying. Like in the last event we did we played a total of 183 rounds and got 183 crowns and fishdom promised 1500 gems and this was a team event and when the contest was over we each only got 50 gems because it was shared with the entire team when I thought we would each get 1500 gems and only got fifty

It took me too many levels to learn this game. Need more instruction or tips at beginning like "go to you tube videos" for examples on how to improve the game. The game is more than matching colors for an end result and more like a game of chess where you have to plan the moves at least 3 moves ahead. When I reached 300 and discovered squids I was already in a game and no previous instruction had been given as how they worked within the game. Another learning curve but hopefully have now.

Not at all what I expected! Very disappointed. It was advertised as a Pull the Pin type game but with fish. What I got was a mix of jewel quest and an aquarium decorating sim. False advertising is a really horrible way to get people to download your game. I might have given it more of a chance if you had just advertised it for what it actually is.

DECEITFUL. I came here after seeing a million ads of this on other gaming apps. The ad shows this as a completely different game. This is so stupid. Such a waste of my time. I am so angry for this false advertisement. Literally a different product than what they advertise. What's the point of deceiving people like this? Absolutely disgraceful. How low would the developer of this app have to stoop to get people to download this common, unoriginal game? Come up with an original idea and make it.

Terrible advertisement. It's that tiles game (like candy crush). I'm really upset because when I got the add for the game - it showed me trying to solve a path for the fish to get to safety (seemed a lot more fun) - but when I installed it...it was the tiles game with a few of the advertised games. Please dont false advertise. Its ridiculous. You dont think we will find out when we install? YES WE WILL...AND WE WILL UNINSTALL! 😡

Terrible, boring, the ads lie. It shows in the ads these things about being able to move around these poles, and let him swim through the water, avoiding lave and that. But there is none of this. There are games the same as candy crush. Unless you love candy crush, i do not recommend getting this.

The game is very fun and it passes time... however, the only issue I have with this game is the timed levels. I know they need to make it challenging but for somebody who has bad eyes it takes longer to find matches. And I have lost 50 lives and had to play a level over a 3 day period, Because I can't find the matches. I understand the limited moves and the super hard levels, those are fine I just wish that the levels weren't timed. I would give it a 5 star if they changed that....

I do enjoy this game and would have rated it higher if this game was as advirtised where you have to help fish get out of tunnels without getting caught by a shark but its not 😕 still playing it tho its another match 3 game with loads of levels and no end in sight but once i start playing a game i cant stop. It is better with jems than most games where you run out and to get more HAVE to spend money to get them.

Firstly not the game advertised. Secondly its gets harder to compete without buying the diamonds which I think it's odd especially for a game like this. Then the waiting time to get a life back is 30 minutes which doesn't make sense except you want people to buy your diamonds. Downloading this game was a waste.

I love this app! Its fun to play but sometimes me and my mom get stressed in super hard levels😅. But theres something that creeps me... its when the fishes say.. "whose that at your back". Thats why i only gave it2 stars also the game glitches but i dont like it in one part to and mine has adds and sometimes it brokes down. Sorry fishdom. I just hate the gliches and the lags.

Why do all games like this end up being the same exact game but the ads say its something else. I mean, at least it has some of it, but they are all mini games that you have to play a bunch of the other games to get ONE! I dont recommend unless you're ok with not getting what the ad promised.

Cute and fun, BUT it's a little misleading. This is not the game they advertise in the ads. It's not helping a fish through a maze of hazards. There are a couple of really short, simple mazes, but otherwise, it's the same old "match three more items" game.

Don't believe in any of the good reviews you might read. They all are fake. There customer support system is pathetic as don't respond d to your problems. Don't waste your money on this game. Many levels are ridiculously hard and unrealistic. It takes 40 to 50 lives and many boosters to clear the level. Right now 2915 is such a level. One of the worst customer support and they don't care for the the players. Pls stop playing and wasting your money before you get mighty disappointed.

The game is interesting but too interested in taking my money! It is too difficult to earn the emeralds so you can be stuck on the same level for days and the only way out is payment! Most players will be tempted to abandon it before level 100! If one chooses to use boosters, they all arrive on the board at the same time at the level starts! If you need aids, you must pay, you can't even earn them? Borrow a leaf from King who has given unlimited lives on Candy crush

I am on level 2304, and the game is nothing but an aggravation. You are forced to spend money to continue playing. Easy levels are now some of the hardest levels to beat, and there is very little reward, barely anything, because the cost of things to decorate your tanks with have skyrocketed. It takes forever to get stars and move onto the next tank. Levels are impossible to beat without extra lives and powerups. The developers should play their own game and see how much $$$ it cost to play.

"bait and switch", THERE ARE NO ESCAPE PUZZLES as advertised. there is nothing random with placement of pieces and more importantly boosters. Boosters mostly get placed in a way that it breaks up a good combination or you are forced to use it wastefully... you have no control over when or where a booster is placed.all this is to get you to open your wallet. HACK, You can quit without losing a life if no move. No COVID generosity.. cant even delete and start over. Greedy dev strikes again.

FALSE ADVERTISING! I was shown multiple ads for this game where one had to choose which lever to pull to keep a fish safe. This is simply a shoddy version of candycrush where you also need to feed fish and can/must create a tank. That would be great on it's own, but I liked their ad idea SO MUCH MORE than the actual game. I wish it was even close to what was depicted. Simply FALSE ADVERTISING. Could have done well with honest representation.

Yet another game looking to get into your wallet/bank account...sneaky tactics like letting you win "gems" but charging you to access them. Further more, you will be blindsided by easter eggs, christmas decorations or whatever soon to be holiday is strolling around just so you do not accumulate "gems" to beat levels. Not too bad, though, if you're spending someone else's money or careless with your own.

Edit to previous review. Great till you get to around lvl 78, then it seems the push is on for you to spend money, or to just keep trying for days and days, to clear one lvl. Was fun whilst it lasted. Just a game and what you get for any money you may think of spending, is pretty dire.

The game that was advertised and the game you get are completely different. This is basically bedazzled but with ocean-related symbols instead of jewels, which is NOT what I was expecting. Plus, I earned a whole lot of gems (needed for various things in-game) and they get stored in a "piggy bank"..... which you can only access if you pay real world money for it.

I love this game! Reason for 3 stars and not 5 is because of having to pay $3 EVERY SINGLE TIME the piggy bank fills up. I can't pay that, so I lose all the diamonds I earned. That's a LOT of lost diamonds!! If it was a one time payment, I wouldn't mind, but every time is just ridiculous. Change that, and it could easily be a 5 star game. The animations are cute, the monologs are witty, and the tournaments are fun.

Hello, my team of 5 players made it to the 2nd place in the latest team tournament which should split the reward of 900 gems to all of us. We only got 30 each. I understand that it's automated and obviously has to split between 30 players, which is the maximum number of players in a team, but it's unfair that we got only 30 since we obviously gave much more of our time, gems and boosters to get to 2nd place. We would like the rest of our gems. Thank you.

Originally downloaded bthis for the tunnel puzzles advertised and it turned out to be completely different game. It was fun at first but every time I start getting somewhere it glitches out. I've uninstalled it and re-downloaded it twice and almost at the exact same spot it stopped working. It's like the kid version of tune blast accept it doesn't work.

Ugh, same thing as the landscaping one with matching the items that move up on your board. It's such a bad goal in these games. Eventually you will start losing levels very quickly and can only play 5 or 6 times a day usually the same level when you run out of your bombs too. That's why i uninstalled landscape and why i am uninstalling this game. Plus the ads are fase advertising gameplay. Which is a disgusting thing to do. I'd never give any money to a company that does that.

This game is designed to get your money. You can't make it very far unless you spend. It's a bait and switch. You will be stuck once you don't spend to pass a level. Big thumbs down! And if you do win any gems, guarantee the game is designed so a simple touch and your gems are spent on garbage that you didn't even want. They dont even have a confine button. The whole game is a fraud. Customer support is a joke.

This games was advertised as saving a person/fish from doom and to figure out how to. I only played that game once since i installed this game. Im on a high level trying to see if I can play that "save a person" part of it and its not on there just a "candy crush" fish bowel game. You even have it in the pictures for the ad. Im very disappointed and will be uninstalling it. Your game sucks ass.

LOVE Fishdom! Not only is it a fun game it keeps your interests peaked to keep playing by challenging yourself to move to the next level. The support team hands down are the best, most creative and very talented with understanding of those (me) who did/does not understand the time limits of rewards accumulated and made things right to some of what was lost! Great game, great team!

A lot of people are saying that the game isnt what the ads said it was but thats not necessarily true. After you finish a level (every once in a while, i guess) it gives you an option to play a minigame and that minigame is what you saw in the ads. I, for one, think this game is really fun and enjoyable. The levels are fairly easy and the fish are pretty cute. I just don't like how whenever you get to a new aquarium it forces you to click on certain things when i dont want to. I do like it tho.

I got rather annoyed because what I was expecting was a puzzle game where you are freeing and protecting the fish. While there are two or three mini games of that, they quickly disappeared. I would have given this 4 or 5 stars for the game that it really is, but for the bait and switch.

The advertising for this game is deceptive. The ad is for a bonus game that you get after completing some levels. There are 5 of these bonus games in the first 30 levels and none in the next 30. Don't waste your time unless you are looking for another Candy Crush with a fish bowl.

This is the epitome of "FALSE ADVERTISING"😑 THE MINI GAME ADVERTISED IS MISSING. I'M NEARLY AT LEVEL 400 & HAVE literally beaten levels in excess of 70 or more consecutively without having lost a life and the only reward I get is a ticket for having beat the level on the first try. The problem is it requires so many more tickets for me to acquire the special fish and I have yet to play these mini games shown. Update this problem & add the games Advertised every 5-10 levels or DELETE!

I have been playing this game for months. At the beginning of each day when you open the clams for a token, 50% of them are 2 x. Yet in all the months I've been playing I've only gotten a doubled clam token ONCE EVER. Clearly the game is fixed. If 50% of them are 2 x, then 50% of the time you should get one of those. Scam scam scam

This game is awesome. Its has a minigame also after a level as shown in the advertisement. The graphics is very cute and cheerful type. I have nothing to say just speechless. I will only suggest all of them who are thinking to install this game just don't look at the mb and install it.

I've had to edit my review with less stars than previously. The levels have become so hard that even the ones that aren't labeled as hard, can take days to beat. It now takes days to be able to buy decoration or fish. The challenges are impossible to complete, unless you can play all day, every day, and spend a lot of money (which I can't do).

Love this game! Fish are so cute, and make me laugh. However, i hate the timers! Wish was possible to opt out of those. Also, wish could purchase piggy bank with something other than real money. I'm loving the camp event! Several events later, and still loving the game. Finally getting a little better at timed levels, so not hating them as much as at first.

Game is great. Support assistance very disappointed. Want to send my team members on witches of the sea some lives. When I follow your written instructions, I get 3 names of people that are not on my team. When I try anyway to send lives my team members asking get nothing. Only these 3 people. Your support helper asked me to send screen shots. Took awhile for me to get back to game. Can't figure out how to send the support helper the screen shots. When I try to reach them, I get your autobo

You need a lot of money to play this game. If you don't beat the game at first, then you only get 5 more turns that takes your resources away very fast. And each time you run out of turns it takes more to continue. (On the same game) I also don't like the timed games. I don't notice that it's timed and I think it's by the move so I always run out of time. If it wasn't for that, I would love this game. I can check out my friends progress and send messages and you can be on the same team, too.

I don't think it should fill the piggy bank then make you pay for it to open. If you go back to collect the 3star from a level you only got 2stars in, it takes a heart away even if you get 3rd star. The fire cracker doesn't blow up many things. It doesn't give many point rewards when get at the end of a game.The spin of the day always comes up coins never lives or anything else. The help the fish escape part of the gameis why I came to the app, it's only a mini game.It's an alright match 3 game.

False advertising. It advertises as a "save the fish" game in which you have to move and open gates to let the lava flow without killing the fish. In actuality it is a connect 3 game with various fish aquariums that you can buy items and fish used to spice up the aquarium. While the theme is cute, the music fun, and the art decent, the game itself isn't anything new or even all that well done. This game is purposefully built to attract game addicts into spending all their time and money.

I do wish we weren't forced to update or not play. It can get irritating to update the game every couple of weeks or not be able to open the app. Update... Another update necessary, three weeks later and as there is a problem and my update cannot be completed at this time, i can't play.

An excellent game more than enough fun in this game especially if you want to fell like a win I honestly can't tell you how much I love this game but I think you want to know about it being a puzzle game and you can win prizes for winning a game and you can get more coins if you're lucky it's like an 92%chance you'll get it so lovely game if you don't trust me then try it out sorry if to long lol just know it's a good game

Great fun, but there should be a way to buy lives or stars with coins. Or watch ads to earn them. The game all but forces you into in-app purchases if you want to continue without waiting a half hour for your next life. Also, the fun puzzle with helping the fish through a maze has not come up once and I am almost to level 200. I started the game because THAT puzzle looked fun. It's just match 3 over and over. What a crock.

Fun but expensive game. The levels are hard to pass and they rely on you purchasing stuff to help you out. If you persist without help, you will always pass the level after a while. It's mostly luck anyway. It's very easy to spend a lot of $ in this game. You have to buy the diamonds you win in the game too and at $5 a time it adds up fast. They keep giving you free playing time which is great if you have the time right then, but I need to save it for later.

Not as advertised. The gameplay is nothing like the shorts featured in the relentless pop-up ads. Eventually, I downloaded the game just to stop the ads from interrupting my other games. Having said that, this is an enjoyable and very addictive 'swap & match' style game with a cutesy aquarium building feature. I'm only giving it 3 stars as I don't appreciate misleading advertising or being constantly hounded to pay for rewards I've supposedly already earned in gameplay ("fishy bank").

This game sucks. Its just another stupid version of candy crush. Not what you see. You have to beat several levels of that to play just one of the fun games that is advertised. Then back to several rounds of dumb candy crush. They deceive you by showing you the fun part, which you hardly ever get to play. Why can't they just make the game as advertised? I would play that for hours, if it was really as advertised. Total garbage. Wish i could give negative stars

I saw how much real money I was spending and decided to only play as long as free lives held out. Since then, I've been downgraded twice and have been stuck on the same level for a week. Even the Fishy Bank of gems earned for beating levels cost real money to open. I’m Dumping this scam of a game today. The graphics were great and the play was fun. Too bad corporate greed was more important.

Great game, fairly simple to pick up but that's certainly NOT to say it's boring . . . . . that is NOT the case at all. I find this game very fun & extremely entertaining. Also, whether you only have 10 minutes or 3 hours, this game is a great aid to to pass time while riding public transit or passenger during any vehicle-ride (long or short) or to simply relax & unwind after work and/or periodically during the weekend.
There's a lot of fun features to this game, but the ads that are very unrelated sometimes, and it would be most appreciated if you could remove some of them please. Great game though!
This game is great! Also, I haven't had any glitches or problems and it is a total time killer. Thank you, game developers for this game!👏

Originally wrote about the ads composing more time in the game than the game, but everyone else is saying as much, so let me talk numbers to the devs instead. I played about 10 minutes. Calling this a game is an interesting interpretation. There are very few meaningful choices to make. You don't choose who to attack, and you can't consciously set up a defense. This is simply a slot game that rewards you with little graphics. It's cute, but it gets tedious pretty quickly. If you're into repetitive slots (don't worry; you can turn on the autopilot) then this app may keep you busy for a while. As a game, it's nonexistent.

I LOVE this app. It's worth every penny... $70 (or whatever it is) is very little cost, considering I listen to it 365 days out of the year. I really liked the app at first, but now I feel that a lot more of it is only provided with a subscription. Calm is a superbly designed app, it's so nice to look at and play with things. Also the content provided as is, is quite interesting and it does feel calm and relaxed. There is also a wealth of options for free. It is definitely worth the money to pay for premium though, you get so much more. This app does wonders for anxiety and anger, it does just what it says, Calm.

So many bugs and glitches. For the last few nights I have not gotten my bedtime reminder. At first, I thought maybe my settings weren't set correctly, but everytime I go into the app to check, they are correct. Then I would get the notification for the exact time I checked my settings! There have to be better alteratives. I'm going to look for them.

Excellent Idea For An App! Spot on! I wanted better sleep so I selected the Sleep portion and skipped the rest. Then I got so depressed about not having better control over my emotions, I got the the rest while I was there. Let's hope this works! they dont have one for Addiction.... . ... lol

After completing the introductory '7 days of calm' series, I was looking forward to the next series in line, '21 days of calm'. But as soon as I completed the first session of this series, the rest of the sessions were put behind a paywall (they weren't behind the paywall when I took the first session). What cheap trick to pull on someone! This completely put me off with this app.

This app is hopeless. Filled with bugs, crashes regularly and every few minutes turns off the music I'm listening to when reading before bed or trying to sleep, which immediately wakes me up and adds to my insomnia. And no it is not to do with the battery settings which I have already changed. There also used to be a repeat feature where the track would start again after it ended, thus not disturbing those of us who needed background noise to sleep but they took that away. Waste of money.

It works, but glitchy. It does help me fall asleep faster. I use the Rain/ Nature sounds. However, when I first started using the app, the sound would play on a loop, which I like, now sometimes it loops or shuts off after about 5 min or so. I've set up timers hoping it would play the length of the timer, but it still stops. Bring a continuous play option. I use this to fall asleep, it's hard when I have to keep hitting play when it stops. Idk what why it just stops randomly.

I have no problem paying for an app that serves me well. I've tried various guided meditation videos and free apps but I love this one enough to pay. I prefer having so many options in one place. I don't know how I ever survived without the sleep stories! I'm finally maintaining a daily practice and getting better at mindfulness. I've become much less reactionary. If you're just looking for a quick, mediocre meditation, go to YouTube. Otherwise, this is a fantastic app and worth every penny.

I've only done one meditation so far and oddly, for me, I almost fell asleep! That's never happened, it was so relaxing, there was space & when the voice came in they said things that resonated with me. I also like the ability to personalise this app. I'm on the brink of signing up for the premium, just want to see how I go after a couple of days. Because ordinarily I meditate alone without guidance anymore, so we'll see!

A free trial subscription is meant to be so you're able to test everything before spending alot of money permanently. You still have to buy full subscription to access everything which is wrong. You should be able to get access for everything before having to buy even if the trial period is shorter. I personally want access to everything before I spend money.

This app has really helped me de-stress before bed, so that I can sleep better. It also provides calming nature sounds and music, when I need to tune out background noise, at work, to focus better; and fit in a quick meditation or breathing exercise, when I'm having a stressful day. There's a different meditation, daily, in addition to the library, so it never gets repetitive (though you can save and go back to your favorites). Overall, it's the best meditation app that I've found.

I have never tried meditation before. I was surprised that this was so effective for me - super relaxing! Was like doing cache cleaning on my brain, haha. Would definitely recommend that everyone try this just once and see if it's effective. The narrators' voices are super soothing. I love the thunderstorm sounds! :-D

it really helps me sleep. I do the quick check in before bed to get out all my feelings and worries and stress and settle in for a sleep story and they put me right to sleep. I struggle with turn my mind off so I can sleep and these stories are the perfect calming thing to focus on because they are calm and interesting but I'm not so engrossed in the story that I have to finish it. I often fall asleep within about ten minutes and I sleep deeply all night.

They are nice meditations and tips, a beautiful app design and it's very intuitive. I just kept having buffering issues, the sound would clip and the scenery sound was clipping in and out and that's 0 relaxing. Youtube meditations are just as varied with beautiful landscape sounds, so... Its not worth 50 euros a month for that. Sorry.

App didn't shut off like it was suppose to. At night, i use the app to go to sleep. I used to love this app! But now they've intertwined all of the paid stuff with the free stuff, and the free stuff is constantly changing. This app completely blew my mind. Not what I expected, yet better. I am not on the Premium version, yet I have access to great content, helpful content. I suffer from OCD, and this app just reminds me to stop, and be mindful. I will definitely be upgrading to Premium. This app is amazing. You won't be sorry for downloading it.

Bedtime Lifesaver for myself and my children! This app is the ONLY app that I would genuinely say has made a positive impact on my life. I recommend it to everyone...there is something on there for every type of person out there. Get it!!!!

I was looking forward to this app until I realized nearly all of the content is behind a paywall. TRUST ME just YouTube meditation and enjoy that content instead. I understand some people are willing to pay the expensive cost and give you guys what you're looking for. But unfortunately for the majority of us it just turns us off completely. Uninstalled immediately after making an account. Certainly a shame because the potential is there.

I HIGHLY recommend this app, if it's in your budget. there are SO MANY sleep stories and meditations for almost any scenario. it has helped me with many different aspects of life, especially sleep. the only thing I would say could be helpful is a search function. for example if you wanted to find the mediation on procrastination, you could just search for it instead of trying to remember which collection it is in.

So me and my mom sent my little sister upstairs with the app on her phone, and about 5-10 minutes later she comes down crying say that "Everything is premium" This pisses the hell out of me cause I have this problem all the time as well, But in my opinion it shouldn't be this frequent. It is almost like spam mail, And it isn't the most efficient way to monetize an app. So if you're willing to buy premium, Go for it. But if you're not looking to pay for anything in an.. I'm running out of chars.

This app was great a couple of years ago. Now, even though I have a lifetime membership fully paid, it crashes often, the reminder function works only occasionally, the sound works only about 70% of the time and more bugs pop up on the regular. This is decidedly not calming.

This app really helped me slow my thoughts at night, and really relax before going to bed. The bedtime stories gave my mind something else to focus on instead of racing thoughts, and I am able to fall asleep better. The breathing exercises have helped me to self-soothe/ calm down when I am faced with anxious situations. It's sad though that it requires one to subscribe to get the full usage out of the app, but I understand that people have to make money.

This disgustingly priced ($70) app with limited features spams your screen with various things that you can technically get through without creating an account or paying a thing, but it's such a ridiculous circus of jumping through hoops just to try the free version. You're better off finding a more decent app or website. I tried this because my elderly mother wanted to try it, but this is not recommended for the elderly because of the aforementioned issues, though it would be good otherwise.

I loooove this app and at first I didn't even think I would keep it past the trial! I used to search calming vids on YouTube but this app is so much convenient. I don't use it every day but man when I need to fall asleep quickly or just breathe for a few minutes this just makes it so much easier.

Music, meditation and sleep stories galore! I love the calm app I appreciate how much its eased me into the routine of fitting in a 10 minute mediation every morning to give me a mindful and relaxed start to my working day. It has destresssd me and has helped underpin my own ability to become aware and control the stress before it takes a hold. Matthew Mc Conaughey reading me a bedtime story 😍.

I love this app, at least what I was able to use. Almost everything is locked, so their is no need to download it. If you have Samsung you can access the app from Samsung Health, and you can access music stories and free medicating classes on YouTube or other sites on any other phone. This is a waste of time! They might as well make people pay for the app! You could literally listen to everything in a day of 2. Overall I am very disappointed, this is a scam. Especially in a time like this.

Beware the free trial. Charges you even if you cancel. I tried free trial and canceled the same day however I just got charged $69.99. I tried to contact someone and there is literally no way to reach someone. This is a terrible time for me to lose $70 I wasn't planning on spending. The app isn't even worth half that amount, that's the worst part. Poor customer relation and poor product!

Great content in the paid version - but for the price there are serious limitations in the technical side. One example includes not being able to create 'playlists' or to circulate through faviourites. Also not being to put night time meditation or sleep stories on repeat is frustrating. When i wake up, i need to turn my phone on to play them again - and its not as simple as just pushing "play". This lacks logic given the purpose of the sleep stories and sleep meditations.

I downloaded this app just to leave a review for you people. There's nothing calming about a mobile ad that lasts one FULL MINUTE when I'm just trying to unwind and play a game. I get that you're a big company now and you got big money to throw around, but could you please go buy a lambo or something instead of flaunting your wealth at me when I'm just trying to play a game? Thanks.

Helps me sleep a great deal. It runs much quieter during the day though which bothers me. Yes I'm aware there is generally less noise at night to contrast the sound. But the difference is significant. Max volume won't block out almost any background sounds at all. Like traffic sounds, which on my street is busy both during the day and at night. Is the dimming of sound depending on time of day a thing with this app?

Wow. This app is a lifesaver and I suppose it literally has been for someone out there. Sleep stories, sleep music, guided meditations, etc...all the tools you need to improve your life. All you have to do is put some headphones on and do nothing but breathe calmly for 2+ min. Everyone should be doing something like this. Meditation is probably the most inexpensive and easiest way to improve your life. Thanks Calm for getting me into meditation and, well, improving my life. :)

I dont like the misdirection of having to go through so many steps of just simply cancelling a free trial in a timely way. It's things like this that makes me skeptical. You have links of all kinds for every single thing, straight and simple except for cancelling....and a link sent to your email address to confirm the cancellation was done.

*Based solely on a technical aspect and not the quality of the app content- I turned this on last night before bed and when I woke up, the app screen was still up and running which means the one image of the Calm screen was on all night. Not good for phones. Please update this so screens will be allowed to go into sleep mode and not run continuously.

UPDATE: No fadeout on sleep timer yet. 5 stars when U do it! Thanks. Otherwise, the app is great! UPDATE: Sep-10-2019: You didn't actually fix the sleep timer yet. Doesn't fade out. Docked 2 stars. The popup is not the answer. Up to 3 stars until I hear a genuine, obvious fade, then 5 stars 😴 -- Previous review: There MUST be a fadeout to sleep, or I can't use your otherwise wonderful app for fading into sleep. It wakes me up! Otherwise, terrific app. W/ a bad flaw. UPDATE: Sep 10, 2019. Nope.

A better free version would be a better way for me to decide to pay $69 a year when there are other alternative apps. My bible app for one, does it all for free. I read your reply, fortunately I unistalled your app. Im not interested in whatever free version you might have at this point. If you do offer a free version I'm sure it would be limited on what it offers, and will want you to pay your outrageous $69 a year. I'm sorry im not one of the suckers that fall for that.

I love how many options there are for mediations. I really appreciate the feature of setting a daily reminder to meditate. I don't think I've had any technical issues with this app. I would like to see more 5-7 minute meditations that can be done if you don't have as much time. I also would like it if there was a nighttime affirmations meditation as well.

This app made me the opposite of calm. Beware of the "free" trial scam. I tried it for a week or less, tried to cancel it because this app is literally useless, and was still charged $80 for having this app. You can google breathing exercises and mindfulness tips, this app is nothing special and offers nothing useful in regards to managing stress and anxiety. I hate this app. Would give it 0 stars if I could.

I love this app! Even with what the free version offers I find it so much easier to fall asleep at night. The only thing that would make this app better would be if we were able to purchase individual stories or sounds. I don't want to pay $70 if I know that I'm only going to use a few features. Overall, I highly recommend giving it a try.

Tamara has such a soothing voice and excellent choice of words, I really feel embraced by her caring attitude, but over time the several little bugs the app presents have been wearing my patience thin. The music options are great, but playing is too easily interrupted and won't automatically resume. I'm sorry I jave to downgrade my original 5 stars rating to 4 stars, but I promise to upgrade it back if I see at least some of these bugs solved.

Really helping app, although you have to pay for almost every lesson/session. You have some free sessions but they dont do much, so if you want a good session, you'd have to pay for it. The reason I put 3 and not 5 stars, is that it's annoying that everything requires payment.

I do really like this app but I feel like there should be a few more free sleep stories mainly because I'm a student who has terrible anxiety and listening to the stories helps me relax however I haven't got the money to be spending on an app. I just feel as though there should be a few more free stories so mostly everyone can enjoy this amazing app even if they don't have the money. 💕

I was trying to find something late at night when I couldn't sleep. Found this, wasn't what I was looking for. Only signed up for the trial. Forgot to cancel it the next morning, they automatically billed me the $75 and could not find a way to cancel it, only the re-occuring billing....a year away!!!! Not happy.

This app is truly wonderful. I have downloaded and also purchased many apps in an effort to aid and improve my meditation practice. These applications usually had an area where it was effective but this is one of only two I can recall that has put together everything I need to meditate. The developers put a lot of thought into this application.

Horrible experience. At first I loved the app and tried trial version. Then it duducted my money for one year subscription without asking. And there is no reply to my mail for refund. When did I say I want to opt for 1 year membership. This is horrible experience. Please revert back to me .I will ask all my followers to write against it

I wish you can make a playlist of tracks you want to listen to for the night.. it actually makes me anxious knowing I'll have to reach around to change it to another track and wake up my partner who is very light sleeper. Can there be a playlist option of repeated optional play in the near future???

It's a really great app and very helpful to get to sleep. However the max time that I can have the sleep noise on for is 8 hours and 50 mins. That means that if I sleep 9–10 hours a day the noise will never be on when I wake up which is really annoying. If you change this it would really improve the app!

Tried it a few times. Seemed too phony to me, couldn't get myself in the mood the app is trying to create. On top of that, the app billed me for a full year ($75) after canceling my service once the 7 day trial was up. Would consider giving a better review if they decide to resolve this issue on their end. If that's not the case, the overall atmosphere the app attempts to create compounded with the less than ideal billing experience deserves a 1/5.

$80 for the year, 7 day trial only. Might be helpful for some people, given the pandemic I don't think too many people can afford. Liked the app on PC but this $80 for the year is quite expensive. Please just use YouTube instead, look up calming/relaxing videos etc like them or put into a watch later folder

I have been using this app for 2 years now, in particular the daily calm guided meditations have made a real difference to my life and considerably improved my mental health. I found Tamara's voice very calm and soothing. I have been recommending it to all my family and friends.

Amazing app for mindfulness and meditation. Sometimes just listening to the scenes is calming. Calm has it all from sleep stories to guided meditation and simple breathing exercises. I have incorporated mediation into my morning routine and have never looked back. It costs $60 a year for premium but they have a fair amount of free content too. One subscription you actually do need!

they charge you.. I wish for once a free app was FREE!!! SMH.. and u only get a couple options unless u BUY! Beware. Update: I'm aware you have the "free" version..Which has only 2 or 3 story's and just a couple sounds... You and I both know u can't get much outta the free version. That's how ya get us... Or try to anyway.. but it's all good cause I ain't no dummy. I have gotten what I need from another app so it's no worries here. Just giving MY opinion!!!!!

when I feel like I'm going to explode I turn to Calm. I lay and I listen within a few minutes I feel myself calming. I feel as if I have become the music. like I'm in a concert hall with only me and the Orchestra im on the front row. I can feel the music flowing through my body the orchestra is playing just for me. what a wonder piece goes through me. Thank you

Same exact stuff I can find on YouTube for free. There's nothing original. Example is Lindsay Stirling streaming from this app. Free on YouTube. I'm sure this app has good intentions but again, nothing is original. Matthew McConaughey is not someone I would want to "relax" to. Alright, alright, alright?

I think this app is wonderful, especially during this time of uncertainty. As a teacher, I am however disappointed that it is not free to educators anymore. I think at this time, more than any other, would have been extremely beneficial to our students. Especially while they are under such high anxiety. It would have been such a great support..

I have horrible anxiety and trouble sleeping and this app has tons of opportunities to help with these. Sleep stories, meditations, stretching, music and much more. They even have classes to help with anxiety and to teach meditation. It has really helped me and I can wait to use it more. I use it at least once a day and sometimes more.

This app is pretty good in general. It has definitely helped me with sleep. But...... calm premium is excessively expensive. I want to be able to sleep better and practice mindfulness without extra costs. I can't afford premium but I'm tired of having the same stories and meditations over and over.

For.an app to be this expensive they don't let you sample hardly anything for the 7 days to see if you even want to pay for it. I can listen to better calming sounds for free on music apps. The cost is ridiculous! After you pay for it you really wouldn't be able to fall asleep you will be worried about your bank account 🙄

Really wish you could customize the time the scenes play outside the app. My partner and I get up at different times, so not being able to choose a time between 4 and 8 hours means resetting it in the middle of the night or someone sleeping through their alarm.

I do like what I see but not 70 dollars a year! No way! Cant even figure out how to cancel because it doesnt even show my free trial! But there is a hold on my account because of this! So now trying to figure out how to cancel something that doesnt show up before I'm charged

Calm has been a fantastic app for both myself and my daughter. It has helped with bringing mindfulness and focus to my day so I am present and living in the now not worrying so much about tomorrow. The "sleep sounds" has helped my daughter get to sleep at night which has been difficult for her lately.

refuse to try this app. only app I have ever seen that has 60 second ads - they know how to screw up a gaming experience. totally thoughtless to those who are trying to be competitive In their game of choice. run 15 or 30 second ads instead and I will change this rating. so rude.

Amazing app for adults and kids alike. They're a separate section just for kids! The sleep stories are super helpful for inducing sleep while the guided meditation eases anxiety and stress. I love the music and nature sounds as well. Very well done app.

Love this app. I like the wide array of options you have. Hoping you'll add more videos on calm body. I like the audio with the video. If you added more it would definitely keep me here. Love the daily prompt and having a fresh meditation daily. Keeps me accountable and not having to think about it.

I can't share the quotes to my instagram anymore... So to navigate around that, I have been screenshotting then editing out the "share, send message," etc buttons. My app is updated... Weird that this happens. Any ideas? Otherwise, LOVE the app. Been using the paid version for almost two years. Good impact on my life.

Currently very frustrated. After stories this app has startled my children awake jumping back to soundscapes abruptly. The optimum volume for stories is very different from the sounds, I ensured sounds were off next time but frightened kids again as it automatically jumped back again. This may be rectified in settings/navigation but I don't want to keep messing up the kids wind down. I feel under pressure because $79 will be taken if I don't cancel and 7 days is too short to really explore.

The very best of the best. This app is one everyone should own. It is a lifesaver. Regardless of if you need sleep, relaxing, mindfulness, exercise, stories, music. It has it all. Cannot say enough good things abuut this app. So professionally done

If it would not be for entirely moneymaking, this app would be a great help to the world, and especially for persons like me who dreams of nature all the time! I hope the developers will be more like passionate beings then completely professionals in the coming days. Anyway, this is a beautiful app!

I love the sounds, they are so peaceful but I would really like to suggest a peaceful sound that I grew up listening to and falling asleep to but can never find and would love to hear on the app. Unfortunately they don't take sound requests. 🤷

Love the app itself, can see myself using it every day, but the pricing scheme is terrible. $76.99/yr after a free seven-day trial. That works out to about $6.50/mo, which is comparable to a lot of other subscription services, but I can't understand why there is no monthly subscription option.

I'm an epileptic always looking for ways to help my brain. The songs alone are fantastic. All deferent types of meditation for all levels. The calming and sleep songs and meditations are second to none. Thank you so much for your research and help. Don't think I'll ever unsubscribe.

I thought people were exaggerating about everything being locked, but they weren't, nothing's free! Literally there's 1 MAYBE 2 things in each category, most of them the bottom of the barrel stuff, then loads of other way more interesting stuff. Just mark the app as paid in the app store instead of wasting my time.

I find the app to be great. However, after the seven days trial, the free version offered me TWO, only two free items. I honestly need the app since it's helping me a lot to sleep better and decided to buy the yearly subscription but I felt "forced" to do it since it offered me practically nothing for free.

I tried it a few times and it was all about commercials. However having more time due to cronna I gave it a second try. OK it's 6 weeks later and this app rocks. It doesn't make the news go away but it definitely helps with the edge we all find ourselves on. Calm is very cool. Thanks... Panda 🐼

I like the content a lot. I hate that if you do meditations or listen to the content elsewhere (like Sonos or Samsung Health) that it doesn't sync, even if you're logged in to your account in those places. I can't imagine the poor database design that demands this in a commercial product.
