I really enjoy the fitbit and have used the app for years. First the basic and then the fitbit alta hr. The basic I had many. They never seemed to last very long. This is the second Fitbit alta hr. The first one I had for many years but was just.coming to the end of it's life. The current fitbit alta hr has one deficiency...you can't tell when it needs recharged. I liked the previous version because I could tell when it was time to recharge. Seeing the graphics could be improved on the watch.

Everytime I clicked on exercise. The app crashes. It's been like that for the past 3 days. Fitbit App is the latest version. Logout and login again makes no difference. Restarting also no use. Sigh....seems like issues are getting more frequent. After 5 days, the app worked again and I can now view my previous exercise. However, when I tracked my new run, the running map was totally off. Seems like it partially captured the middle part of my run only. Getting really disappointed with Fitbit...

Fitbit app has been changed, no longer shows sleep patterns. It is now a premium feature that you have to pay for. What is next? ....paying for each step you take! You buy a product and companies keep looking for ways to devalue your purchase unless you pay them every month and give them your private information. This is getting old!!!! What happened to great value and great products? Also noted the app no longer let's you edit with manual entries, I used to be able to add my weight lifting.

I've have a Versa 2 and I love it. I have a compatible phone. But 8 of 10 times it won't sync. It has to be the programing....GIGO. Every upgrade or update causes problems. It didn't used to be that way. Update: 4/7 no change! Update: 5/1 Every time the app is updated I have to uninstall and reinstall the app. Sometimes more than once.

I have had my fitbit versa since July 2018. I have had minor problems syncing but now it won't even find the device let alone snyc. I am very frustrated my time isn't even correct either. After puttin up this post the app worked on week now it won't even find my versa on bluetooth!!!! Now all of a sudden I am being told that my phone is not compatable with the fitbit after all this time! Can't get a response from anyone in charge with fitbit. Very unprofessional!

It's been over a month now that my notifications haven't been working. After wasting so much time doing hours of troubleshooting to find out it's an issue on fitbits end. Versa is having an issue with communicating with S10 devices. Also wont stay connected to WIFI. Fitbit is aware of this problem and say "wait for the next update" but how long does this take!? Not impressed & currently am annoyed and disappointed with my Versa. I bought this watch to used its functions however THEY DON'T WORK.

The app is pretty easy to use, does what it states . Paid version isn't anymore helpful than the free version, so don't buy in. The biggest flaw is definitely the menstrual tracking. Very poorly programmed, out of all my friends who have tried it zero have reported it to accurately predict a cycle. There are so many good apps out there, it can't be that hard to program! Maybe get more woman working on your team Fitbit!

I like the challenges but , I have been very frustrated with not being able to start challenges since last August updates. I have called many times to correct this , but largely unresponsive. They even have said they don't have records of some of my previous contact. I have only received one email from their tech staff It's now 9 months without resolution. I have a charge 2 but why would I buy an upgraded fitfit or try Premium with the response?

Conceptually great, but the app used to work much better. Now it's an endless cycle of syncing failures, "device not found" errors, and the app often just gets stuck on the refresh screen with no data available to view, making both the app and device entirely useless. I have the free trial for premium right now but I definitely won't be renewing after the trial - I can't imagine actually paying for an unpolished app that seems to fail every second day if not every single day.

Doesn't track sleep correctly. I have an Inspire 2, and it works for for steps, but hasn't tracked sleep at all since I got it. On my 3rd one actually, have done a bunch of troubleshooting, and no glory. None of them track sleep. I had a Flex 2 before this one, and that worked fine. I should have just gotten another Flex vs the Inspire 2, which doesn't work right.

I have used my Fitbit app for over 3 years without problems. The last few days I have not been able to pull up my previous info. It would no longer except my AOL email address. I ended up putting in my gmail email address but none of my previous statistics carried over. It's very frustrating as now I can't get the new gmail account deleted and I can't get my old information to come up under my AOL account either! THIS ALL STARTED WHEN YOU LOCKED MY ACCOUNT FOR NO REASON ON APRIL 17! Please restore my account to it's previous status to allow me to sync my Fitbit Charge 2 to my AOL email addressand hopefully, be able to pull up the info on my phone! Thank You!

What has happened over the last few days? Generally a big fan of Fitbit but it's been issue after issue. First the app would crash anytime I tried to upload or view an activity, then the website was down and nothing recorded, now my calorie balance won't update. Tried updating the app, force closing, turning phone off and on. What am I doing wrong?

My Fitbit is no longer paring, the time is now off by 1hr and 25min and goes up daily. Started at 10min off and not this. Ever since the update I can't sync. I've done a ton of trouble shooting. I've hard reset it about 10times, cleared cache, uninstalled/reinstalled app and nothing! I was almost late for work (essential employee) because the time is wrong! Please help!! Everything was working fine until the update! Also, I when I got it to update, it was ok for 1 day and the next is history!

This app used to work great but now it's super glitchy. I can go back and see previous days that I exercised but the app always says I've only exercised one day that week no matter what. For example my week started on Sunday and the data from Sunday is in the overview but even though I exercised two days already this week the app says I've only exercised one day. I think I'll be canceling my paid subscription for premium. I'm not going to pay for something that doesn't even work correctly.

There is a huge issue with this app. It keeps telling me I have no internet connection, when everything else I have is working. There is nothing wrong with my internet. This has been an issue for awhile now, when will it be fixed. It doesn't sync like it is supposed to, just a mess. Please fix what you broke and get is back working again.

I love my Fitbit and used to love this app as well, but it will not sync with my Charge 3. I had the same problem with my Charge 2. When I upgraded my watch, it worked perfectly for about a month then had the same issues so I know it's the app and not the watch. The app also drains my battery every time I open it. Very disappointing.

The app has finally made the Fitbit Versa a worthy replacement for my Pebble HR Watch. The Fitness aspect is very well done, it was the smartwatch aspect that was lacking. The addition of the calendar for me is great, the only thing missing now is caller ID, not just call notification. There is a certain amount of self discipline needed to input you dietary intake daily, but it's worth it to see the weight come off and my exercise routine extent as fitness improves. Thank you.

This app used to be 5 stars, and I'm not the only one with this problem, but since the latest firmware update on my Versa, GPS almost never connects during exercise and so my speed and distance are off by about 1/3 distance. Might switch to Garmin but I love the UI of this app, especially the social aspects. Competitions and goals keep me motivated. Fix this, Fitbit.

Ugh....this app never syncs. Always "searching for device". Calls and texts never come thru, or it retrieves texts that are weeks old. So frustrating. Have to uninstall and reinstall all the time. I have been a faithful Fitbit user for 6+ years but this will be my last Fitbit as the quality has gone down hill. Just waiting for it to completely die, which should be soon as the versas only seem to last about 13 months (just outside of the warranty window...how convenient for Fitbit 🤔).

With the latest two updates I've had nothing but issues. Syncing even when all day sync is slow and delayed. In addition to the sync issues I am also having issues with my dashboard. When I take a bike ride or another activity it may or may not add to my active minutes. Even my Fitbit coach workouts seem to log but not get added into totals on the dashboard. My weekly reports look worse. I would also recommend adding a conversion for activities to steps. Spin class you don't get any step value.

4/26/20 I have an Alta HR. Like most people have reported, the app has been crashing every time I try to check my exercise. I thought it was just me, but I see this is a Fitbit issue and is happening to numerous customers. I trust Fitbit will fix this issue and send an update asap. 4/27/20 Installed the fix and it now will not connect nor open. Logged out - didn't work. Uninstalled - didn't work. Please fix this asap.

The app is good. But i bought my charge 3 3 months ago and it is almost impossible to connect it to my phone. Worked perfectly for 2 months then out of a sudden became impossible to sync it with my phone. Very disappointing performance. Hoping Fitbit will fix this issue and find a way to compensate all charge 3 owners since this is a common issue.

Connection problems! I love my Fitbit and the app when it works! About once a week lately I have a day or most of a day that I can't see any stats on my app. I don't know what's going on, but I feel like ever since they got bought out the app has gone down hill. I really don't want to switch to a different smart watch but I will if they don't get this figured out.

Screen only dims in pitch black when you have auto dim "off" and set to "dim". Basically, auto dim doesn't work and you stare into a lightbulb at night just to check the time. Same thing on me & my bfs Charge 3. Pretty lame for a 200$ watch, what a joke please fix it and throw in a game while you're at it EDIT: Restarting doesn't fix it. It just doesn't dim to low in pitch black, only goes slightly lower than normal. Super stupid. EDIT 5/20/20 STILL DOESN'T DIM TO LOW ON AUTO?!??

This app keeps me motivated to get up and move. The helpful tips and bits of healthy info encourage me to do better and to push harder. Lately, however, the GPS tracking has gone a little fluey. It has me walking all sorts of crazy paths. Once I actually walked on water! Really? If I could edit the number of stars, I would remove one. Not happy I have to log in to Twitter to contact support. Phones are busy because of what has been going on. :(

Other brands tracking app is far better than Fitbit app and Fitbit tracking device. You are forcing to switching ON location 24/7 on mobile to get calls or sms notifications on Fitbit device . Other brands tracking apps also follows google's location policy to sync with their devices, Without switching ON location 24/7 their devices getting calls and sms notifications accurately. Hell type development you have for notifications services Fitbit App.

The app itself is normally quite good. Three times in as many weeks I have had to reboot my watch as it won't sync. The quality of the watch is deteriorating. I purchased the rose gold watch 2 years ago & the strap was toast after 2 months. Yes, I follow the do's & dont's laid out in the guide. I reached out for support that was sub par. I was told on strap was on its way, it never arrived. I went on Amazon & purchased a new strap w/ no issues. Next time I have to reboot, I'm out. 😔

Worked fine until the latest update and now heart rate is still tracking on watch but not showing on dash board for 3 days. It is now also recording only basic sleep data. BAD update! Update: Fitbit always gives the same response and act like it is a user error when the product is the problem. I had been to forums and followed all advice and it was still not working. Luckily my retailer replaced the device. Take some responsibility for your dud products/app updates and stop blaming users!

Syncing issues. I've used the app for about 4 years or so now and never had a problem. I moved a few months ago and misplaced my Fitbit. When I found it I tried to log into my account and get back to it but it kept saying my password was wrong and i never received the email with the link to reset. I finally gave up and made a new account and now i can't pair my Fitbit. On my phone under the bluetooth search its saying it sees my fitbit but when I try to pair them it just searches. Disappointed

There are issues with displaying my daily statistics. The entire page is blank, like it's not loaded. I synced my device, force stopped the app, cleared the cache, and restarted my device. It is still not working. I'm not sure what is going on but it would be great if there was a hotfix for this issue. I am using a Samsung Galaxy Note 10+ and my Fitbit is the Charge 3. Other than that issue, I love the app. It has helped me lose so much fat and keep track of my calorie intake and loss.

I have a Charge 2 and have used this app for 3 years. It has been perfect, for the most part. Recently, I started having some issues with inconsistency in my run distances and not syncing properly with My Fitness Pal, but I could still use most functions. Yesterday afternoon, anytime I tried to enter an exercise or even view my exercise history, it would crash and close. It had a new update ready to install. So I did that, hoping it would resolve the issue, but it didn't. It keeps crashing.

1) No matter how many times you set units to metric, it will insist on giving your exercise summary in imperial. 2) Updating takes *ages* and even then, it's not complete. Say, I just did a workout (running) and while I see I did the workout, it doesn't bupdate the total number of steps for the day. 3) just a generally unhandy app. Statistics are hard to read and useless.

Syncing with myfitnesspal has managed to get even worse! Used to be able to force a sync by disconnecting apps and logging out of both and back in, which was tedious enough to have to do everyday! And now even that isn't working. Burn 400 calories, go through every step to force a sync and then it logs 80 calories?! Getting sick of it now.

Being able to monitor my heart rate on the go is great! Easy to note when my heart rate goes into 'fat burn' mode. I am on a weight loss program and have lost 32 lbs in 4 months! My fitbit app is a great assistant on my wrist with Versa! Very satisfied .. can't say enough about how valuable it is to my daily life .. I'd be lost without it now!!

I can't get the app itself to connect to my wifi anymore. I get a "no connection" error everytime I open the app. Had the app on my phone for years with no problems untill they did this last update. I do give Fitbit credit though they replaced my Versa after it stopped working. Only problem is I can't set the new replacement Versa up. Please fix this guys!

This app worked great until the last few weeks. The Versa records my activity and steps, but the sync function with my Samsung Galaxy S6 is inconsistent. The suggested solution by the app doesn't work. I've removed and reinstalled the app, updated the Fitbit, and hard started the Versa; none of these actions have fixed the sync problem. My fitbit inconsistenly receives texts and calls, and uses the Bluetooth function to sync. Please fix this glitch!!

So many little issues make this app a huge pain to use. It tells me I'm offline when connected to wifi; it thus only allows me to sync (a process that requires one to be online) when I'm using my mobile data. The sync feature itself simply doesn't work most of the time. I always have to reset my Bluetooth and location setting and sometimes have to reset my phone to make it work. It takes literally at least 5 minutes, which is very frustrating.

I love it when it works right but I have trouble getting it to sync from my Fitbit to my phone. I wear it to bed every night unless I'm having to charge the battery and I keep track of my steps everyday. My husband has to take it off my phone and then put it back on usually about once a week. I would love to upgrade at a reasonable cost

I have had my new versa 2 watch for 3 days. All though I love the watch, the app is terrible. I have had to uninstall and reinstall the app to connect it 6 times now. It constantly says " unable to connect device or device not found" This is getting very frustrating and I'm hoping you can fix the app because as a first time user it's very discouraging.

Update 24/04/2020 - recent update has caused the app to stop each time I open the exercise tab. All other tiles work fine? Cleared cache. Forced stop. Rebooted phone. No joy. Please fix asap Very good clear info easy to read. Occasional sync problems lose it 1* but this maybe device rather than app problems. Not as keen on the new update look but that's personal preference. Does what it says on the tin.

Connection issues are very common. Update 1: I've tried your steps and they didn't help. Not sure if it's the Versa 2 or the app. Maybe it doesn't work well with the LG G6? Update 2: New phone and still have connection issues. Seems it won't connect at all with the Pixel 4. It's a flagship phone. If it would connect to anything you'd think it would be that. No luck at all. Connects to my PC just fine when it's plugged in. Guess I'll just have to live with half of the promised features?

Even though sometimes it freezes and requires to be installed again...I love this App Now my Fitbit is dead...it was freezing often, then it couldn't sync. Then it did a rainbow colors on the my versa then the screen was off but the back light was still on. I kept it on the charger for a long time but still nothing. Now the back light is off too

Still no resolution. App' still won't run on 3 month old Android phone !! Will download but not open or run - ridiculous ! Have uninstalled it / reinstalled it probably 25 times, cleaned the cache, run virus checks, phone on/phone off but still useless. It will however load & run on a 3-4yr old Lenovo tablet but takes 5 or more attempts to even get it to open - why ??? There must be a copy of the previous version of this app' that always ran perfectly by the way, that you can roll back to ??

My watch had been working great up until a couple of days ago I have done all the resets and removed and re added my Versa 2 but the watch keeps freezing and not allowing me to use the touch screen it is still recording data but not allowing me to access anything past the watch face. The watch is only a couple months old. I am not impressed at all.

Improved my Health When I first got Fitbit, I was trying to lose weight and track daily exercise. I found it very motivating. As I lost weight, I no longer needed a CPAP machine and I appreciated monitoring my sleep duration, timing, and stages. Unfortunately, my health declined with a rare disease. Fitbit recorded my elevated resting heart rate, sleep disturbances, and inactivity which was hard evidence I could share with my medical team. I am on the mend now and would never be without Fitbit

The app is going through random moments where it just doesnt want to work. It is syncing and if I click steps it will pull up and show me steps but the minute I get to the main menu. It's nothing but blank and gray. It isnt showing anything. The app itself is messing up. I had no issues until about two or three updates ago and now the app just doesnt want to work. And messes up at least once a week and now it wont show me anything. It's just blank and gray. My versa 2 is still working fine.

I have had my Versa almost 2 years now,never had any problems until the recent update. Apparently I am doing 400+ physical activity minutes a day which is completely incorrect. Also I am lucky if my battery lasts 2 days before I need to charge it again. Have sent an e-mail just waiting for a reply however I know full well I will get a generic message back giving me advice to try their trouble shooting tips which I have tried but with no success!

I've started getting only basic sleep pattern since the update on 4/16/20. I have tried everything I know to make it go back to showing sleep stages with a score but nothing works. I have made no change in placement on wrist or change in sleeping positions and keep sensors clean. I am EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED in this. Also, problems syncing now. I used to love my fitbit, but no longer do and will be getting another brand that works ASAP. 😿

Everytime there is a software update it never works. I noticed it stopped tracking my sleep so I tried doing a factory reset thought maybe since I've had it for a while with the update it needed it. Now my watch just says download the app to get started and now the app won't open. I used to love my watch and tell everyone to get one and lately it's my biggest waste of money cause it never works.

I have a fibit Vera 2 which is only 3 months old at first the app was great but over the past 6 weeks it doesn't sync to to my watch and when it does it's for about a day, I don't get any notifications from my phone to the so called Smart Watch, I have to keep uninstalling the app and reinstall at least twice a week for it to work then .. you guessed it stops syncing ... So refresh, looking for device , it sync but all notifications stop working again ... Waste of money (watch) and waste of time

I have Versa. Between the firmware updates and the updates to the Fitbit App this app continues to go downhill. My Versa requires constant (many times a day) rebooting to restore Touch screen access. The watch needs daily charging, I used to be able to go almost a week. The Fitbit app now constently crashes when selecting the Exercises. On the "help" forum there is silence. My advise is find a more reliable product and company.

I like Fitbit and use this for many years. The app is simple to use and almost enough in function for me. Progress reports and some notification keep my motivation well. If I can make some requests, I'd like to record my blood pressure on this app. And I wish I could change the size of display and letters for my old eyes :)

I've had this app since Christmas last year and it has worked fine until the recent update. My inspire HR used to sync with my phone (Motorola E5 play), but since the update I've been having to sync to the app using my iPad instead. As the Fitbit connects to my phone but not the app on it... Why is the Fitbit app only working on certain phones, especially as it works for most iOS devices, why not more Androids?

Horrible. The new android update rounds off your overall time to the minute. It does not give you seconds. So now I can no longer see the actual time that I ran my race. The most important Stat of all, your overall time, they have omitted. Hard to believe that the people at fitbit are actually that stupid.

Purchased the Fitbit a year ago, worked well with nice features on the app. Then came an update and certain features were now gone and had to be purchased in a premium version! Awesome paying for an overpriced device just to limit you afterwards. Now also basic features like run tracking doesn't work. Even if I take my phone for GPS it will be off by over 30% and tell me i ran 4km when running 7 on a measured track... Sync has never really worked well. Sleep tracking is quite good at least.

My existing fitbit versa 2 was no longer being recognized by my phone and therefore not receiving notifications. I've tried going through the app, uninstalling the app and reloading, rebooting the watch, rebooting my router, placing the fitbit beside the router, factory reseting my fitbit, etc all of the tricks listed online. All of which have not worked. The app keeps saying that there's no internet connection and not allowing even the initial set up via Bluetooth. There must be an app problem.

Love the Fitbit devices, I have upgraded 3 times and I now have the Versa 2 which is amazing (only because I wanted the music option). Great for all exercise routines and equipment and keeping track of heart rate zones and calories burnt. I use my own music playlist and connects easily and I don't have to carry around a phone or ipod or bulky headphones at the gym.

The App is let down by it's unreliable pairing with the tracker. Sometimes it takes days and then only after uninstalling and reinstalling the App to get it to work. It was not this bad last year and it's really putting me off the product. It needs to connect immediately and reliably. I find it hard to believe it cannot be done. UPDATE. It now takes a total uninstall and reinstall every day to get the cursed thing to sync!!!!!!

Update April 30, 2020. I don't understand why the app still isn't compatible with a Samsung S10 plus after having the phone for more than a year. Don't get notifications, can't use the pay option or many of the reasons I bought the Fitbit. Get on it Fitbit! Generally great. Bluetooth doesnt always sync and Deezer won't either.

Apparently this new update has caused alot the issues again. My charge 3 stopped connecting in syncing on July 3rd. I only noticed it yesterday because I don't check my app daily. Ran through every link every step before contacting customer service who ran me through every step and every link again which I did patiently. Finally inform them that I do have extended warranty on by fit bit and do I need to send it back. Now I'm being told an engineer is looking at it in to be patient. Not happy

Almost every day in the past 4 to 6 months has been an issue. The app used to be decent & update every day. Now, I constantly have to trouble shoot. I have the most updated version. Yes, I am technologically savvy enough to know how to trouble shoot. You never know what you will get w/customer service. One time, I had a WONDERFUL experience, and another time a TERRIBLE experience.

Updates don't and syncs won't. It'd help if you'd hyperlink to your help pages from the app. Uninstalling and powering off/on sites nothing. Syncing tips site you sent doesn't exist, so thanks for nothing. Customer service is a waste of time, there's a line of 40+ people just to message someone online. Getting a decent number of responders and supervisors would be a start.

Past 3 updates have made my fitbit charge 3 go from bad to worse. It doesn't even work as a watch never mind a tracker. Not even 3 months old and it's fit for the bin. But support won't admit there is anything wrong with it. It's 2am and my watch thinks it's 7pm yesterday. And it hasn't and wont sync unless I add a new device now that doesn't work since new update. UPDATE: I have done everything you suggested several times, I have even reset my tracker and my phone to original factory settings and still the tracker will not sync with my phone. My phone can see the charge 3 but the charge 3 will not communicate with my phone, it is a useless piece of junk. I have been doing some research online and I have seen that this has been an issue with the charge 3 since 2018. Yet support were blaming my phone and my version of Android. It worked fine on my phone for 2 and a half months until you brought out an update to your software and the three since then have still not fixed it. The Bluetooth on the tracker is faulty full stop!

I don't like giving negative reviews but I have a new versa 2 since January and have had major synching issues since the start. I have given up on ever getting notifications on this watch. I use it to monitor my sleep and most of the time if I open the app in my phone in the morning I can download my data, but it doesn't always connect to my phone. This device has no function whatsoever as a smart watch though in my opinion. No notifications and connected apps such as Spotify are useless

*Updated 24-Apr-2020* Only deleting and re-adding device to app fixed it, but losing unsynced data in the process. Been running OK for a few days now. *Updated 20-Apr-2020* Now it no longer finds the device, even after restart. --- Having sync issues lately. Only time it syncs is after a phone restart. EVERY SINGLE DAY. Feels like the most useless app on my phone at the moment. App version 3.18 Versa firmware 32.70.7.14 Android 8.0.0

While I am learning to appreciate Fitbit as a tool to keep me focused on my physical well being rather than being sedentary, it is unreliabe. For several months there were syncing issues; then out of the clear blue it started working properly. Sometimes this still happens. Just yesterday, it "could not find the device." This is my second tracker and the first one presented no app problems.

The app keeps crashing! I've had no problems until tonight. I just went for a walk and every time I try to go into "exercise" , the app crashes. It's syncing with my fitbit Alta HR, but not working right. I've updated the app & restarted my phone. Please fix! You broke something that was working fine!

Latest update broke sync to my Fitbit charge 2. Rebooted the charge, nothing, force stopped the app, nothing. Rebooted my phone, nothing. But don't worry fitbit, I fixed it myself after finding no help from you. For all customers having this problem, you need to unpair the device from your Bluetooth menu, delete the Fitbit from your account in the Fitbit app, then do a soft reset (look it up on YouTube) on the Fitbit, then re-add it through the Fitbit app. Hopefully it works, took 3 tries 4 me

I love my fitbit, had them for years, love the changes to when reviewing the exercise maps and being able to see best pace, but, looking at the times for runs the times only show rounded minutes and no seconds. Can the seconds be reintroduced? It makes a huge difference to determine if improvements have been made in a training program by having minutes and seconds represented.This would have been 5 stars otherwise. Update: Now crashes everytime the exercise tracker on the dashboard is opened.s9

Connection issues. I have the versa. When it stays connected it's a great watch and app. Problem is it loves to disconnect frequently (no notification when it does) and is so difficult to get reconnected. Trying to set up wifi takes forever to load as well as some other features. I've had several fit it's through the years and guessing by the other reviews, I'm not the only one with these problems. Why won't they fix it? Going with a different brand of watch when this one dies.

I was offered a free 90 day membership to premium, only to find out I've actually been charged! On topic, the premium is a bit of a disgrace. I understand charging for extra workouts etc, but having to pay to see my heart rate during the night is outrageous in my opinion. Also, my fitbit now sporadically loses connection when I run now, making the entire thing pretty pointless. I have to say, it was good when it was working well, but now I feel like it's a huge letdown and a waste of money. I thought that paying for a more premium brand would be worthwhile, but this is a letdown. ALSO, to preempt them replying to this comment, I've gone through all potential forum solutions and none work. They now just aren't replying to anyone saying it's still not working. Take some responsibility please!

Less than a year old and my bluetooth can't recognize the watch anymore. I troubleshot every possible way including removing the device and when i tried to resetup it still failed. The fitbit support staff kept asking for the same thing and has no knowledge of their product, telling me over and over again that my bluetooth must be off because the symbol wasn't showing even though it had to be turned on to search the device. A major waste of money.

Really love being able to track my progress, appreciate being able to connect with other people on Fitness Journeys, especially love being able to track my sleep cycles since I am working on improving my sleep schedule. Really enjoying all the functionality and versatility, I would definitely recommend this app.

This app needs help when connecting to my phone when I try and log my run. I can't get voice cues to work unless I use the app, I can't get heart rate unless I use my Fitbit. So now that I log a run in two places it screws everything up. My steps are out and now this app won't even open to the GPS screen to start my workout. I went back to using Map my Run from Under Armour. Really disappointed Fitbit.

App crashes every time I try to add a workout in. Fitbit isvalso glitching flipping back and forth between home screen, notifications and shortcut exercises. This is a replacement Fitbit for the one that had a screen that wouldn't turn on after a few months. I've had this fit since January. Not impressed, Fitbit. Should have gone with a smart watch instead of the Fitbit Versa.

Dear Developers, I'm fairly new to the fitbit community and I'm more than sad by this app for such an expensive watch. Ever since the latest update I cannot log my excercises or even check them, bc as soon as I open that option the app crashes. Also Syncing takes too much time and isn't always successful. I'm trying my best to restart my phone and the app all the time, but it's getting frustrating. Can it be known when will you release a bug fix on these? Then I'll modify my feedback 😊

This update has not fixed the whooping great bug that is inhibiting all our fitbits from syncing. Would you be so kind as to run the old version until you can realease a debugged version. I only purchased my fitbit charge three at the start of this year, discoving it obsolete 4 months later is a bit of an insult. I know there is a lot of pressure to release products and new software but please run an old app and a new app until this issue is resolved. Respect your customers and programmers guys

I have had very few issues with the app in the years I've used it, but in the last week it crashes when I try to enter my exercise section, which seems to have been resolved with the latest update, but now my entire "Today" screen is grayed out. I have to go into each section to see any of my tracked activity, or to manually add new activity.

The app was working great until the most recent update. I can't see how many calories I've burned and more when I finished my workout. The app kicks me and I have to restart the app then it kicks me out again. Please fix this asap. I'm giving it 3 star ratings right now until it's fixed. Then I can give 5.

I've had this app for years, it usually works fine, but from time to time I have issues with it, like it taking multiple attempts to update my versa. The past couple of days have been annoying though, because I finally learned how to use my gps with my tracker, but now every time I try to open the weekly exercise part of my dashboard, the app crashes and closes. Only for that one section. What's the point of tracking with GPS if it's going to crash the app?

Do not buy fitbit with my charge 2 there is just constant problems with the app syncing. It never works, the only way to keep it worrking is to keep un-pairing your device but then you lose all your data. They take forever to respond to problems and it still never gets sorted, if your going to buy a fitbit think twice and get something that actually works 😡😡😡

Good app when it works. Doesnt Sync these days has been problematic for 3+ months... tried a reinstall didnt help... worked for a few days now not syncing again. I find the weight tracker useful however. Would be nice if you could set a custom viewable time on weight tracker as it goes 1wk to a month to 3 months. Also would be nice to see projected weight into the future based on current data. Wish I had bought a normal watch with a decent stopwatch overall due to little benefit because of sync.

I LOVE IT, I LOVE IT, I LOVE IT! 😍 There is only one down side. I really don't like that you have to pay for your stats. This app makes me so happy and positive. And what made me got it was a problem of money. I had no money and was struggling and was depressed. And it made me feel soooo much better and positive. Until I unlocked my stats. I express myself trough writing my feelings and emotions. Than I had to pay ... It's like the world is just against me and everything and everyone hates me.

I love the opportunity to reflect on my day and then be able to look back on it later on. Really nice right now to keep track of things when 2020 has been throwing everyone a good couple curveballs. Overall, a well functioning app and smooth relaxing design/appearance, I'd happily pay the yearly fee to have all the aspects of it.

I personally use this app to ensure that I'm taking care of myself well and to track my feelings. It works very well and it's easy to figure out, and I love that it gives litte easy daily tasks to take care and relax! I would recommend there to maybe be a few relaxing exercises or other little things like that to do other than just journal your feelings, but it's still the most effective app like this I've used so far!

I like it so far. Clean, beautifully designed, doesn't have too much or too little. I don't know how the AI is yet but it sounds neat. But I'm still on the trial subscription. If the free version ends up being terrible, I'll probably delete it since I don't have the money to afford the subscription. I'll understand if it has ads, but if it loses a lot of functionality, then it'll be a deal breaker, sorry :( Also one complaint: text editing is wonky, please fix it, thank you.

This is a great app and has helped me mentally. I like the interface and that you can rate your day based on different aspects, and love the daily quotes. My only 2 issues have been: first, I have trouble saving an entry once I'm done, and so I end up losing a whole entry. If there was a draft feature that would be great. Second, the app double prompts me to make an entry, so once I save an entry, it'll ask me to do another one on the same date right away. I simply discard it. But it's annoying.

For what they ask you to pay ($30 a year), there are some improvements I would like to see, especially in order for me to renew. 1) As I reflect on my day, I should be able to select multiple activities and multiple feelings. As it is now I have to go back after and add them. 2) I should be able to add my own categories of activities or feelings. I consistently would like to track rest or reading, for example. 3) The tracking in the stats section should be more accurate.

I like Reflectly and it has helped alot. Why not 5 stars? I accidentally logged out and I'm trying to log back in, but the app wouldn't let me. It keeps telling me that I have it wrong though I've been writting my email and password letter by letter carefully. I've done this like 5 times already, please help.

I like the app but since the last update I keep receiving error messages. I didnt have any trouble soth the app from when I downloaded it in December. Now I cant write my journal entry and answer all the questions and it wont save my entry. Then today when I go to write in today's it says something went wrong. So I logged out and uninstalled it. Then reinstalled it but it still gives me the error.

I like the app. It helps me look back on the past and record good days. But one problem though. I have an account on my tablet, but I am typing this on my new phone. I tried to transfer my data on my tablet to here, though I forgot my password. So I clicked "forgot password" got the email, went to the page, clicked the link, but did NOTHING to make me reset my password! Please fix this, I've made a lot of progress on this account; 35 stories.

It has been very good, up untill it started saying "error occurred please try again" every time I try to save a story. It's super annoying to write out the full story of the day and have to start over because it wont let you complete it. And 50% of the time it wont let you do anything on start up because it says "cant connect to the internet" so you have to restart it untill it works. If the bugs were fixed I would give a 4 star rating because it functions as intended otherwise.

I love this app, Its my favorite journaling app I've found Definitely reccomend! The only suggestion is that we can permanently add more options for what made our day the way it was. When it asks why was your day good or bad and you say family or whatever.. I wish we could add our own things permanently like in the other app I have, Daylio. Other than that, very good app.

It is a great app, my only complaint is that all you do is tell Reflectly about your day, there is really nothing else, it is basically a diary in a way, by then, it is an amazing app and does what it is meant to. It will tell you good moring and will ask when you are ready to right your story when it gets closer to the end of the day.

Overall I like the idea and it's simple to use. But there are issues and I'm looking into different journal apps. This app crashes every single time I try to add pictures or even when I just writing in the daily journal entry! It freezes. I also DO NOT get reminders or notifications from this app like it said it would do (yes, I have checked and re-checked my settings. I have uninstalled and reinstalled,twice, it doesn't work.) Was going to pay subscription but definitely not anymore!

It's nice to have an outlet that doesn't waste paper but typing when i elaborate has a few issues. Sometimes i just want to copy and paste from my notes app because i already have something in there but it won't let me. I also can't add my own category for why my day was good or bad. I go to the "other"category and type my own category name but it doesn't save it. There were also several times it said that there was something wrong and it couldn't let me create a new story so i redownloaded it.

I've been using reflectly for a long time now, and i personally using it. I like the daily motivations and quotes, especially the daily questions! It's a really good app to express your feelings and all. But i do have one problem, i just wish reflectly would be offline, not online. Because sometimes when my Wi-Fi is out, i can't write my daily entries, which is really disapointing because of it. Still, i'll give it a 5 stars rating, i just hope it was offline :)

It is a good app but don't get too excited about your "personal stats"if you are unwilling/unable/not allowed to pay £20 yearly £7.50 monthly or £200!?forever. I think that the app should tell you that you have to pay when you tap on the personal stats icon.The only other thing is that you can only write a minimum of 12/40 characters!But other than that reflectly is a good app.

I like the function where you get to lock it I wish it was opened my eye scan rather than finger. I like the functionality of the app it is easy to use. I wish the reminder would sound even if the phone was o silent or have that option all in all good app. I wish you could set a recurring question like 10 things your great full for down on the bottom I have to wait to save it then add it later.

1. The daily reminder notifications don't work (I've checked all in-app and phone settings already) 2. The app is a bit too expensive. It charges monthly what most similar app will charge for a lifetime access. 3. Without the payment, there are no stats available, making it pretty much useless for any analysis.

I rate this 5 stars because it's great and has really helped me get a lot of stuff off my chest that I didn't feel comfortable talking to others about. But I have a problem where the dates are wrong and whenever I start a new story it goes backwards in days. I tried to change the date but when I press on the correct date it doesn't do anything. Is there a way I can fix this

The app basically is just a journal to keep track of how you've been doing. You can choose to either describe your feelings or write what you feel in a description, but either way it feels like venting. If you are down or just want to feel better then get this app because it's been helping me and it's like I've been venting everyday.

I love reflectly and I recently started using it! I have written every day and it helps to reflect on my day and have a better mindset. The only thing about this app I don't like is that you have to pay for the full reflectly but it is still great just having the stories to write and it asks you an new question everyday and it asks about your day and sends notifications asking about you which is nice!

DO NOT USE THIS APP, HEAD MY WARNING. this app has bugs they still havent fixed that delete paragraphs, keep you from finishing stories, glitches out not letting you upload photos, has the audacity to even have a subscription fee to get to what you actually care about such as those monthly stats and being able to write more and yea its a good concept but bad execution. What happens is it starts out fine but after a certain amount of stories such as 30 these issues get worse and more appear.

This is an amazing app. I love how it has so many little details that help you to describe your day. You can tell from the moment you open the app that it was well thought though. It's little daily moments and little reminders always help to lift my mood. I've never gotten an ad.

Everytime I try to add a story it always says something went wrong your not connected to the internet. I'm connected to WiFi and the internet connection is working great. So this app has a glitch or just doesn't want to acknowledge that I'm connected to the internet. Please fix before I move on to another app

This app has helped me not bottle up how i feel. It's definetly a nicer version of a diary. I just wish so much of it wasn't ristricted by payments because for people like me its hard because we dont have the money to put into the app. There's also a lot of error messages and I keep having to do entries multiple times but it's occasionally not letting me do anything at all.

Something's going on with the app. Four times this week it would not allow me to make a new entry for the day, even though my internet connection is just fine to do so, and sometimes when I fill in an entry, it refuses to save because "a problem occured, try again." Its infuriating and needs to be addressed by the developers.

This app would be perfect for me but sadly it doesn't work most of the time. I think out out my day and select my emotions and when I'm at the end there's an error. To solve this I have to close the app, throw out my entry, or force stop the app. I can't select my entry to copy and paste into a new entry, I have to retype my entry and sometimes I still get the error. It's very frustrating!

This app has helped me a ton because on days i just want to write something down but dont want to use a journal, i use this app. Its a really easy app to use and if you really like it, you could buy the premium. You can add photos from your day which i think is really nice especially sinse i love to take pictures. Its a really easy app to use on the go if you just wanna jot something down. I think this app is just amazing

This app asks all the right questions, and keeps a chart on your current status, comparing it to when you started. The daily reminder notifications are cute, and I'm glad I installed this app. I get to type away my problems, and when you finish a story, you save it, and it appears with a cute little picture with the date that you wrote it. My recent story got a picture of a seagull. You can also favorite stories. You can go back and edit things. So, overall, this app is a 5 star rating from me.

Copy all. If your app is going to crash and not save my story. Let me be able to copy my 500+ character journal. It is a true pain to have to type it all several times until the app decides it wants to work and save. Especially if I decide to pay for features on this app. This app crashes far to much for My Time or My Money.

AN AMAZING APP. I would totally recommend it. The first few days I was trying to get the 6 stories done to see my personal stats but since I don't have a credit card I can't pay for the app😢. So if you are trying to do that without paying you can't see them. Love the app though.

So useful for helping me focus on the positive and I love the additional introspective question. I'd get tired of just answering "how was your day" very quickly. I would change: 1) I love that you can alter the time for reminders (morning & evening), but you can't turn one off. Since I have no intention of writing twice a day, this is annoying. 2) I started 6 wks ago and the followup Qs are beginning to repeat. To be fair, my answers have changed a bit, but maybe a few more could be added?

This app is great. I've been struggling to get myself to journal for YEARS, but this makes it really easy and accessible for me. I've always got my phone on me and I can just take a minute and jot down a few key points about the day whenever I have time, and then can go back later on and add if I want. It also is nice because it gives you little encouraging messages and things to reflect on throughout the day.

I absolutely love this app. Reflectly helps me to get all of my emotions and feelings out. And it's so private too! If they don't have my emotions or activity I can customize it. It is a great app and great to use if you need someone or something to "talk" to. The only thing is the interactions could be more interactive and it should be more than just a story a day. The questions should be deeper and there should be more of them.

I'm literally obsessed with this app. I write in it every day to express my feelings. Especially when I'm angry or depressed I let all my feelings out on it. And even sometimes write about my life drama and in the future always go back to it and laugh. But yeah its like my virtual diary🤗😂

It's a great app. One thing that slightly put me off was that it told me how many more stories i had to write before i could unlock my stats, and when i finally wrote that amount i was informed i had to pay to unlock the stats. I think it needs to tell you what you need to pay for in the first place to avoid any disappointment in future. Overall helpful app.

Surprisingly Amazing. The reason why I prefer Reflectly over any other app, is that it has amazing questions that make me think about things. I have ADHD and its impossible for me to install a diary app and for it to just be blank and for it to expect me to write in it. With Reflectly I don't have to think about it. I don't have to look at a blank page. Thank you Reflectly. Ive felt better ever since I downloaded this app. 11/10. If I could give it 6 stars, I would.

This app is pretty great! I've just started it and It was already really great! At first, I thought it was probably one of the weird diary things, but this is better! You can do challenges and see nice quotes! You can also add a picture for every one of your stories. You can tell your mood and more! I really recommend journalists to download this. It's pretty awesome, try it! Good job reflectly!

I absolutely love it. It gives me an excuse to take a moment to appreciate and reflect upon every seemingly insignificant part of my day, everyday. I really like the option to add pictures and creative titles as it makes looking back on previous stories more fun and interesting. Overall, a great, simple app.

It's a good app. Even the free version is usable and ad-less so that's a big plus. Just keeping track of the daily stuff is nice. However, when it asks what made the day either bad or good, can we please select multiple icons? I've found I can only add multiple icons (relationship, friends, work) if I go back to the entry and manually edit. It's a bit annoying.

This app has no ads, and makes all of its revenue off of its premium version. I personally don't have the premium version, but I'm fine because they dont cram premium into your face, asking you to buy it all the time. They ask once, and once only, and later if you change your mind you can buy it. The normal version isn't very restricting, in fact I find it perfect for me. It's my own personal journal entry app, and I kind of use it to not only look on what the future might bring, but my past.

I've been using this for 3 years already, on and off but I've only been active for a year and a half now and I could totally say that this application is amazing. It has helped me reflect and analyze my thoughts providing questions everyday, a morning moment to give you a quote, and also lets you share pictures. I find it rather minimalistic and flexible also because of the themes given. Dark and White theme along with colors. Very grateful, I will keep on using this.

Awesome app, I love the finger print feature, I can keep my nosey friends out if it 😂. Weirdly it's nice doing this it helps for some reason. 3 things, can u add a pattern or code along with the fingerprint. Also when it asks how I felt throughout the day can you add other because I'm not necessarily feeling any of those. Btw I'm really upset about how I need premium to look at my stats, to see how I've been doing over the course of a week or month or even year shouldn't need to be paid for 😔

It's really nice to be able to journal on my phone because I can do it on the go. Sometimes I don't always have a journal on me and it's nice to have somewhere where it's formatted nicely and it makes me feel calm. I also like how it asks a daily question to get your mind off things.

This app is amazing and really helps me to reflect on my day and look back at the crazy things I've done. I've found that writing on this app has made happier because if I don't have someone to talk to then I always have reflectly to talk to which is awesome and it's basically an online diary. I just wish the premium didn't cost money. Keep it up! (in some of the ads on Instagram it says its a self dating app but it's not)

Its ok. However, I think that the developers need to pay more attention to the reviews. Theres seems to be repetitive issues concerning the premium version, and reading reviews, there often seems to be a lack of communication on the developers part. Premium version aside, I like the app. It's easy, simplistic, and a safe space to vent.

I enjoy it so far! I've always wanted to keep a diary, but I get bored of them and end up stopping after about a week of it. With this app, however, I feel excited to write about my day even if it was bad, because I enjoy all the little features in it. I've got the free membership too, and it doesn't feel like I'm lacking anything from the app in any way. The little reminders you get on your phone are great, too!

I really appreciate what this app does or can do for you but it's been really frustrating not ever getting the afternoon alert to write at the end of the day because it stopped sending them after the first 7 days. I want to keep up with this app but I have an attention span of a goldfish and I forget to write without the alarm. I even tried changing the time for it to see if it just needed a refresh plus the original alarm did tend to be just a smidge too late for me and still nothing.

I actually signed up for this app. I tried to log in and delete it. It said I doubt have seen account. So I didn't think anything of it. They charged my account for a year anyway. I do not have access to anything and cannot find a customer service. This is a scam to steal money!! Aaaand I can't even figure out how to cancel it!!! WHATEVER YOU DO, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!

Astonishing. It truly is. I use it whenever I start pondering things in my head and I look back at some older things I wrote. It really does make you reflect and the way it is set up is very smart. It questions you and other stuff. I recommend it, and it is just all around not too bad of an app. I didn't want to give what the app is away but definitely different.

Actually a neat app. Makes me feel better to write down my daily activities and feelings. Update: still love this app but does need more options for emotions and things. Also, if I missed writing about a day I can't go back to that day and write about it. It does let me on a couple days from a while ago but not like the day before. Why is this and can we fix it? I try to write every day but if I miss a day I would like to go back and fix it.

Honestly so far this app is terrible. I thought this was going to be almost like a journal where I could write down what I'm feeling, like log that your anxious and stressed but don't know why, then it would pop up like hey, this causes this, but no. You can log one thing at a time, you don't write anything, the questions you ask are so basic. How was your day choose one. Why? Choose one. Then it says hey Samantha, from today it's downhill to the weekend Is that supposed to make me feel good?

This app is great for telling something bad that happens. You can make your own story of what happened in the day and it gives you arrive for it. I sucks that you have to pay for mood tracker, but when it's free it's better. I've only just downloaded it and half my feelings are expressed. Would recommend

I love this app! It's really fitting for me as well because I don't seem to have time, or I just don't have the inspiration to keep a journal. But Reflecty makes it easier and fun! You also don't need to get the membership to have a good experience, which really annoyed me with other apps. TL;DR: Love the app, would reccomend!

Great way to vent out on how you felt. My only problem is that I try to make my account secured and it wouldn't let me. I've tried multiple times and it would keep saying 'something went wrong during signup. Please try again.' but yet I've tried many times. I'm not sure if I have to make a sign up offer. If so, why give the option to not if you aren't allowed to make an account? I an stuck on trying to make and account. Please send a message if you think you know what's going on.

This app is great is you want something to vent to about your bad days and good. It asks you a few questions about your day. It lets you write about your day in some questions and if you don't want to write you don't have to. It keep stats about you after you have made 7 stories. If you also want more questions to vent about your day even more to Reflecty (which I don't have yet) you only have to pay very few bucks to get more! It's overall amazing in every way! Totally recommend this app!

I love this app it's awsome, I can jot down my life story's and secrets. The only bad thing about this app is that there is no lock so anyone who goes on the app can read my secrets. I fix that problem by getting another app with a lock. I would recomend but if your looking for an app that has a lock this is not the app for you.

This app is really intuitive. It took a few days to get the idea, but this app has been so helpful to keep me sane through lockdown. I've never been able to commit to a proper journal but reflectly makes it so much easier. I would absolutely recommend it.

For the 4 days I've been using this app its reely great. I just have one problem: I accidentally loged out of my account and forgot my password. I tried to change it but it would just send me back to the beginning of it all (saying your name, making an account). In short, I have fogot my password and can't change it. Please help I reely want my progress back ;(

I love this. It helps me realize that I am not ok all of the time like a say I am. I don't know how, it just does. I usually have "Tea Time" with my friend but when she's busy this is a great alternative. "Tea Time" is when we spill the tea about everyone and everything BTW.

Absolutely amazing! Great function and no lag! It's just like what you see in their ads and you can give your day a title and there is also streaks! This app makes me a little bit more happy and you can change the color of your background and the buttons on there will also be the color of your background. I recommend this to everyone. You should definitely try it out.

I subscribed and then a confirmation was sent to my email. I tried signing in an it kept saying I didn't have the correct password and email. I clicked the button 5 times to have reflectly send me a new password and they never sent me a new password to log in. So I canceled my subscription within the first 24 hours of getting the app. It says you get 7 days free. It's STILL going to charge me $30. It's a scam!!!! Don't fall for it!!!!!

Good app. Just if someone with depression and anxiety wish to use as a tool to help keep track on progress you have to pay for it. I don't understand why such a helpful app has to be so much to get all the strategies tips and daily reminders and tracking progress. I may as well Google inspirational quotes and write my own diary. People spend enough on psychologist and psychiatrist just for this stuff. Why would you spend more. And why should you create an app to exploit the desperation for help

I love this app a lot because it helps me keep my thoughts contained and such but I have trouble remembering to write things down and the app itself doesn't send me notifications till I open the app and I can't seem to figure out how to fix the notification settings? May be a me issue in all honesty! I also have a few issues with the statistics, the ratings were kind of unclear to me and I'd love a little extra info on what it tracks or something especially because stats are a premium thing!

The app was good for when I get into fights and arguments with friends and family, I enjoyed using Reflectly. I think they could add more opportunities to explain what you may have done wrong, and what you could do next time. That's why I did 4 stars! ♥️ but great job! Keep up the great work! 🥰🌹

I love this app and I understand how in order for them to make money without adds they have to get people to pay for something, but I wish there was a way that I could see my stats without paying money for it. Otherwise, I love this app and it is great for venting too and helping me feel better. I love how reflectly helps me think about myself and ways to treat myself better, which is much more than a regular journal ever could. I would give 5 stars if it was free to look at your growth.

It's an amazing app that gets you into the habit of expressing yourself. I hate handwritten journals because my hands cramp easy. Typing or using the speech to text option helps me reconnect with myself. Some bugs and some things I would've added. But it's money well spent in my opinion.

Ok, so. Some issues have occurred and, it seems like a good idea for this app to work out some bugs. I've been writing about this and that, making a little notes about my day and I'll make a tiny mistake and it will make half of the paragraph disappear. Ive been frustrated at this occurrence, I plan on still giving this app the chance it deserves, but honestly if you could possibly try to fix this, I would be forever grateful for this. Also, it didn't let me save my notes but maybe it's just me.

I'm really loving this app the extra question surprisingly always go with what my day was about its not like other journal apps even on the basic plan I'm loving just being able to express my day some days you might not right much some days you could write so much good thing for unlimited characters in all get it do yourself a favor and let out what you keep bottled inside into this app

It's actually a pretty good app, but sometimes it just shows Error, unable to save your stories, after you have written them. So, i have lost a lot of writing because of it but otherwise, i totally recommend it.

This app has great potential. Only problem is I can never save my progress because I can't make an account. Everytime I type in my information and hit enter to make the account, it buffers and never goes through.

Absolutely amazing. I downloaded it and made my first story n it is so easy! It has relieve my stress (sort of). My only problem is that I can't read yesterday's story or the day before. I think it's waiting for my story streak?? I don't know. But I recommend this app to people with high stress/anxiety.

I like the format and the idea and in general I like using it. The only downside is the subscription for stats. But I get that they have to make money somehow becuase there are no adds which is totally a plus. But even without the stats it really helps me reflect on my day, and it is a very healthy habits to have to remember to do this at the end of every day before bed. I think it's a really good way to wind down and clear my mind. The other thing is that there is a word limit without premium.

It is a really calming app and it would keep my day locked up in one place, this app is like a person having a conversation with me and allowing me to let out what has happened during the day. I would definitely recommend this app to any age since I'm only 11 and enjoying this app for just 2 days of experience!

AWSOME! I love this app soooooooooo much! It seems like I really do have some one to talk to. Reflectly asks questions to me, but if I feel like it is too personal, I don't have to answer! I highly recomend this to anyone who just wants a person (or robot in this case) to talk to. Reflectly is (not to quote disney or anything) practically perfect in every way!

This app is really good to help to reflect on good, bad, stressful, and okay days. I use this app everyday since I have no one to rant about to. This app promises you a friend to talk to, thank you Reflecty! You don't have to get subscriptions to make yourself feel better. This app may be the one app to stop me from ending it🥰

Its a really good app and I really reccomend it for students, after all of their stress they go through in school, but genuinely just for anyone suffering with stress, anxiety, depression and need to reflect on themselves. But I would have given this 5 stars if they didnt have to make things premium, it would be much for people who might struggle with financial problems if you just made it so you could maybe level up and earn new parts/chapters of this app. Overall it is a good app so try it!

Reflectly is quite simply an amazing app. Now normally I don't rate apps 5 stars because that seems like something to be reserved for the best of the best but this is! I don't want to blabber on because that would make me bored but I highly suggest you download this! Trust me it might even make you feel more happier

Great app, worth the buy - there are improvement opportunities. I downloaded this app on a whim one day to document my thoughts and feelings. It does exactly that! It's a great way to visualise your mood and it has plenty of daily questions to help think about the bigger picture. The only disappointments are that I thought the app contained an AI that learnt your mood patterns, and I do not recieve a notification on my device for the daily morning motivation messages. Overall, great app!!

I love it! It's so amazing. The only bad thing is you can't really do a lot unless you get premium ( Costs - monthly: 7.49 yearly: 19.99 lifetime: 199.99. Other than that it's awesome and I definitely recommend it!

I think it was quite good, the thing was I didn't think you were supposed to write a story. I thought it was supposed to be games or health and calming down music and talking/texting Reflecty and pretend to be friends, not just writing about our day was.

Honestly love this app, I'm not a huge journalist but I do find myself feeling better after writing things down. It easy to use , I can wip my phone out whenever I want to instead of writing in a real journal. Reflectly encourages and sends positive message. They also ask some questions that get you thinking

I feel so pissed off right now! For the third time I have lost everything I wrote because I accidentally touched the button to exit the app. Why isn't there a draft option that saves what you wrote and allows you to continue if this happens. This is a payed app focused on emotional support? You're kidding me! I can't be bothered to rewrite every thought again. Believe me, you're better off just writing in color note.

From A-Z honestly I love it so much. But one thing im mad of was I can't restore what I've deleted. It's an accident. Thought it was for the cover picture but turns out it wasn't. I lost my long paragraphs and had to retype them. Anyway, dont worry I hope u add on restore what have been deleted that's all. Thx

Reflecty is an awesome app and it helped me to see that I had some toxic friendships. It has made me realize that my depression and much more. You can rate your day and the reason your day was good or bad. Also it has an option for personal questions to be asked to you. This is very helpful and I would recommend it. 5 star review.

I love the app! I just wish I could see the stats and stuff for free but I understand the reasons! I also wish we could add our own moods and activities and keep them there. Or rename the moods because some times bad doesn't explain it well enough. (just ideas. I love the app. 💙)

I tried premium. I was expecting some in depth daily questions. It just asks how was your day, what made it that way, how you felt, and then lets you explain. Along with the that options to pick for everything is very broad - for example happy, lucky, sad. Neeps more depth. All things you could very easily just journal yourself. It has one question at the end that's different everyday but it felt very random (maybe they get more specific as you go). I find it not very useful or introspective.

Great app. It's really helping me get through Quarantine, and I feel like I can actually write and not feel like a cool knowing others will see it. Happy I finally looked for apps to help me. Best app so far that I've found. I would definitely recommend to others who are struggling.

Please don't use this app if you value your time and money. I've paid for this app, and it keeps telling me that I don't have it purchased. I update the app, and its asking me to sign in, and I can't. I don't recall even making an account originally, so if you can do that first then please do. I've lost my journals and my money and the developers are yet to respond to my issue.. But I'll be happy to rate this better if they fix this as multiple people have had the same issue.

It is awesome it helps keep yourself happy and let your emotions out my only complaint is that when you make a category you only get 12 characters and this is especially good for the stay home policy for the covid-19 outbreak / pandemic and it's good for when in quarantine, I love.it!♥️♥️

I like the idea of the app. I like it's relaxing ui design aswell but it feels like a task to get this done everyday and I have to pay more to do what I actually wanted to do - journaling - in that case, I should just buy a journal. But don't get me wrong, it's still a good app and I like the idea of it.

I think it is a very good idea. It is nice to have a journal that is easier to use than carrying an actual journal. I dont really like that we have to pay for full access but I dont really mind because even if you dont use full access you still got to make your stories and you get the basics of it. This is a very good app and I think that it is a very good idea and I hope this really helps some people!

It's been okay. There's a few times where I've been unable to go forward when writing an entry for the day making me need to write it again. Also I'd prefer it if there was a 'just okay' option for how the day was, because that's how most of my days are, not completely great, but not completely terrible, just okay. Maybe it's just me but I feel rather forced into making a loaded decision with only those options. Other than that it's a good app.

This has actually been a great help to me and my anxiety just being able to write all the day down in a short form or even long form allowing me to get things off my chest in a safe place is better than anything. I haven't been using it very long however it has been a great help in the time I have. Even at college I can Express what's happened before my anxiety raise higher than I can control and things helps control it.

Reflecty helps me organize my thoughts and is a calming journal app to use. It also asks daily positive questions, asks how your day was and let's you put titles on everyday entries 😁🙂. This app is a wise app for those who need a diary or journal to elaborate on each day. You don't have to write each day (it's optional).

I really like it! I get to express my thoughts freely without any limit of words. Its really helpful for short Journaling. I like the customization of every entry! You can add pictures, write small or big notes. Its really great and i think its good for everyday use!😊💜

It won't even let me log back into my account! I know what email I used, and I'm pretty sure i know my password. But when I put both in to log back in, it doesn't let me, and when I choose to redo my password it says that the account doesn't exist.

It helps me cope with stress so far because of online school work. I can pour all of my problems here and sort everything out while writing! The only problem I have to give this a 4 star is everytime I try to go to a different section in my writing, it freezes the screen or my writing so I have to exit and come back. It doesn't sound like a big deal, but if you wrote a lot and that happens, you are screwed! Please fix my problem and I will give a 5 star.

I love doing this app as a part of my nightly routine. As a person that has a lot in my head yet not a lot to say, I love being able to put everything I think about in the story's I write every night. It really helps to get it out of my head and stop driving me so crazy. Personally feel this app deserves 5 stars hands down :)

I started to really like this app. It was a great way to write about my day. I waited an entire week of using this app to unlock stats and it said you had to have premium. It didn't warn us in advance, it popped up as soon as I had made 7 stories. I can't decide if I want to keep the great journal part, or uninstall it.

This is a very good app. The GPS is quite accurate. I use it for walking which sends to work well. A few things that let it down. The audio cures are very slow and very long interrupting music all the time. It is currently only possible to use Spotify of Google's music app to listen. It would be great if Audible could be integrated add I like to listen to audio books while or and about.

OMG. I am loving this training for first 5K. Loads of prompts from the running/training coach. The whole plan seems to take forever to progress which feels a little frustrating as you can see the end run getting closer and closer and you feel like your not progressing.Then suddenly and without any warning, you realise how well you have progressed. You just nailed 5K without realising it. What a rush. Then you start playing with the challenges and pushing harder, eager to get out. Brilliant app.

Like a lot of people this app Keeps stopping for 4 days in a row. Now I have to cancel and find myself a dependable app. Which I really hate because I I really liked this only. But it's very frustrating when your running and about a mile in it stops tracking once again. I don't see any apps that I like out there. But your not dependable anymore so what can you do. Really miss your app. New app isn't that good. Please fix this app. I hope your fixing this app I'm losing my patience with these oth

I've been using this app for *years* (and have recommended it to everyone i know!) and it has been great! However, over this entire month, it doesn't track my runs. It now, consistently, tracks the first .9mi. of my run then loses gps.(!😣). Upon looking at the comments here, i see that I'm not the only one experienceing this. Is there any fix for this? I'd hate to uninstall this and start using another app.

Been using this app for years. However, lately, the app stops tracking my run after a few tenths of a mile, and records the end of the session without advising. I notice a few tenths later and have to start a new session. Very frustrating. If not resolved, I'll have to go to another app. Otherwise, I would give the app a 5.

Since the latest update my GPS won't get a signal, been like this a week (Google Maps works fine with GPS) tried clearing cache, data, and re-installing add well as reset phone. Makes the app useless, please fix. Been using it for years. Power saving was off, I tried deleting apps 1 at a time and it started working eventually so I think the GPS can be effected by some apps ( it could pick up the satellites but not stopping enough to get a location, but Google Maps has always been accurate)

I downloaded this app because it was recommended by my runner friends to replace the tracking app I was using. I used it on a run and it worked great and was way better than I was expecting. Went to use it the very next day and the app crashes and will not even open. 🤷‍♀️ I'd love to have this app be usable. I'll change my review if that happens.

The app tracks well once it gets going but for some reason even though the timer starts immediately and the GPS shows good signal, the distance and speed tracker take ages to kick in. You have to keep turning it on and off until it works. Very frustrating. Once it's on it tracks the route well and provides good information and a nice detailed route map.

Been using for years. The last month or so it keeps losing track right away after 0.3 or 0.7 miles. Very frustrating trying to restart the app while running and still doesn't work a lot of times. I've tried deleting cache, and data, and restarting and still I have these issues. Unfortunately I think I will have to look for a new app and start over on tracking my progress. Please fix this quick.

Long time user and love the app but now it stops tracking by itself and completes the activity and you have no idea. I followed the advice of support by first clearing cache and then uninstall/reinstall which worked for a bit and then problem returned so cleared cache and data and reinstalled. Today is stopped after less than a quarter mile. Time to start looking for a new app. 😔

Very good app for running. Keeps you motivated and has sufficient statistics to gauge yourself. Of late have identified a bug, if an activity is paused, the timer in the background continues, the entire display is paused but when you resume the activity, if the workout duration has completed during the pause, it says workout complete wheres the workout had been paused.

App does OK so far but will probably uninstall. There's no way to adjust the voice feedback volume. This means that the voice feedback is like four times louder than music. No way to edit time either after a workout, so if you forget to stop the timer immediately afterwards you can't take off a few seconds to get correct splits.

I have been using this app for years. Recently it stopped connecting to GPS, but allowed me to continue without GPS. Stopped tracking miles mid run. And now I cannot even connect at all.
