I'm trying to track runs for my virtual runs and I cannot get in at all. Without this app,, I have no other way to track runs unless i download another app. With that said, when this app is working correctly, I can see my runs, compare times, get coaching, get times per mile during runs. All for free. No ads.

I was really excited for this app and would love to give it 5 stars. Unfortunately, it stopped working after 2 days. I got it working and has been working great and this is one of the greatest apps I have used. The Asics trainer talking you through the run and reminds you to keep posture and even teaches you the basics and other tips on how to improve. It really is great. And the connection issue I found was on just about every running app but hope that it continues to work

Just starting but this thing is great. Customizable to show you the exact deets you want to see. For a beginner, it's an easy beginning to track my walks. I am hopeful that I will eventually be able to track runs a d run speeds. It even has a shoe tracker to see how many miles you've put on specific shoes. User friendly and intuitive, it's great app that has become a daily for me.

I am 60 years young, hard of hearing and went for a walk today...my daughter Christina said "you can use your Runkeeper app to track your walk". I did not realizing my back pocket would be talking to me...this is big I usually can't hear well outside! Keep up the great work and thank you! D F.

I've been using this app for 3 years (I have 101 activities!). But from the last update I can't open the app. It's just crushed every time. I tried to reinstall as well. Nothing work. Please fix it! I have a training in the app, I don't want to lose the further days. (Honor 8) After I'm gonna change my review back.

Been a great app for the last year but as soon as I paid to upgrade to run keeper Pro a few days ago, I've had nothing but issues with using/accessing my training programme and even the basic function of just tracking a normal run. App keeps closing down on me almost as soon as I open it now. Hope it can be fixed as I've really enjoyed using this app.

very easy to use, anytime I can't find anything I ask my friend who has it and it's easily explained where to find things. (if you're like me and can't easily figure out things yourself XD) I have no real goal in mind but seeing my progress is motivating enough to keep pushing for more, why set a goal when so many of us use them as limits?? Thanks RunKeeper!

The new update sucks...I've been using Runkeeper since 2014 and loved it....with the new update, my last to runs just stop randomly. I'm training for my next half marathon and it didn't record my 10 mile run...so made!!! Please fix this! And of course I just renewed my annual subscription. 4/29/20 update and new rating: Runkeeper emailed me with some suggestions to help with the kinks, but the suggestions didn't help. BUT, I was very happy that a new update on the app came out! It worked!

With the new update, the app crashes upon opening. I went under app settings and allowed permissions for contacts, location, and storage and now it works fine. I really like this app and am glad I got it to work again although I'm surprised it didn't automatically ask for certain permissions!

I've used this app for years and loved it. However, it recently crashed on my phone and I cannot get it to work anymore. Despite multiple attempts to get help from the app makers, I've been left high and dry. If I can't get any help, I think I'll be forced to move on from Runkeeper and promote someone else's product.

App works well. It is free. Popup suggestions for features and the pro plan are a little annoying. I don't know how private it is which isn't thrilling. If the app is responsible with my data they should put more effort into communicating that to users so they probably aren't as responsible/ethical as they could be.

I first got the RunKeeper it was doing great tracking all my runs walks whatever I did now the last few weeks it just keeps losing GPS and it just stops I don't know what the hell's going on so I download another app you need to do something to this to fix it just keeps shutting down was a good app but not anymore !!!

Have used for years and have LOVED it. In the past week it has stopped tracking for no reason. Odd and upsetting, especially when I use it to record time and distance. So bumped it to 4 stars. Hoping it will suddenly work correctly again! Now on second reboot and clearing of all data, cache, etc. 🤞🤞🤞

For a free running app (if you stick to bas8c version like me) the offers everything you need, distance, time, splits and calories. And there's an.option to pay for more comprehensive data comparing past runs if you need to (so far I haven't got d that necessary). Very satisfied!

I have really enjoyed this app. I'm now on week 3, and have paid the subscription. However for the last two workouts it keeps cutting out and although I do the activity required anyway it is not unlocking the workout for me so I can move forward. I would be very grateful if this could be resolved.

This so far is the best running/cycling/distance tracking app I've come across. The distance tracking is pretty darn accurate and the ability to set intervals is awesome. Also it can give 5 minute reports while you on your trek and it tempo pauses your music or audio book and then it comes right back. That is one of my favorite parts. Would highly recommend

It seems like I'm one of many people who have used this app for years without issues until recently. It now stops tracking and loses GPS at the same mileage point every run and I am unable to close out of the app, and the timer continues to run. Hopefully this issue can get fixed as I do enjoy this app!

This app is terrible. Used to work well for me so I decided to redownload it. Cuts out and stops tracking after not even a km. Sucks when I'm trying to track long runs and I can't tell what my progress is. Don't recommend at all. Find another one that will track a whole run

This is my favorite running application. I use it track all of my running and hiking activities. It's accurate but I think its Mostly dependant on your phones GPS. My favorite feature is the voice over stats you get as you're running. Keeps me on track.

Starting using this app in 2016. Loved it. Took a year off and recently starting using it again this month. Loses GPS after 1 min and never gets it back. Tried uninstalling and reinstalling but no change. Guess it is time to find an app that actually works...

Like a few other people, GPS has recently stopped working. Also I've connected runkeeper to garmin so I can use Garmin to track activities but still link to my runkeeper training plan. For some reason runkeeper shows the splits differently from Garmin so the numbers are completely we wrong.

Amazing 5 k training program, really motivating and encouraging to achieve my goals.Love listening to the trainer Erin, she really pushes me to my limits! Only thing I would improve is the layout of the run summary I find it bit confusing but beside that perfect run tracking app.👌

The app is not completely comprehensive for me and I wish there was a way to edit the distance after saving because I never seem to stop the app right when I'm done with my workout and it skews the data a bit. Overall a good app.

Has been great for years. Now, won't even open. Need app to complete a RunBet challenge, so really not happy that it is not working after restarting phone and uninstalling and reinstalling the app repeatedly. Will change review if fixed.

Have been using this app for many months and loved it, simple to use and like the info it tracks however yesterday it started closing as soon as I open it so it is useless. Really don't want to uninstall then reinstall because I will lose all my activities

I have used this app for years. It enhances my running experience. Tracks my miles. My pace. Tells my weekly, monthly and yearly progress. Plus it has kept record of my miles from the first day until now.
If you love your app to crash frequently, this is the one for you. Garbage. What good is a run keeper if it can't keep your run? Plenty of other good free apps that don't crash all the time.

Good so far, except for one situation. I was running my best 5k and the app shut down mid 4k. I almost threw my phone across the field. But understandable no apps are 100% efficient. Other than that the app is pretty cool.
I've seen some of the other remarks and I have been experiencing the same. I have to stop my ru and restart. It crashes. I am hoping this gets fixed. Been using for years and really like if it works.
As of most recent update, app crashes immediately after launch. Cache clearing, force quit, and phone restart don't help. (Up until now, it worked quite well, but app is unusable at the moment.)
App has been a great running companion for many years now, but of late the app keeps crashing after less than a kilometer. Not sure why. Have updated regularly but still a problem.
I love this app - however for no apparent reason it is no longer working. Will not open at all, I have restarted the device and uninstalled and reinstalled multiple times and it will not open.
Usually I love this app, but the last few times I used it, it wouldn't work! I was really disappointed cuz I did full runs/hikes and all my data was not recorded. Maybe a glitch?

As soon as I paid for the upgraded version it stopped tracking my progress. Even while I had the app open it would show the time being kept but no steps/pace/calorie count, super disappointing. I'll be deleting it and trying something else
I've done 2 workouts and the app didn't record the distance walked. I tried going to the settings and couldn't find anything related to getting that working. Please Help me with this issue.
Suddenly stopped working after years of use. I've really enjoyed this app but now it keeps closing. I reinstalled, but it didn't help. Very disappointed. Prior I would have given it 5 stars.
Have used it for years and I loved it. Last fee weeks, it keeps crashing during long runs. It is very frustrating. Will have to look for another app if this issue is not resolved soon.
Crashes all the time. Tried uninstalling and reinstalling which fixed it for 2 days, but back to crashing again. Contacted customer service a week ago and no response. When it works, its great.
The app was great to use when it worked. Unfortunately, today I can't open it without it closing and giving me an error message. I uninstalled it, reinstalled it, and restarted my phone.

Just used this app again after taking a break. It crashed trying to finalize the run, and now the app crashes instantly upon loading. I see it updated 2 days ago, did something go wrong with the update? Using Galaxy S10.

Tried signing up, can't get past the registration page because the field where I'm supposed to fill in my date of birth refuses to respond to anything I press. And it's "mandatory information" so I can't get past it
Been using this app for years. Love it. When we have finished our walks the other walkers are always asking how did it go. Like the option to add a photo to the walk summary.
Been having a TERRIBLE time with this APP! It stays on for 5 minutes or so then just stops!!! It doesnt matter if my Data is on or off...it has never acted this way...What is Up?!?!?

App was good until latest update. Now it stops mid run and freezes the distance although everything else continues to run. I have uninstalled and re- installed several times. About to give up using it.

Used for a long time. Works well but cuts off runs or stops getting GPS pings. Since Jan it has stopped showing splits and ave min per mile on completed runs. 4/23 Update now the app keeps crashing when I open it.

I love this app after trying adidas runtastic and strava.. I just want time, distance and map.. and this works.. the others don't work for me. I would avoid the 5km challenge though unless you want non stop talking.
It's good when it works. It has been stopping in every Walk and Run. So it does not keep all the miles I'm doing. It simply stops whenever in the middle of the workout.
App keeps dropping out so when I end my walk, it hasn't recorded anything. Worked fine for years, tried uninstalling and reinstalling and still doing the same thing.

Walking and Running make all the fitness problems away...Like I have never been using a fitness app for long run...and this app I think I will recommend to everyone...it's too good....👍Some credit goes to this app too for my fitness❤
I have used the app for years and have loved it, but recently it will stop counting the miles at some point. It will continue to count the time the activity has been going on.
Tracking is fine, but the audio stat volume is stupid loud. I can't figure out how to turn it down without turning down all the volumes.
Great motivation, great tracking, great app. The only reason to that I didn't give it 5 stars is because there is no way to integrate my play list
App is now unable to track my location. I used it for almost 10 years and now it stopped working. Please fix the bug and I will change my rating to a 5 star.
I like this better than MapMyRun (MMR). MMR was randomly dropping my mileage while running, so i wasn't getting correct stats. Its super easy to understand and maneuver around in.

The app crashes all the time, and unless I keep my phone in my hand and touch the screen constantly to keep it "awake" it records nothing. Not exactly ideal for running! An older version of this worked fine mostly, but now enough is enough and I'm going to delete in order to find something more stable. It's a shame because I did like this app.

I have been using and enjoying this app for the last number of years however, the app seems to have lost somehow the connection to my GPS. This means that I have no stats for my runs and makes the app pointless. It would be great to hear from the developers if they have any suggestions to resolve this issue so I could go back enjoying this app again.
Gangsta app. GPS is accurate. Rates four stars as I did have it stop working for a short period of time which made me consider other products. Overall I recommend this app.
