The milage never works when returning the truck. I got overcharged once and it was a app issue.

Garbage app. Waste of time. It kept asking me for my street address with no place to populate it. Then when we went to pick up the truck, it took forever to verify my information only to be told my driver's license was too damaged and that I would need a live representative

App has promise but the checkin process was frustrating. My camera was taking clear pictures but the app seems to downgrade the quality. Had to retake my picture several times but they kept getting rejected, until I gave up and checked in person.

Beautiful app but it doesn't show or associate orders so is useless, very frustrating, and a complete waste of time! Couldn't return item using app nor website! Website: Website is broken; use app. App: app is broken; use website.

Strongly suggest going old school and dealing with the humans on site until the app quality and reliability improves. Truck pickup took almost an hour due to app issues. The app required photos of damage not already documented but when the 'Add Photo' button was clicked, nothing happened after the first photo was added but the app complained that 'photos are required' so I was caught in an endless loop. What's more is that the owners of the business where I picked up my truck reservation were completely unfamiliar with the app and confessed to never having even opened the app which means U-Haul has missed a golden opportunity to gain feedback from their on-site experts. Furthermore, once I started using the app, the onsite staff were unwilling to assist me since everything done through the app is handled by "dispatch" and apparently "dispatch" and sites don't / can't communicate. Broken process. My drop off on New Years day (site unstaffed as would be expected) went okay - fortunately, the required photos uploaded without issue. However, another customer attempting to pick up could not get the app to give him an access code to the key lockbox so that he could retrieve his rental truck key. This smacks of an outsourced app development where no business analysts or knowledgeable domain experts were involved in the design or quality/usability testing.

App design is good and would have gotten five stars, if only it worked consistently. Would to go to a spinning circle of pergatory again and again, and had to fight with it for about 45 minutes just to reserve the truck. On check-in, it would not take it upload photos like it was supposed to.

Garbage app. Half the time it doesn't even log in. I have to uninstall, reinstall and try again until it finally accepts my log-in credentials. Not reliable at all. As someone said in a previous review: if you're going to replace human interaction with an app, at least make it reliable.

Seriously, not user friendly AT all... I had to walk back and forth around the whole lot, just to walk back into the office to get the key... SO many steps to follow, this would have just been so much easier to do in person than on the app. No convenience, no value.

Could not log in through the app to check out the truck. It took about 20 minutes on the phone to get the truck checkout process going. All told it took about 40 minutes to get a truck and had to re- enter data that I had previously submitted to arrange the reservation. However, I have to say that the two people in customer service that helped me were among the best I have ever dealt with, for any company. But the app still needs work.

Garbage app. Won't let you take photos when asked. Wasted nearly an hour of my time dealing with the app problems which took away from my truck rental time. Should have skipped mobile checkin and talked to the people inside.

Does not want to load anything at the Uhal location making it next to impossible to use the app to access the reserved truck. Thank goodness the app eventually loaded, or else we'd be screwed. If you're going to replace personal interaction with an app, please at least make sure your app works.
Very weak servers. It was much worse than trying to apply for unemployment. When I would use the app, it would not load up to order the uhaul. It wasted an hour of my time

Can't find a location. The whole reason I install this app was to find local U-Haul offices and to check if they sold propane. There's a U-Haul right across the street from me and it doesn't come up on the map, this was a waste of time!
lots of problems, confusing instructions, unable to document truck damage, almost empty tank (by design) unpleasant experience

App lets you book trucks at locations that do not have inventory. Always call and book directly with the pickup location. App also frequently cannot find my orders and cannot associate my orders (that feature has never worked for me).
Only because I can't give zero stars, it got one. I upgraded to an S10+ and the app does not respond and crashes. I have to go through a browser to access my account.

50% it's down and you cant pickup or drop off something. No, I dont want all your extras. How many times do you have to decline this... oh please add your contact information and your drivers license 3 times and after that your credit card information.

App locked up, then refused to upload photos after verification. App finished checkout on forced shutdown w/o letting me verify mileage or damage. Charged me 3000+ miles on a 25 mi in-town trip. Had to dispute and still got overcharged 10 miles (nearly 40% extra) despite all photo documentation saved on my phone and given to Uhaul. Not worth it to dispute further for the 10 dollars extra I payed, but I never should have had to deal with any of this in the first place. Won't ever use again.
This app sucks. If you try to contest status of equipment at pickup you need to provide a photo... which the app then will not let you do. Kinda pointless...

I tried 5 times to get a pass word in and it kept saying they didnt match. Tried another password and it continued saying "dont match" . I quit after not being able to do this.

This is the worst app. It doesn't work. To make matters worst your forced to use it if you don't want to be ripped off for $20 if the employee checks you in. Twice I had to go home to get my wife's phone and go back to UHaul to return a trailer using this app. This app deserves a -5 (minus) star review.
Can't log in to the app. Going to stick to using the website.

Fix your damn backend. Nothing is working how it should and user experience-wise some selections should not require the app to "are you sure" in order to proceed. Get it together Uhaul. And you still owe me $50.

Not recommend to a friend has nothing to do with the location, but uhaul as a company. From the reservation system, to the app, to the rental, to the return. The availability of rentals is not accurate and could display alternatives to desired rentals. Whether it be a truck, location, or return location. Returning a rental through the app is actually bugged.
Easier to go in person, app had me walking back and forth from the office to vehicle.real pain

The app never helped with the process, failed at every step, and showed inaccurate information the whole time. I don't really give 1-star reviews, but this is obsolete. Give it a try, sure, but go to their website if it gives you trouble. *edit: adding a star because, though the process was buggy, it DID appear to create an account.

24/7 pickup doesn't work. Stood outside truck in freezing rain for 45 min only to get repeatedly denied. Had to give up and call uber to take me back home, what a monumental waste of time. No person to speak with for support, just a buggy and useless chat.

Useless. I stood in the rain for 15 minutes trying to just get past the first step getting the selfie reviewed. It never progressed to taking pictures of my license. I tried the chat and they said to log out of the app and back in. I did. It still didn't work. I gave up and went to the desk. I should have just done that in the first place and skipped the terrible app process. Total waste of time. The desk people were super helpful and FAST. Better luck next time, U-Haul.

The app's location service never works. It crashes frequently. Especially when doing a return. Maybe it is designed that way so Uhaul can charge the additional $20 in convenience fee to customers. I have paid it 3 times already. When contacted they give you the excuse that other customers are able to do it. Something that you can never verify. Full of bugs! Not recommended at all. Grading F-

This experience has been nerve racking..it has now been over an hour sitting by the truck to be rented..called and got hung up on..sent email got auto message..cant get any assistance..before using app try visiting in person.

Doesn't send verification code or find my location.

Like many others have mentioned, I had a LOT of difficulty being able to actually pick up the truck. I was expecting to just drive up to the lot, open my phone with my GPS on, click "I'm here" or something like that and get the truck. But in actuality I wasted a whole hour on this app going through a lot of verification steps (take a photo of yourself, take a photo of your driver's license front and back, fill out a bunch of contact info, etc). I couldn't figure out why they needed me to drive to the truck and sit in the car on my phone filling out this complex registration - I would have much rather done that a week before from my warm office when I first reserved the truck than on my phone in the cold on the day of a stressful move. Also as others mentioned, every step of the verification was followed by several minutes of waiting before the app ended up crashing. Upload your photo - wait 5 minutes, then the app crashes! Repeat for the next photo, and the next, and the next. Quite frustrating. Finally I got to the last step called "Reviewing Application" which I was never able to get to finish loading. After trying for 15 minutes on that step alone I started calling customer support but I never got through to anyone. They have a "chat with us" option in the app, but no one answered. All told, I spent an hour waiting in the cold for this app to work. I ended up having to wait until the hardware store where the truck was at finally opened up and I got a human to help. Trusting this app was a major mistake and waste of time on a day when I was trying to move to a new house and had little time to spare.

The website doesn't work properly because they want to force you to download this app. Then, when you finally have to download it, certain required features don't work. When it required me to take a photo of the gas gauge, I couldn't press the button for attaching or taking pictures. It took around 35 minutes of standing next to a truck with my phone just to finally rent it, and all because of this dysfunctional app.

Pretty useless. I installed this to drop off a truck after hours, but it couldn't find any record of me ever renting anything, past or present. Of course, the texted link never worked either, so it may have been a system issue, but it was very frustrating. I ended up having to drop it off and call first thing in the morning.

OBVIOUS APP ISSUES, attempted to download FIVE (5) times to no avail. All I wanted to do today was to use the app to make reservations to have a trailer hitch installed. As far as using the UHAUL app, in my opinion it's technology is very outdated to say the least. I've ALWAYS had problems when trying to utilize their app. I'm always having to make that time consuming phone call to ensure my business which sets the professional tone with me from the start unfortunately.

Used app to return a trailer, it took 4 tries to complete the process. Very slow response, app locks up and had to be restarted. Return process fails and kicks the user back to the starting point. Very annoying when your tiring to return an open trailer and it's raining and freezing cold outside. Not very customer friendly or respectful of my time. I'm glad to over of the agency too care of this for more the first time I used them.
Nothing about this app is working right now.

The user interface is good, but there is not enough horsepower on the back end servers to handle peak hours. I experienced numerous apparent API timeouts because I was attempting a pickup on a Saturday morning. The same lack of responsiveness was experienced by the store owner on the web. Invest in more hardware on the back end and you can dramatically improve customer service times and make more money.

I used this app to rent a truck outside of my local rental office's business hours. The idea of the app is convenient however it took over 30 minutes to get it to accept the photos I was required to take. I unfortunately didn't think it necessary to put on makeup to move furniture. The app disagreed since I had makeup on in my DL photo. Apparently, taking photos outside, at dusk, without makeup was impossible for the app to verify. Basically, ugly girls can't rent trucks so bring your makeup.

I have seen middle schoolers develop more technologically competent and impressive apps. Uhaul's developers seem to fundamentally lack understanding of the ideas of optimization and load times. They seem to have no idea how to design a competent user interface. Instead you are left with an app that is hard to use, confusing with no clear path to completion and slow as molasses. Somehow this glorified web app managed to take up 30 megabytes of space on my phone. It's impressive how bad it is.

Worthless. I've been renting trailers and large moving trucks frequently. Created an account on the app to reserve a trailer. I created my profile including address, billing info, vehicle info, everything needed to rent a trailer. Cant view past orders, and after reserving a trailer thru the app, no confirmation and never received an email. Even the dealer has problems every time I rent and have to set me up as a new customer. Glitches galore, and after all the trouble, what's the purpose?

Painful to use. This app is slow and badly laid out. Tries to hide the fact that your pickup location isnt gauranteed. Why cant you just search by location what is availble? The whole thing is backwards. If Im paying 160 dollars for a truck you damn well better be able to tell me where it will be and no, I dont want one 37 mins away when Im trying to move. They did literally everything wrong.

The worst app I have ever used. To select your departure and return you have to scroll through dates by 5 days at a time, clicking each time you get to the end of 5 days. I have flown with them 3 times and they are a great company. Easily would have rated 5 stars if my Xbox headset stayed in my luggage. I will say they were prompt in trying to make it right although it is tough to game chat with airline vouchers.

App includes option to book flight but it doesn't work.
Spirit is my favorite airline but guys, please fix your app. Always super buggy and barely ever works.

Won't display your trips unless you tell it what trips to look for. Why? Won't display points either

So convenient and easy to set up and check in
As is the case with most other reviewers, i find the app non functional.
Bad airline, bad app. Can't even log in. Useless.

You need to use a better driver locater function. On my phone Google maps shows me in the exact parking space yet your app says I'm 0.11 miles away in a field. Funny thing is, there is a Pilot just across the interchange and your app says that I'm 14.0 miles away. This has been going on for a long time I just haven't informed you. As close as I am to the store, your app will not allow me to reserve a shower because it says I must "be on-site". So, I walk 200'to the door, go in and use the kiosk.

Great app make it look like your doing something for the men and women out here without really doing anything. I have fuelled 4 times over 75 gallons, have gone as far as getting a new reward card thinking that was the problem. But no. It does not register any fuel purchases towards the increased points. Thanks for nothing

One of the worst apps I've ever used. Too many times it either can't connect with Flying J or it will just say "Something went wrong. Try again later." Maybe I should get a job doing their apps? I'm not sure I'd know what I'm doing, but I can't do any worse...

As far as the app goes, its great... Now, for as far as the truck stop itself, i rate that a 2... The app has gotten consistently buggy. Enter info for diesel Furniture, enter the code number on the phone, and am, instead, cleared to purchase DEF. At no time did I select DEF. NOBODY can explain this. Unless they fix it, im gonna start usingbthe big red heart guys' app... and fuel...
I love the app. However, in the recent weeks my app is not functioning right. I cannot pull up any rewards and offers. Also...my barcode will not come up. Please fix. Thank you. ☺

App keeps closing down. Won't stay open. Have updated twice. Very annoying. Please fix!! Still closes down when trying to use the find function! Will delete app if not fixed!!

Love the new update it crashed my phone at first but now it seems to be stable again after weeks of not having access. If you ever decide to update again please please do beta testing before just updating.
This app is useless for me lately. It worked fine before but in the last 2 months it is useless. In the past 24hrs everytime I click on any store location the app just closes.
Somerimes it goes back to the map screen after I select a location. Some times. Not nearly close enough to himder the apps efficentcy. Great app!

Fix this stupid app. Everytime I access the fuel location directions app closes....other than that I suggest listing locations close too you on the same interstate or route your driving on in the that same direction closet too furthest away like the TA app

I would have given this app five star rating but the fact that half the time when I pull into places their Wi-Fi isn't strong enough to support this app or I can't connect up to it there's too many problems with this thing that need to be addressed that aren't being addressed properly and it also feels as if some of the drivers that cannot connect to this system are being cheated out of points because they have to refer to the old way

Yep. This is still garbage. Your developers must love taking your money and laughing all the way to the bank. Repeatedly enter your information and get a code. Pump says code is not valid or expired, and you check the app to see everything is reset and the code is gone. Your telling me that you developed something good that "only works when it wants to" according to store staff. Seriously fix it, hire new developers, or dump it.
Needs serious work. Constantly thinks I'm a point mile away and can't mobile fuel. Constant server issues. Fix your broken app guys!!

Not often do I take the time to rate an app. I think this is the only 5 star I've ever given. Reserve a shower from your truck with the push of a single button. It will tell you what shower number and the code to open the door. Reserve a parking spot from your truck. Get up to four points per gallon after 3 fill ups. I mean im to lazy to write all of the awesomeness. I should have downloaded this way earlier....
If you are having trouble, like I was, with the app saying "no store within 100 miles", uninstall and reinstall the app. Worked for me.
Very good app. But I used a fuel card that it doesn't recognize so I can't get the full benefits from it

Been using the app for almost two years now. Works better than it use to, a lot of the errors and issues were fixed. I took two stars off for two reasons. The electronics selection like dashcams and radios is stale. There is better hardware on the market. The second star is for the food. We sit in our trucks all day, we don't need the garbage fat food at all pilot/fj stops. At least offer a healthy alternative than bk, mcd and wend. I've gained almost 30lbs since I've started driving! 🤬

I would only give 1 star, but it does ok when planning for fuel. Be nice if it actually recognized every time I got fuel for points, especially now with the 4 points a gallon thing. You have to first fuel up 5 times with over 75 gallons. I've done that 7 times now, and it only counted 3 of them. So not only am I missing out on the point bonus, I'm not getting my regular points either.
Now more than ever this app benefits the driver. No contact fueling, showers, great deals, rewards are excellent. They are way ahead of the rest of them.
Easy to use. Convenient fueling features for professional drivers. Many discounts and bonuses. Thanks Pilot/ Flying J

Would rate 0 if available. Would be nice if updates actually reflected fixes for the ones experiencing issues with the app. The only benefit for me is mobile fueling everything else is garbage. Haven't been able to reserve a shower in well over two years. Tried activating push4points and again doesn't work.

Half the time it doesn't work to start the fueling process. I cannot email my receipts to my email address, even though it gives me the option. Flying j needs to fire their developers and hire some that know what they are doing

Complete junk app. Does not recognize fingerprint. If you enter a wrong password too many times, it locks you out but doesn't tell you. You are forced to call cust service to sit on hold 15++ minutes. Reserving shower option often screws up. Pilot, you need to test a great deal more before releasing. Also, people should be warned about how many tries they get before being locked out. There also should be a warning that you did get locked out. Half assed app for a half assed truckstop.
All of a sudden the ability to save offers is gone off my screen. Cant get them to show up. And the damn employees dont know anything abt how to fix it. Im taking app of phone
Absolutely love this app. Regularly updated, easy to use and an all-around solid app would recommend.
App was good for awhile the got buggy. Now I cant log in to my acct anymore. And I tried changing it and it gives me an error
App has not been working at all for me for over a month now. Come on can you fix it already. PLEASE.....

Every time we try to use the map to find pilots further along our route the map continuosly resets it self and if your lucky enough for the map to allow you to look ahead when you select a location it will not allow you to pull it up because as soon as you do attempt to pull up a location the map resets and you start the process all over. I have had more problems with the app since the last update. I truly hope you get this fixed. This app is our go to for fuel showers and parking. Please.

I don't understand why the app locating feature is so questionable. I can be in front row parking and try to reserve a shower, but the app thinks I'm a quarter mile away. I understand why the feature is there, but it should have its range expanded so I don't have to walk halfway through the lot in the rain before it can tell me there's 5 people in front of me for a shower.
Excellent for planning trips and parking and shower reservations. New offers and fuel deals. 100% recomend

I love this app for many reasons but especially now, allowing me to not touch a bunch of Corona virus infected buttons on the fuel pumps. It's great when it's cold and windy out, or swelteringly hot outside the truck. I don't have to stand out in the elements as long, sweeping two cards and entering a bunch of numbers like truck number, trailer number & trip number. This app allows me to enter the 6 digit code I get from the app, with my fueling gloves on, using the end of my pen.

The app works when it wants to, it was nice to fill out all the info before fueling and not touching the pumps as much. Dont know what changed, but now all i get is failures to connect to server and when it does connect the pump tells me the code that the app gave me is invalid. After a week of failures the app just kicked me out. I cant log back in, and the reset password feature is useless. The cherry on top is the deals/ rewards on food arent valid in Alberta ( maybe all of Canada).

Love pilot flying J! I only wish they would include shower points or discounts for auto users as well as truck drivers. Flying J showers are a total upgrade from gym showers for us travelers, and a huge luxury to take a break in a bathroom to yourself for a minute. I think lots of travelers would dedicate their gas, coffee, and food spending to only flying J if there were some shower perks. Just saying! :D
Can't login to my account anymore, Can't even create a new account, app freezes on first screen.

Would be 5 stars if the app didn't freeze so much. Really frustrating trying to add a reward and then the wheel just spins forever. They should just give you the reward deal without you having to take the extra step of "adding" it...otherwise make sure your freaking app doesn't freeze!!!

Edited Thank you!!! I can send directions to my professional navigation apps again! Bring back my "get directions" option!!! A) Your trip planner is not optimised for commercial vehicles. B) I use a professional GPS unit and need to insert new stops into my already-planned 2000 mile trips. The new layout is not user friendly for tired truckers needing to find a place to park.

This app used to work great. Now basically not at all. I run reefers an sometimes only need reefer fuel. Fill out all the info click on reefer only. When u get to the pump maybe only def comes up. Or put in I need fuel reefer an def an def does not even come up on the pump. So have to go inside an start the transaction all over have found it easier to just put the info in at the pump which basically does away with the need for the app at all.

App constantly crashes as soon as you open it ad continuously does not come up so that you can put in your wallet code when you're at the fuel Island. In addition that frequently will only allow you to pump reefer fuel once you enter the code even though you wanted all three
Very handy and easy to use, plus i earn extra points per gallon for having it!
I love this app. I make sure my van fleet has the professional driver card and ONLY fuel at Pilot/Flying J. ⛽✈🚐💨

It was a great app until they revamped the wallet and limited access to only 5 cards! Many of us drive for large fleets and slip seat daily/nighty. Cards are assigned to each unit not individual drivers!! I had 20 cards stored and now you force me to choose only 5?? Since the change, most of our drivers have switched to LOVES for our fueling!! Like to see a change in the future!! Give US the option back!

Very Helpful and Great app. Saves a trip into the store by keeping my credit card on file. HUGE time savings. Like the e-mailed copy of fuel receipt. App struggles sometimes to locate me for fueling even when already at fuel island for more than a couple of minutes. Problem Might be slow Wi-Fi even when showing 4G as experienced in other areas.

Love this app. It saves so much time! I can locate stores, see what they offer, reserve parking, and a shower! Pay for fuel before I get out, for all of this I give you a shout! (And 4 stars) I would give 5 stars if ~ 1- you put exhaust system in the shower rooms, 2- you put 2 towels in shower rooms, and 3- some stores need to check restrooms more often throughout the day! Most stores are very clean however there are a few that make me question flying j/pilot being on the building! Overall ❤️

Points system should stay the way it is right now with the ability to actually earn points in a month with these newer trucks we dont have to fill up as often so its harder to earn. Also get rid of paid parking. This is just wrong at truck stops drivers should not have to pay

If you use pilot cards you know what a piece of garbage they are. They ONLY reason i use the card is for showers. The last 2 times i used the card it did not register. Both times in Oregon. Wasco and Aurora. They use 1980's technology and we all see how SLOW it is to just get fuel with all the dumb question they ask. They know this and just don't care.

I especially like the option of being able to check the showers to see how many others are waiting for a shower ahead of me. When parch for my 34 hours of duty sometimes I may wait until it's slower before using the app to reserve a shower for myself so by the time I walk inside I don't have to wait and I can go straight to the shower.
Great app but for the last week been not working properly hope it gets fixed soon
Keeps crashing when trying to view the map and find a place to fuel

I hate this new up date sometimes i have to do DEF first then put diesel in after. an edit to my review. I deleted the app, and reinstalled it. All of the rv filters are back. Thanks for getting it updated. Works great now, with a few nice improvements. Glad to have it back. I use it all the time when we travel. Wouldn't be without it.
Love how you can reserve a shower. Haven't tried the mobile fueling yet, but I will. The truckstop chain is alot better than working for them as a driver.
I'm a fan favorite. Customer service is always great. Hot water in the showers. Above average hot food. Ample parking. Wonderful coffee selection.

A lot of the deals and promos aren't useful to me .. Would like to see some better promos....and definitely ones that pertain more to things I would buy or use.the free daily drink offers on here months ago had me sure I stop every day and always got gas and cigs and other items as well.was making special trip out of my way to come get my free drink... Was by far best promo or one of the best.also don't like that I can't earn pts. or rewards unless I'm a truck driver.cause I'm dedicated customer
This is a pretty helpful App. You can tell if a parking lot is getting full by the number of pay parking spots left. Or you can go ahead with reserving a spot. Plus many other things are good also.
I like it very much. Saves time. Just wish it would remember my truck and mileage. It keeps the info for a truck I had over a year ago. Even when I put the app on a new phone.
Sometimes hangs up when trying to get code while at pump.

Half the time the app can't even tell if your in the fuel island. So mobile payment is a huge hit or miss, the dumbass programming team that came up with this need to take some advice from the Loves fueling app programing teams on how to activate pump's.
Every time there's an update this app keeps getting worse! Your developer's should be fired. It crashes all the time or it gives a message... there was a error. GARBAGE APP.

About every Store I've stopped at over the country they are all friendly quick and clean! And this app is great the points really come in handy when you can earn them do it and try to save them up for when your in a pinch because you can use points to buy things instore and great deals that you can stack on eachother!

A great asset to have for truckers on the go. Guarantees you a spot before you get there. Saves you from having to worry "I hope there's a spot", especially when low on hours during prime time when everyone is full. Thanks!

Not sure what happened but as of this month have not been able to access the map which is a great help in route to see how far or if I can go to the next and also thanks for bringing the gas prices back on app to. But please, please have deleted and downloaded 5-6 times and nothing is helping

Love the app....only problem I've had is I have 3 people who used my reference to get the app themselves and I didn't get my free drinks. Other than that no complaint and will continue to be a loyal customer.
I can't even open it now. It forces closed from the moment I click on it. Wish I had not even updated. The new and improved app is totally useless. And now a year later, the same problem.

I love the app for it's convenience. I see drivers at the pumps all the time and I tell them to get the app and you never have to pull your cards out of your pocket again. Just do everything from inside the cab.

Since Pilot/Flying J has changed their App & switched to this new App I have had nothing but grief. Now we must re-new everything we want to save everyday or we dont get the discount at the register...including the newest $.005 per gallon increase on the fuel purchase. On 03-30-20 I saved the new 1/2 cent on fuel when it said, More Points Are Coming soon, but on 04-01-20 when I went to fuel it did not count. Man up Pilot & give me the retro benefit from April Fools Day. Besides that OK

Always a help. Left the road for 2 years now im back and Pilot was amazing help getting me reconnected with my original account. Flying J and Pilot are amazing to the cross country drivers. Thank you for supporting us through this Pandemic.
Available when needed. Great everything at my fingertips.
This is a great and user friendly app! I can keep track of my points and get daily deals (some of which are just amazing)!

Indespensible if you're a regular at pilot/flying j. Does a lot of different things for one app! Still fairly buggy when using the "find location" function in both Android and apple versions, but overall good stuff.
Your app stopped working for me 3 months ago i try and get fuel it just wont load it use to now it wont
When using dark theme on a pixel 2 running Android 10 it constantly crashes.
Great app for finding pilot flying j stops app offers great deals on food drinks and in-store products.

Love the App! It is very easy to use and make it so convenient for all of your pilot needs! The mobile fueling, reserving showers and discounts makes this app worth using. Finding a pilot through the app is also great as well. Great app to use!

Great app remember to put your purchasing credit card into the wallet just in case the reader isn't working using the wallet will bypass the card swipe and recieve a code to use the wallet on your phone helped me when wex and efs was not swiping away the pump or inside but worked on the app
Awesome app...really helps me out when I'm out on the road looking for a place to fuel both the tractor and myself..and I especially like that you can reserve a spot for the night...ty

Update: 4/7/20 Upgrading to 3 stars. Dark mode now available. App is definitely improving. Please show number of customers ahead waiting for showers. Initially you get the count but it doesn't update like the original app did.

If it didn't track my points it wouldn't have 2 stars. This app is junk. As a driver, it's supposed to make fueling easier, well, it doesn't work when your at the pumps, and then locks you out of it. Total junk.

Love love LOVEEE this app!! So handy plus all my receipts are stored in the recent transactions so that's always a plus incase u asked the clerk to throw ur receipt away and are wondering about the price of something when u get home! Very handy and so many savings!! Love thank u thursday they are my fav!! 🥰🥰🥰
The app works but not consistently also doesn't hold information for the reserved parking
I downloaded this appi went into the truck stop hoping i would be able to scan my sodas or have a discount or be able to add up discounts they did not accept apps discount promo code scans
Love the app! There's always great deals & discounts!

So far it's been a good app the only thing that I have an issue with is that win you use the GPS part on the app some of the locations of stores is not were the facility is located witch makes it difficult to use the app to fule with the app

This is not about the app, this is about the really crappy internet at the Franklin, KY store. I paid for 4 hours and I am not even getting 1 mbps download speeds. This is about has fast has dial up. Cant play xbox live, no YouTube, nothing. Please upgrade this location.
Customer service is great! There's hardly any waiting for showers and the upkeep of the store sanitation is excellent and the app is a great money saver
Great colors and printing easy to use.
Professional, Quick & easy. ALL ESSENTIALS A TRUCKER NEEDS🗣. 👍🏻💯👌🏼
Good deals on snacks plus good points system for professional drivers.

Good information, much easier access and use. Mapping helps locate P/FJ's all over America and rewards feature makes me so Happy But the Speedway chains are the WORST 1/10 despise them! They run professional drivers off even after asking permission to park See Whitmore #88876 Manager just sucks the Life out of the open road experience

Would be better if it did not lose location all the time. Hard to reserve a shower from the app in my truck cause it takes forever at times to lock onto where I am. Also hangs up a bit when using the app for fuel

Sometimes app won't work while at pump. I did it 5 timed and had to use the keypad at the pump. The clerks inside said they know nothing about the app and could not help me. When it works it works it works great.
I really liked this app. I updated my app a few days ago. It was working great until this morning when I restarted my phone. Now it won't even open. I hope I can get this resolved.

Great app.Thanks for looking out for the driver. I appreciate the mobile fueling Pilot/Flying J was the first to have mobile fueling. Now other truck stop are doing the mobile fueling. And the rewards are great.
since they updated, i have not been able to get the app to run on a Kyocera Brigadier. Since they fixed it it runs well and I am very happy to have it back.

Love this app! Use it frequently. Easy to use and allows you to reserve parking and showers right from the app. There are discounts you can only get from the app. There are other options I haven't explored yet.

Was great until Saturday. Now it keeps saying my password is incorrect and when I try to reset my password it gives me an error message saying password can't be reset!!! I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling already.
Love using it in winter at the stores that have this app so I don't have to be standing in snow or ice while inputting data.
This app is utterly useless. You can't use the fingerprint login, because it asks for a password after. Then it doesn't recognize your password, and it won't allow you to change your password.
Get gas discount which is great but don't expect this app to work when you need it. Put the discount number in another spot and don't expect it to open to find you a location, just watch for them.

So far so good. Last few flights I tracked were right on time. With updates on early arrival time. Would use it continuously. Not giving 5 stars yet because I've only had it for a coupla months. Let's try again in the future. But great free version app for tracking flights overall.

Very helpful, I use it anytime family is flying in for a visit. This app keeps me posted so I dont have to go inside the airport to see if their flight is delayed. I just wait at home till I see that the flight is close and then head out. No more guessing or waiting around for hours at the airport with fussy babies.

Very useful app. Ads used to be unobtrusive banner across the bottom of the screen. Now too many annoying full screen ads, down to 3 stars. Note to developers: when the ads become so annoying that people downgrade the rating of your app (or uninstall which might be the next step), are you really benefitting from that?

If all you want to do is to track your flight in a smooth and intuitive interface, this app is the top pick. Lacking the clutter in the ones ranking higher, this flight tracker provides such a smooth experience that I even paid a full year subscription just to support the team building it. 💸 Thank you!
It was really good...but now many of the flight status doesn't update. I don't know if a flight took off, landed, etc....ut mostly states scheduled even if it is past the take off time.

Good app, I like better than most. However, it does not track ALL flights. Tracking family members that have to travel on 3 different flights to get to their destination. It does not have the third flight information.

Great app! My friend traveled to Israel from the US and I used the app to track her flights. I found the app very user friendly. The notification feature lets you know when flights take off/landed, or if there is any delay/hasten. Another pretty cool feature is the Satellite view which allows you to see the plane while in route. One could also scan boarding pass info and share it from the app. Nothing but good things to say about this app! It was my first time using, certainly using it again!

Great! It gave me live update status on the flight I was tracking. It even notified me once the flight I was tracking landed. It gives the estimated times for departures and arrivals; plus, it gives the actual departure time once plane has taken off and the actual arrival time once plane has landed. Best of all, it's free. I love it!

This app is great, I love how much information there is for the flights. I do wish you could rotate the map to orient it as if your looking the same direction as the plane. Other than that it's worth downloading. Yes there's adds but for what you get it's not bad at all plus it's free so yeah, stop complaining unless you can do better lol.
I have not had a flight tracker up in many years. I am really enjoying this one. You can save trips ahead of time, making it easy to monitor them as they occur.
Excellent results in THE USA. Not bad for flights out of Asia and Middle East. Most problems with those flights is caused by the airline.
It's fabulous entering the whole trip at once, then tracking with notifications at the appropriate times. I like seeing where they are on the map as well.
Gives me essential information about your flight, the plane, the weather, arrival and departure times, flight tracking. I love it.

This thing is totally inaccurate. Told me outbound plane landed then I found out it landed 40 minutes after what flight tracker told me. Return flight said it was landing at 9:18 so I rushed to get to airport and the FT app still said 9:18 even though the plane did not land till 9:40. Don't trust it as this is the 5th time it was wrong for times and also wrong on baggage claim.
Have enjoyed using this app. It easy to use with up to date information. I also like the reminders. Would recommend.

The Departure time of Flight 91618 from Jabalpur Airport (JLR) to Delhi Airport (DEL)has been changed from 05: 50 PM to 08:10  PM since long. The status of this flight is not at all showing in your App. Please update the timing and arrange to show the status as this is a regular flight for us.
Seems to work ok. Time appears to be early. Lots of ads.
Easy to use on time does not freeze on me. Good application recommended it to shuttle services.
Pretty neat tool. Easy to track flights of friends and family.

Updates are painful. Every update, I have to input my login and password. If you have two step verification, that's another thing. Updated also seem to be a priority, as when I open my phone after an update, this app seems to take over and overlay everything else on my phone. A real passion in the butt when I'm traveling to deal with all of this. When I'm traveling, I've often needed Ring, and needed it immediately, only to find out I have to enter my log in, then check my email etc.

So many negative reviews but I did not see them until after I bought ring doorbell. It was a bit of a challenge to get it working. Installed the app on 3 phones and connected ring to Alexa app. Everything is working great. Notifications are almost instant, live view takes about 3 seconds to load on all 3 phones. Echo5 takes a bit longer but not much. Roommate installed the app on her phone and had problems similar to so many of the reviews. Phones have a lot of options - battery saver, do not disturb, etc. A few changes with the settings on her phone and it now works properly. I gave it 4 stars because it is not a top end video doorbell, but it is worth 5 stars for doing what it is supposed to do and doing it the way I expect it.

Good camera, but the app is rubbish which defeats the whole point of having the door bell. If you get a motion detected and try to view it on the app it takes for ever to load by which time you've missed the event. This could and should be so much better for the top price you pay. Seriously think about buying this until you read some of the reviews .

It works for the most part. only been using for 4 days so still getting kinks out. Mostly having trouble getting notifications on my phone. Still waiting to get notifications on my phone mit sure what is going on now it has been a couple weeks. So it's been a months now and still no notifications to my phone. Hoping that maybe soon I will get answers

Was great for the first few weeks, then the notifications stopped coming through on my phone. Now I have to turn notifications off and back on again for each camera, each day to get alerts... My phone has not had any updates, my location has not changed nor has my internet connectivity... The app as it is is far from how great it could be. The potential is there...

Excellent UI, Features and Service. The motion sensors are iffy at times and sometimes it can be difficult to connect and I get an error message for LIVE VIDEO. I know RING will continue to improve and that is why I still reccomend their product over others. I do think they could reduce price for their products for sure to increase the security force and provide a real market dominance at the same time. overall great app and product line, try it out!

I've had Ring for over a year...it use to be a great app. Now the app is forcing me to reset my password and when it is changed, it will automatically force you to go through the reset process again and again and will not allow you to log in. No issues logging in my account via the web, but no access through the app. Have uninstalled and reinstalled several times, including clearing the cache.

Runs slow, hogs data. Even on a connection where I can stream any other media in HD, loading saved videos is slow. The app also freezes from time to time. Checking the cameras via 4g takes a significant amount of data, even compared to watching videos on other apps. We are generally satisfied with the Ring equipment, but the app could use some streamlining. Update: the login screen looping indefinitely was a great addition with the newest update!

Awful products from ring. Doorbell 2 takes an eternity to communicate with mobile phone or chime (if it does at all). Even when I get a notification of door ringing, it won't connect. Ring spotlight cams fail to load 90% most of the time. I've tested this with the devices fully charged and placed right next to the wireless router. These products are utter garbage. I have other cheap Chinese WiFi cameras that perform so much better than the ring products. Shame on ring for releasing this junk!

Motion outside of designated motion detection zones constantly sends notifications. Every single car, cat, or jogger that passes in front of my home sets it off despite having street and sidewalk excluded with zone design, even with an error margin. Gives you ability to create multiple motion zones, but no way to activate or deactivate them independently. It would be nice if the different modes allowed the user to choose which zones to activate. Finally, playback controls are not that great.

Things started fine in that all features worked. I don't know if it was an upgrade or what, but now the live feature never works. And because of that I cannot update the active zones either. Actually, I was able to get the screen once and modify the zones, but I couldn't save the changes. Support (live and via chat) has been a complete failure. They know it is a common problem, but they act like it's a new occurence and have no solution. If they offer to reset your phone network, don't!

The app is great until you choose to view your camera's in Live View. I cannot view any of my camera's in real time, only when motion is detected. Troubleshooting always redirects to the doorbell, but that's not what I'm looking for. The the 2nd search is net speed, which my RSSI is under -40 and Live View still doesn't work. iOS users can Live View their camera's, why can't Droid users. 1 star for now until the Ring app is configured better for Droid users.

Once again, I can't give any more than a 1 star, and once again, I can tell the update wasn't tested before it was rolled out to the public. When will I be able to hit that 5 star option? I can no longer get to Live View. Recordings are extremely choppy in sound and activity. Lots of freezing. Very unreliable. No, it is not our internet. Extremely disappointed. Fix all ASAP!!!!

lots of issues cameras are blacked out when trying to view them at times even when you get notification of movement and try to see what it is the camera will not be accessible. The life expectancy of the camera battery is ALOT less than what they tell you if you are gonna check them. It was about 29 days before i had to charge the batteries again. UPDATED : 4-22-20 After having these for over a year they have made update improvements.I no longer get blackouts and accessibility has been great.

Trouble over and over. Help tells you to check your wifi uninstall app lots of other things, still works intermittently. I live alone and have had more trouble than the thing is worth, lost out of the times they tell me uninstall and reinstall, fed uo with the whole thing. Update killed the sound on my Samsung S10. Now I can't hear what the person is saying whether in live view or when doorbell is pressed. AGAIN! This happened before!! I have uninstalled/reinstall the App. I have rebooted my router. I force stopped App and cleared cache. Everything I tried not working. I tested on my iPad and everything works fine so confirmation specific to my Android phone.

TOTAL DISASTER. Since 24 April 2020 (when my phone done the update) my Doorbell Pro has become obsolete. Thank you Ring. I have had my Doorbell Pro for about 18 months - it worked fine up until 24 April 2020. It has since stopped connecting to my wifi (router placed close to the front door about 5ft. from the doorbell). My phone can pickup my wifi signal, full bars from the other side of the street. I have done factory reset on the doorbell and still no luck.

Video lags really bad cars or people tend to freeze or jitter or the video doesn't even record this is with a $400.00 router that is close by and very fast internet. This app was GREAT when I first came out, now this app is not good whatsoever. Hardly ever loads onto live view, just said reactivating every time and then fails to load. Never had this issue before. It needs to be FIXED asap. Really disappointed they have almost all bad reviews now and havent fixed it.

Still not sure its setup correctly, instructions are not the best. After three days now I'm not getting notifications. I have this app for two different residential homes. Works as advertised but takes time to learn all the feature packed options.
