The Ring Doorbell & Floodcam notification alert sucks, it only works half the time, I have to continually (daily) uninstall the app and reinstall to make it work. It only notifies maybe 9 times and then stops working. I tried contacting Ring but they are very difficult to work with and still haven't corrected the problem for several months now..

When the app works it's great, when it doesn't it can be excruciating frustrating. When it works 5/5 easy. Unfortunately it may go from working to not working on a whim. Pros- Ring will update with new looks and features. Cons- You don't really have a choice if it's a feature you don't want or need, like shoehorning it in and testing it out on users before fixing it later, disrupting what was smooth operations in the process.

Mine never loads when getting a alert I have to go to old videos and keep clicking on them ,,somebody could already be in the house by the time it loads to the recent alert ,, says poor connection but all other devices are fine ,, now I'm experiencing a error in loading video all the time have to uninstall and reinstall app over and over still not working ,,

I gave the app 3 stars, as my front door camera still works, although I set it to just alert me when it picks up a person, and it is still coming on for cars. It is my rear camera that has let me down. It is solar powered (shows full charge) and yet it stopped picking up the Internet in Dec 2019. I do have a Chime Pro which RING but it fails to show any kind of blue light and can't be set up. I have tried many times to reconnect my rear camera, but no luck at all.

It's got worse and has so many problems, almost like they created the problems to try and make you buy the upgraded version. The motion area zones don't work anymore, even with a wedge to angle my camera and zones set to the bottom it still gets triggered by actions miles outside the set areas. Connectivity issues, just when you really need it, and when it does record it's always the last half of events, usually when the visitor is going or they are already inside !!! I won't be renewing.

So easy to install!!! The doorbell camera let's me know who's at our front door, and allows me to talk with them as though I was inside. We have the camera w/flood light on the corner of our house as well, (Also a piece of cake to install) that keeps an eye on our vehicles and storage shed, letting me know what time, and who or what passes by there. Love our system!!!

Reinstalling this app fixed the not being able to connect issue. This app is really slow to open sometimes and the added waiting time for the live view to start isnt really great. If the data mining stuff was removed from the app I'm sure it would improve the speed, just a suggestion... The 'rapid ring' app was the solution for me. I'm very happy using that for motion and rings :)

Never works.. tired of trouble shooting. Perfectly fine internet. Have to constantly reset the device to get it working again. Unreliable... Live view not working again. Can no longer recall videos. Opening the app when I get a motion freezes my entire phone. Does the same thing my wife's phone. Note 10 + and Galaxy S10.

It takes a lot longer for me to recognize when people are getting close to my porch. Sometimes I won't even get a warning until they're already gone. I'm sick of the nightvision and would rather have it off. I loved the Ring Doorbell at one point but the quality has definitely went down. I like the Blink cameras a whole lot better.

Terrible product and support. Notifications are slow to arrive and the camera misses about half the times i pull into my own garage. Support will blame your data network for the slow notifications when you aren't home and blame your wifi router for the slow notifications when you are home. Cannot wait to replace it with anything else.

I now have 5 of these cameras including the doorbell. They work fairly well. I also have a hardwired system. These wireless are great quality and I love having notifications when I want. I would have given 5 stars but they don't always connect or have saved footage when it is a quick shot. I still have lots of confidence in them. Easy to use.

Ring sucks!!! Ever since the update, even before the update it would say my mobile device could not connect... I reset my network, reset my Ring device, went to website and reset password and nothing. It connects when it wants and before this issue started, when it would show a picture iit would be so whitewashed that you couldn't make out anything. There is no way to adjust the picture. I will never recommend this product to anyone. If i could give negative stars I would gladly do it.

notifications only vibrate now and have to constantly uninstall and reinstall the app because the volume level on the ring when talking threw it is so quite you have to put your head next to the door bell to hear what is being said. Update: app is slow to load live feed and also says I have a poor connection wich I don't being that im right next to the router.

A broken app riddled with bugs and network issues. Can't login into the app half the time even if you use the correct credentials. I've never had this many issues with far cheaper devices (ip cameras) that don't have monthly subscriptions. The new updates have made the app LOOK slightly better but preform so much worse. "Can't preform this task please try again later" the whole point of ring is being able to use it at any moment WHEN YOU NEED IT. The app makes the device worthless.

On my phone it won't let me view live! Upsetting Everytime I want to view live it says weak connection, check my wifi connection all is great! So it has to do with the application! My husband had the ring app installed in his phone it just randomly pop up glitching, turn off his phone and turned it on again with app closed and randomly again pop up glitching. He had to uninstall it from his phone!

I will get the motion notification. However, half the time when I try to check the live feed, the camera is disconnected and won't reconnect. Even after checking the settings and testing the wifi strength and all that, it still has trouble reconnecting. The other half of the time when the live view is working it takes so long to open and display that whoever was at my door is walking away by the time it opens. Hopefully there's an update coming soon to justify the money I spent on this thing.

I have had Ring Doorbell for 3 weeks now. I cannot see any of the video online that have occurred in the past 3 weeks. When the doorbell detects motion there is a lag time and the only thing I can see on my phone is the car driving away. Nothing else. The only reason I give it one star is because it does ring when there is motion. I see no point in paying for a subscription!

By the time the app loads the person is long gone. The doorbell motion zones are a joke compared to any wifi camera on the market. It's just a semi circle radius detection that doesn't fit your yards footprint, and you can only shutoff three vertical sections of that semicircle, which always removes critical zone monitoring. The detection period isn't adjustable The app notification sounds don't work for android. It's just the default android notification.

The connection with my phone and the camera has gotten very bad the past few months. It's also not keeping all motion recordings, I don't know how to fix it but it happened right after their latest, worst update. I guess this is what to expect with a company that has a autocratic CEO, who chooses his own wealth over having a thriving company.(AKA poor wages despite work, deteriorating security systems for customers. . . I could go on but there's a limited number of words per review.)

We have been with Ring for more than a year, the Apps worked fine until now, suddenly the update Ring Apps force us to join the Ring neighborhood watches or being locked out, we now have no choice but to sign in without options to op-out like before. We have to start all over again, Our devices still can't get connected with the updated App. We got very frustrated with this stupid new update Ring App, we will find something else better and more user's friendly than the Ring.

Nothing but problems with a ring doorbell, and the 4 camera's I have. All have solar. Very expensive junk. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY; even before their latest update I was having problems...too many to list. Now with the latest update it's almost comical. Again problems are too many to list. This junk is going in the trash when I move to the new house I'm building. I want security with a better peace of mind, to know it'll work when needed. Get you act together Ring.

I used to love all my ring products. I liked that all my security was linked together. Now I am regretting spending so much for a doorbell that is essentially useless, and equipment that I consistently get notifications saying connectivity issues. I have ran the tests, I have uninstalled reinstalled, tried disconnecting/ reconnecting devices and unplugging my modem and range extender. Nothing works. Great concept poor execution. Has ring out grown its capabilities?? Every update more headaches

Slow to open/activate, motion activation doesn't work when you want it to, and does when you don't want it to. I had furniture listed free against my house in the drive way. Someone had to come all the way in my driveway to load a chair and a couch.. Nothing. Every day cars, trucks ect. get recorded.. Worthless

I have never been happy with this ring system. It hasn't worked since the first two months I purchased the system. The batteries always run down and I got tired of having to drag a ladder out to get to my batteries to re-charge them. I went back to Best Buy to complain and they told me there is nothing they can do since it was out of warranty. I would never recommend Ring.

All system I barely usable I have doorbell and spot light camera and excellent wifi mesh with tp link deco. When someone rings doorbell it takes up 8-10 min to get notifications, it's newer recording on time or you get notifications every second for 10min with no reason at all regardless of any setting or zones. Also support is useless. I have nest on the other door and it's working 100x better. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY I'm switching to nest or some nameless China brand I bet it will work better.

Hate it! Live view never works and my wi fi at home works perfectly! It notifies you when someone is at the door but you can never open it to look and by the time you do, they are gone so what's the point? The sun or wind set it off constantly as well and it's annoying! Would not recommend!!!

I love the system and the price.. some improvements needed below ..** please add the ability to turn off the IRlights on the wired stickup cam so that i can use it behind a window , it works great during the day but useless at night and add a customizable delay on the contact and motion sensor when triggered. sice some will be more prone to accidental triggering and giving me enough time to disarm and also add a customizable motion feature on the stick up cam battery

UPDATE! they have "updated" the app so we have "modes" now. And ever since then, we can no longer view the cameras live. Just sits there and waits and eventually times out. NOT HELPFUL!! The update from 20 hours ago just crashed the app! it no longer works and says it "can't find my location" on either of my cameras!!! fix it!

The app is excellent, however I don't believe it has IPV6 support. It appears a few apps have this issue... So the problem you ask? If you have Sky Q fibre then you will get freezing and slow opening off the app. After a LOT of work on the net I found the way to fix on my sky router. Still worth 4* as otherwise it's a great app and certainly not the only one plagued by this issue.

Poor video quality even though my phone clocks 43mbps download right next to the doorbell. Slow response - the person is gone by the time I get a notification and the video starts on my phone Bad motion detection - I get notifications for street traffic even with the motion zone at the smallest setting. Annoying notifications stack up instead of just showing me the latest. Plus there is no option to dismiss: only snooze. No option to choose video focus point. No free option to store video.

Great system! Didn't buy the door bell...we bought the security lights with the camera and two way radio. Mounted one in our back yard and one in our front yard, angled them to catch the door and both yards. They system works great. Better than what we expected. We also bought two indoor cameras with two way radio. The sound and microphone on the outdoor security camera system is 10 times better than the indoor security camera system.

This product and the app are terrible. The connection always tells me that it's weak when I'm standing right next to the router, the doorbell is less than a meter away from the router as well. I hardly get any notifications that someone is at my door, if someone rings the bell I'll get a notification after they've gone. I really wouldn't recommend this inferior product or app to anyone. Save your money.

This has been the WORST experience! 3 days working on installing. Day 1, went of line. Day 2, told to purchase a compatible inside doorbell. I did and installed it. Once the Pro pack power kit is installed the doorbell will NOT stop dinging. Day 3, Checked transformer instructions state must be 16 volts. It is. Now I unplugged the kit to stop the insane ding donging so I have half a blue circle and it will not connect to my Wi-Fi. Wi-Fi signal is very strong. This is a doorbell nightmare! I hate it!

installed 2 battery stick up cameras and can not get motion detection adjusted to pick up objects coming straight towards the cameras. There is no way to tell where you have the motion fields setup, it constantly gives false alerts. By the time you open the video. whatever triggered the motion is gone from view, ring needs to address this issue as there are alot of the same complaints from others.

App is full of glitches. Basically makes having the Ring system worthless if you can't even access your cameras from the app as that is your only interface with them. When attempting to see the live view or adjusting motion zones, it is hit or miss. When it's a miss, it takes more than several attempts of selecting live view (or the option to adjust motion zones which requires live view), getting the infinite spinning "loading" circle, backing out, restarting the app, and trying again.

$10/month for a useless app. Even with the update today 4/5 still not working. Update on 4/18- another useless update for android, still can't view my cameras when away from home. I guess I will be buying a real security camera system that I can view live camera views. Update again after another useless app update on 4/21. Again still can't view my cameras, even at home. Useless app. How many updates does it take for ring to fix their app? The world will never know. Why can't I give 0 stars?

Giving this app 2 stars SOLELY for the fact that it's the most ANNOYING app of all time. It also kills my battery because the alerts go off every 3 minutes because of my farm animals....there should be an option in the settings that you can set certain times the alerts are on, ex. on from 12am- 8am. I turned all the alerts off but I don't wanna have to change it every single night I have STM so rembering to do literally anything is a problem for me. I wanted to love ring. 😒

Latest update has cause lights on camera unit to stay on constantly. Yes, I have checked all the light settings and sliders on the app and reset the unit and the chime pro. Now only way to turn off lights is to disable them and renders them useless after dark. Only been installed for 2 months. Disappointing.

Awful! I would say it works about 30% of the time, somtimes I get a "motion sensed at your bell" and look at the notification and find it was 45 mins ago, same with the ring, I have 2 rings the other day with no notifications and then 14 mins later I got a missed ring. I opened the ring app yesterday and there was 9 events that day and not a single notification. Sometimes the app wont open live video and other times it goes straight in. Nothing is changing on my phone or my network.

Not working properly. Have had it for not even a year and hasent even worked the whole time. Falling apart already with a whole screw area falling off, and the button cover falling off as well. Doesn't always pick up motion thats how I got some of my things stolen out in my yard because the device wouldn't connect to the wifi. Its a shame because you pay a pretty penny along with a subscription for it to be junk. I was really excited to get this too but its nothing jut a head ache.

So disappointed with this app. Live view takes forever to get displayed. It's supposed to be HD I don't think it would qualify for 360p. After an app update it always refuses to work and then I have to delete the app and 're install it... every time, piss poor for over £100 spent on it. Then they have the front on them to ask for a monthly subscription to store your video. And finally it's not my internet I have superb speed and the ring doorbell is visible to my phone it's the app!!!

Update: video footage was just black and no audio yesterday on doorbell. Power reset resolved but missed an incidentbeing recorded. Ring don't know why it happened. As of v 3.25.0 they still haven't FIXED FOLLOWING ANNOYING BUG! Bug- Affects All Android: When you view historical events and say you viewed an event yesterday morning, when you click the phone's back button it always snaps back to the latest event. Very annoying if you wanted to see the previous event in the above scenario.

Why haven't you added a select all button for deleting videos. That would make life much easier. Plus I've noticed a glitch when I go to delete a video I've already viewed. It will actually still be in the video Q you will either have to shut the app down n reopen for it to show that the video is deleted. And if you try to immediately delete it again it says sorry this video has been star. When it hasn't. So if you could fix that as well that would be great.

Since updating I can only access the app via my WiFi. When on data the app hangs and does not open. Don't update if you are on android. I have just seen in my settings (Samsung s10+) I can only use the app if I don't use LTE3g/2g autoconnect. Which means I can't use 4g. Please fix. Keep safe. Mike

I see you guys are starting to improve things . It's about time though ! Getting notifications where someone is there over 5 seconds is a very good feature . Just wish you guys at ring could sort out the dam slow connection times to get to live view . I have a fantastic internet connection but it still says poor connection 50% when I kno that's rubbish

The live video view does not load nor can I speak through the device like when I first got it. It keeps saying that the Rssi is low when the wifi router is right next to it. I plugged it and cleaned it. Still doing the same thing. Maybe it's time to try something else.

I'm getting mad. I have a subscription to these people. The app stops sending notifications, won't alert me at all on motion or doorbell ring. I have gone through support to make sure all notifications are switched on from the app to my phone settings. The only other trick is to clear app data and that fixes it for about an hour then back to the same damn thing. All since this last update. I even uninstalled the app and reinstalled. Worked for an hour and stopped again.

Horrible!!! Have to be harrased by this app not only do you have to open an account every single time you log in also it opens on its own interrupting other apps and by way why should I care about what other cameras are seeing I'm getting notifications of cameras from people that I have no clue where they are returning the camera and uninstalling the app I DO NOT RECOMMEND this camera.

This "RING" is very overrated!... Recording always freezes, can't connect, miss recording the beginning, etc... Nothing but problems on BOTH APPS, Regular Ring App and the Rapid Ring app... My personal advice is to do your homework on the reviews before buying anything, I was just excited to buy a Ring because of how they advertise their videos (clear, crisp, HD, flawless recording)... I totally regret buying this RING system, I will be returning my RING setup and going with a better CamSystem

It's ok, there is a big flaw, it doesn't always detect motion! We've had issues with this, and it's ongoing, not happy when it doesn't pick up critical motion needed for police report, and as a advertising "since of security"!!! 😠

After latest update, My phone doesn't vibrate when there's activity on do not disturb mode. I want to be notified by vibration to wake up. This is a safety issue! And yes I've quadruple checked every possible setting, and theres nothing for this to fix it.

Nothing works, trying to set up bridge and it wont connect. Everything takes multiple tries, but the bridge wont connect after hours of attempts. Thinking I will have to send entire system back. Also the customer support chat also doesnt work-so I cant even ask for help on the bridge. Two thumbs way down.

Save yourself a lot of trouble & money and buy a Blink camera rather than a Ring! Actually for the price you can get about 3 for the price of one Ring & they are a lot better at programming! The thing is with the Ring doorbell, the majority of people are so used to them they never ring the bell anyway, since they know the motion detector has already picked them up & by the time you answer a rung doorbell, whoever rang it is long gone! Blink cameras are a lot quicker & there is no monthly fee!!

My mom feels more secure after having a dangerous-personal encounter in her living room. I'm staying awhile with her until COVID19 blows over. I guess that helps her feel secure as well. Great security system, and the perfect ring hub app that allows you to watch/talk through the cameras to make a presence without you physically being there in case it were to turn violent.

Im extremely disapointed with the app. In 2 months time it went from working great to now i cant hardly ever get it to connect for live view. Tried updating and deleting app and reinstalling several times as stated with no correction. This is disturbing when im trying to see what is happening at my house. My friend with the nest security has never had issues i should have listened to him and bought nest.

It detects people who approach my front door just fine, but since the recent update it's been almost impossible to get a quick and reliable connection to "live view". All I see instead is a spinning circle and "ACTIVATING DEVICE..." What have you done to this once great app??

I've had my ring devices for about a year and six months. Never had a problem with this app until February or March but now it's worse. I'm surprised nothing was done to fix it after reading all the other reviews. I'm having the same problems as everyone else and something needs to be done to fix it.

Do NOT BUY. RETURN BEFORE THE TRIAL ENDS. USE NEST (when searching for security equipment the technical support is the most important factor). They have no dedicated troubleshooting dept for actual technical issues. The audio recorder is corrupt and faulty. They are dishonest in their accountability. It does not appear they have trained and dedicated staff who can handle technical issues. Nothing but problems too many to list. Ring is not a well thought out brand. Do not waste your money.

Ok im going to be honest here, I bloody love the ring system, so dam easy to set up I think our 5yr could set these devices up. We have a ring doorbell, a spotlight cam and 4 of the new ring indoor cams and we think they are brilliant. The amount you can do in the app is fantastic with great features and the linked devices feature is such a good idea (someone should get a cookie for that 😀) and simple to navigate. Cheers guys keep the great work up!

Turned off notifications for motion at front door and it stopped sending all notifications, even when the doorbell was rung. I also keep getting disconnected from the live view when I try to look at it. I tap it and it just says "live view has ended" after hitting reconnect over and over. The doorbell camera is nice to have but I wish the app wasn't so buggy, it kind of makes it useless.

This doesn't work well! I can be close to the wifi and it still takes forever to be connected or see who is at the door. You are supposed to be able to answer the door when you are not home. That won't work either. I even got a new phone in hopes of it working. Still won't work!!!

RING VD2 w/Chime and this App. Totally the way to go!! Love it. Have the RING Security along with this App. for 2yrs now. Has NEVER failed at all. I read most all of the other reviews regarding this app. I found not 1 that didnt have a complaint or issue. I'm sorry cause that sucks to work and pay for something especially for security of your you, family, home and property. It's wrong and needs to be made right!! Cause safety, security and ones family is vital. Get it right RING Developers!

Very dipleased lately. It's disturbing that I cannot see the video if my power goes out. It does not record if the wifi is down. This is contrary to the instruction "if my device is stolen, ". I really don't like modes. It's very intrusive

Stickup Cam Wired: often cannot self-reconnect to ethernet or wifi anymore after (un)plugging (on PoE), although nothing (wifi password, etc) changed. Didn't have this problem until last updates... Infrared is turned on, where it shouldn't and didn't before (settings ok, indoor behind window > glare, so now I have to tape the infrared lights...) App/cam doesn't remember settings. Doorbell Pro: misses people-motion... Once used to be reliable assisting products/subscription...

This is a app is a good "device" for essential security needs. However it should be able to be moved to, or allow it's video footage to be stored on, the SD card as it consumes a lot of storage. As a result, it slows and can disrupt operations of my already installed apps. Thanks.

You shouldn't have to pay for storage, the cloud should be free and the app has lots of issues that need to be resolved!!!!!! And the more you keep redoing the app the worse it gets just leave the app alone!!!!!!

App lies and blames network for it's issues Can hardly ever get a live connection to cam Other cam products I have are fast and connect fine UPDATE 19.4.2O had to go into device health, says its online, but it isn't, change WiFi from app,press button on device, select same WiFi,, update firmware started working again

after the latest update i cant see the live view and the app keeps crashing. i would have rather bought a chinese version doorbell and it would have functioned better and without paying a fee to stream. also another update and still the app crashes whenever i try to get a live view. WASTE OF MONEY

Helpful when it actually works. It's incredibly slow and takes forever to load the live view. You'll easily miss all or most of any event that occurs. It's not really worth it if you miss everything the camera is supposed to capture.

My ring camera has been a lifesaver. Located in an alley with a bad history of drug use the camera has helped curb crime and has enabled me to record unlawful activity. The app however can be very slow viewing live stream included. Despite strong Wi-Fi signals I'm usually unable to pull up live stream on my phone when Ring alerts. By the time I can pull up live stream the activity has both passed and left unrecorded. Hence, its not the best system for situations needing a quick response.

Not happy with this bell takes to long to come on when any body rings it and by the time you get through the person has gone. So miss parcels ect. Also cant hear what people say on the other side you have to shout to make people hear you dont work properly. The amount of callers we have missed through to slow absolutely unbelievable DEFINITELY WOULD NOT RECOMMEND TO ANY BODY

I first got this i liked it giving notification regularly letting me kno what's going on around the house 🏚. But now i dont get a sound ⏸ when & if something are someone coming. Before they up 👆 grade the app. Haven been good 👍 @ all. Keep changing 🚼 things around cutting 💇 off 📴 things. & still dont work. This app sucks.

Useless app. Every time I try to login it tells me my info, that I've been using forever, doesn't match their records. I've tried "recovering" my username and changing my password, which never works, and if you try to call them you get put on infinite hold. I've had to pay my bill over the phone for the last 3 months because the mobile and desktop websites are trash. If I had another option I'd leave Spectrum in a heartbeat. The 1* rating is for both the app, and the company themselves.

The only problem I had is after entering my acct info, I hit "Done" and nothing happened. What I needed to do next wasn't evident to me. There was a checkmark in the upper right hand corner. I pressed that checkmark and my acct info was accepted and I continued with paying my bill. That's the only reason I never rated 5 stars. Other than that it worked very well.

Awesome app !! Pay online automatically, report problems, access millions of hotspots, and many other features. It blows CenturyLink away 💯 This isn't even mentioning their speed leaves CenturyLink in the dust, and for $22.99 per month vs $57.99 what's not to like ?? Less expensive, much faster, and even has this fantastic app !!

In hard times this app makes it alot easier to make payments. I just wish that the elderly people would know how to do this , so they dont have to wait in long lines , and for them to be safe at all times on not getting sick in any kind of way . Sincerely your : Edwin Maisonet

Much like the services Spectrum offers, this app leaves much to be desired. There's always some function that doesn't work, no matter when u use it. Can't troubleshoot, can't see my services, no billing info....always something. I hate it.

Chromecast support please. Easy to pay bill and having chat support is nice. It would be nice to view your upcoming appointments though. It was rather surprising this isn't available. Years ago you had this. It seems like that's technology that was taken away.

Super easy to keep track of my payment, and allows me to take a screenshot of payments as well. Really helpful in reminders of past and due payments on bills. And the service? Some of the best I've had. If you have Spectrum, you need this app.

Thanks always for app two pay internet 👍 my spectrum phone is pay directly from my bank account thanks so much for that screen in my spectrum account since rejoining spectrum in November 2018 I've saved money $ buying the K 40 smart phone the rep on toll free number was awesome helping me program the phone after the monthly payments done which is 20.00 monthly my service will be only 14.00 monthly over year time on math Daniel saved hundreds of dollars if I was with ATT Verizon Sprint Daniel A

I have been a spectrum customer on and off for 20+ years. Definitely best option for TV and internet. The one issue i have is after 12/24 months, the price doubles even when told or guaranteed same rate. Customer service is excellent. Only issue there, is getting thru to talk to a representative.

Great app. But Spectrum sux. No contract, then jack the price up $100/mo. in less than two years for TV, internet, and land line. Oh, then charge you more for channels the boasted about having. My advise, look at youtube, or any other streaming service.
I would like the ability to print a payment record, not just save it to my device. Otherwise MySpectrum is very easy to use. I love the biometric capability.
I just downloaded this app to make a payment and it's great. I've been trying to make a payment online through the website for at least a week but it never loads properly. This app is so much better.

When it let's you log in its great, after changing phones it says "oops something went wrong!" Every time I try to log in and it kicks me out. Makes it hard to pay my bill. Same issue on the website btw.
No problems with this app so far! Making payments is super easy and bam it's done. Prevents me from walking into the store any problems i can handle it right from the app. Thanks spectrum

Horrible service all around. Barely any signal everywhere in my apartment. App provides absolutely NOTHING to rectify. It also will not allow me to input banking or credit card #'s to pay the overpriced bill! Terrible.
App won't even load past "welcome to my spectrum" and a spinning blue circle. Spectrum store employees said it's a known issue with no planned fix? App is useless if I can't even log in.
I've never had a problem with My Spectrum app. Works great for making payments, looking at your itemized bill, and much more.
Convenient troubleshooting. I can see all aspects of my account. I can also reboot my devices and connect to tech support, if necessary.
Took a little more effort than it should have but Spectrum eventually stepped up and took care of a pretty serious billing issue. Haven't had an issue since. App is great.
I love how convenient it is to make payments, no automated system, no waiting on hold, saves alot of time!! Thank you!!
Very easy to use an pay your bill also to see all your billing statements. You can also check your equipment if there is a problem.

bring back the old app, this is useless. no phone forwarding, no vm, its like an 8th grader built it. Update. It is still trash. Crashes all the time. Hard to manage devices. You are a. Entertainment company, act like it.
Credit card payment has issues. Paying with a checking account goes through smoothly. Please fix credit card payment options. It doesn't work!
Very convenient for anything spectrum related. Fast and easy. Haven't had any problems with the app.
All is well. I wish instead of the actual spectrum bill being separated from the mobile, that it be combined into one bill.
Spectrum is playing harmful tones and frequencies(I think w spectrum assist and in low residential areas) . Stay away from it. See for yourself with sound testers

My net was out for 5 hours and I didn't know what to do. I tried rebooting and reconnecting everything myself, and even switched in brand new cables without any change in connectivity. I looked up how to contact Charter, I saw their phones were overloaded and came across this app. After logging in and checking my service, I was able to do the steps to properly reboot and get back online. (Turned out I wasn't waiting long enough before powering on my modem and router again. Do it one at a time.)
Easy to use, easy to make payments. Glad it keeps payment info for future payments.

If I could give this app half a star I would. It makes paying bills very difficult. Autopay was originally set up but somehow was removed. Don't even bother with the one time payment because it always errors and says it can't complete the payment. Don't bother downloading this app. It just makes it harder to pay your bill. How this bug is not fixed after months is below my level of understanding.
Super easy to use. But why does it seem like my bill creeps up like $5 a month every month?
Being able to screen shot in the app would be useful. Especially when working from home and there's an outage.
Spectrum ensures that everything is easy to navigate through the application process. Kudos for making my life less stressful.

This app along with the internet service is horrible. If I could give negative stars, I would. Weekly system outages and constant modem resets are the norm. This app never works when it comes to resets and I end up doing them manually. Then I have anywhere from a 30 min to multiple hours wait for the service to come back up. The app is basically a waste of space. Uninstalling now.
App works great and quick for me and spectrum is great. But i do wish they would have more specials for their long time customers.

I use it to pay bills only, and it works for that. Doesn't allow me to save credit or debit card information which is dumb. I also was pretty upset to learn that the application has been designed to prevent users from taking screenshots themselves, and tries to force you into giving them unnecessary permissions to your phone. You don't NEED access to my photos and storage, you also don't NEED to stop users from taking screenshots of their payments to you. Shady as hell. I distrust you now.
This is my go-to for resetting my internet connection. Works much better than power cycling the actual equipment.

Started once, then it never start again. Then my phone started performing very poorly (extremely long delays). My sole purpose for trying the app was for troubleshooting my Spectrum home internet service which fails at least 2/day. I wanted to check the modem status via mobile data connection on my phone & perhaps do the reset that way. Uninstalling & will try again later. My Android OS is very old 5.1 so that's probably it?
Easy to navigate. Makes it easy to maintain services with Spectrum.

Other than giving me the opportunity to pay my bill through the app (which I don't want or use), I find no function this app provides. I loaded it because it advertised that I could troubleshoot my modem and reset it. Well, it provides a video on how to reboot it by unplugging the device. I was expecting a utility which would send a reboot command to my modem. For me, this app is useless.
Made my first payment through this app; very quick and easy. So far so good.
Can see my account and make payments easily. I also get great updates on service outages.
So easy to use! Can Pay bill with just a few clicks, wallah!👏
So far it's been easy to navigate & do tasks like making a payment.

Never lets me make a payment! This app will not accept my bank account, debit card, or credit card information. I always get to the last step and it says "unable to make a payment." I have had TWC/Spectrum on/off for 12 years and I have never received a regular monthly bill or a way to pay online- all I ever get is shut off notices because I cannot make a payment via the app or online, and I get stuck wasting time going to the store. I wish there was another option (I live in an apartment).
This app has been helpful in troubleshooting many issues with the spectrum equipment in my house.
The link from the app to your devices doesnt work very well. Still had to call customer service and have a tech come out to resolve the issue.
Easy to download and very easy to navigate, fast and secure payments
Re-Edit: Seems login issues have been fixed. App gives proper user controls as it should.

After the 3rd month of attempting to pay my bill on this app, it still doesn't work. I either had to call in and pay a fee for the operator to process the bill or navigate my way via Web browser (which worked this time). Also setting auto pay didn't worked either, via app and apparently operator. We will if traditional Web browser works. I will confirm next bill payment. Cheers!

Not just the app, but Spectrum Imternet as a whole won't allow you to pay your bill before the due date. This is a huge inconvenience. They also won't allow you to change the due date for your monthly bill. This is like a step back into the stone age when comparing Spectrum with main stream providers.

I used to be able to check my vmail using the app now the feature does not show. what happened to it? this app is not better than the twc app. I liked that one and was used to it. this app is completely different and is not formatted in the same manner. Also the vmail does not play unless speaker is turned on. Also the app just keeps crashing or closing out once I go to check my voice mail. Please fix !!!!

ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE! Sorry Spectrum.... I have not EVER been able to pay my bill through the app, I've been a customer for several months. (Does NOT work on the website either!) How hard is it to just have a simple app to pay your bill?! I've had to call every month, sit on hold, go through a menu etc, just to PAY you money!! Seems like if you have a business- that you'd WANT to make it as easy as possible for customers to PAY you!?! Right?!... seems so silly to make paying you difficult...

The app works however when it asks if you want to save your payment method for future payments it never saves it. I always have to enter the information manually everytime. It hasn't changed with version updates either.

Can't get google ring tone and other things on google play. Only allows for 20 messages and rings only 4 times. I'm in a wheelchair so when I put it down by the time I get to it it stops ringing. Don't want to carry it by pocket cuz it falls out. Also on the phone they gave me the screen glass scratches very easily. It is not scratch resistant. Not such a good deal after all
I have never had an easier time paying a bill. It's an enjoyment to be able to not have to ask a lot of questions on how to pay.

3 months my bill was being auto paid. This app even stated each month "thank you for your payment on such and such date. Balance due $0.00. Yet 3monthsater my service was disconnected., I even got paper Bill's saying the same thing! Yet on spectrums end " I didnt pay my bill" so they refused to even listen to me and forced me to pay another $400 to reconnect. Not to mention the sales rep lied to me saying if I bundled I would get 3 months free. Nothing was done about that either! Scammers!

What kind of system is asking for a username to verify account when you are trying to look up your username. Why does the page crash when trying to look up info based off of account info and security code. Why can't I look up my account via my phone number. Y'all call me 20 times a week to try and get me to use your streaming service so I know y'all have my phone number. Pay bill via app. Creates a trash app. Try to call them. On hold for an hour. What the hell is going on with this app!!!!!!!!!

Cant create account. 'Sorry something went wrong' They rip you off for internet. The price goes up every couple months and their app to manage account don't even work correctly. Do they really care when their a monopoly? NO! Only your monthly payment.

Worst app for managing your account, of course it work to take your money because that's all they care about but customer service is terrible and always making unknown micro transactions. I'm done with spectrum, waiting for the end of the month to switch providers.

Love the my spectrum app!! Love the convenience of paying my bill with the click of a button and the easy access to account info and service issues The only thing I'm not happy with is that I can't figure out how to watch spectrum TV on my Philips 50" 4k uhd smart TV...I couldn't get it to work on my LG 65" 4k uhd either, what am I doing wrong... I'm paying for a service either I can't use or unclear as to how to set it...
Very easy to find what I need when I'm troubleshooting a connection issue.

Not sure what all these other people are talking about, the app is so easy to use when paying your bill. I've never had trouble. Anyone who has trouble paying their bill using the app is doing something wrong I think. We call that a id10t error, lol, or operator error.
Its a really great way to pay your bill quick and easy without having to wait or remember your account info

Can't complain really. I can pay my bill in a matter of seconds.. And I just checked my internet speed with my phone. Over wifi. And while two movies were streaming in HD. And I still got 200mb down and 25mb up. Only downside is paying $90 a month for it... I'm still leaving 5 stars because this review is supposed to be for the app. Not your service...
App works great, and you can set up auto payment right from app which is awesome.
Awesome app that does it all from troubleshooting your equipment to paying bills.
There is no way to get this app to work. They send a code to sign up but the code doesn't work. In the past, this app never worked correctly, trying again and it still doesn't work.

Disappointing service. I was convinced to get the app for my smart tv, and have had nothing but problems with the service. It never works, and I have to "troubleshoot" the connection/problem every time I turn the TV on. Disappointing & Horrible service!

Decent tool to use in most ways, but of course the industrial psychology of this app is in favor to the company way more so than the people who pay to keep Spectrum running. A discontinue service link in app or downgrade link would be nice to just beable to access without needing to speak with a rep. Plus $5.00 to get real person help. Then they just try marketing more on your dime when you know what you want. !Shamefull! Otther than that, services are excellent.

The App works great and I don't have to keep entering info over and over to access my account. More importantly, it makes the payment experience so incredibly easy. I just hope it doesn't ask me again to rate the App.

They still have other fees on top of what your paying for. Not sure what those other fees are for, i dont even own a cable box, im paying 85 bucks for wifi and streaming services. I was paying 55 bucks for same wifi at att. Spectrum operators told me i would paying less that 70 straight up since im not under contract. She lied
Much better than having to log on through a web page every time I need help with my service.

I originally downloaded the app to be able to purchase access passes because anytime log in to get a 30 min. pass it kicks me out i never the passcode so when i go try to log back in it says basically no more 30 min trial but you can purchase passes. Logging into network to pay for pass as soon as i get to putting in pin number to set it up it kicks me out. I give up

In my opinion, the app is very convenient 4 customers who can't/ don't want 2 physically go into the office due 2 having a Disability, Sick, Work Schedule, Baby Sitter, Transportation, Long Lines, Difficult Representatives, Weather, Time, Forgot & Out of town. I can manage, view & print my bill (past/present). What I love most is that I can reset my WiFi from Spectrum App!

The most worse application that took me 3 1/2 hrs to get it installed. I wanted the application so I didn't have to wait online forever to pay my bill. I put in the right info and it kept saying don't match so I try again and still no match. It shouldn't take anyone that long to complete an app. I'm so pissed that if I didn't want the app to make it easier for me to pay my bill. I have never ever taken that long to input for an easier way to pay my bill. 🤬😤🤯😈👹👿. If there's any errors🤯😈👹

I use the app to pay my bill. This a.m. I got an error after I submitted payment. Later in the day I opened app. It showed Zero balance. Saw in History pymt pending. You still block my screenshot. Good thing I took photos for my own proof.
Doesn't allow me to log in. I give the correct information every time & it still does it.
Great app in general but every time I try to change the wifi name the app crashes.
Staff was very helpful. I had to wait 25-38 minutes for call back. Did not get call. After 3 hrs. I called back waited and waited but both Kelsey in mobile and Erma in wifi were very helpful.

When an app is updated it should improve all aspects of what it offers, thos last update removed the option to be able to turn off and on my wifi, it only allows me to change it but so did the last version. Please add that function back on, I dont want to have to log into my router just to do that everytime.
Constantly crashes, can't keep me signed in. It's useless - would give it minus stars if I could.

Last month the app refused to accept my billing info, but the phone operator worked it out for that payment. This month I tried the app again for online billing and everything went smoothly. Very happy that the service is fixed and I can stay out of our local brick and mortar, which gets one star.

My main use for the My Spectrum app is to view date charges are due and to pay my bill via the app which i have had absolutely no problem in doing. The app excepts my payment method with ease. App is also good to use for checking your services. I also downloaded the Spectrum T.V. app for watching T.V. while away from home. Both My Spectrum app and Spectrum T.V. app are very convenient and easy to use.

Fairly decent, I use the app to pay my bill and to help with internet issues. I can reset my modem and router on this app and it helps out a lot with issues I have. Sometimes has bugs so not perfect but useful.
Wow... who would have thought there could be an app to pay your bill with!! I love it

It would be very useful if they had enough representatives who will speak Spanish in the customer service and not have to wait so long on hold.But on other issues the Spectrum service is excellent and it was very simple and quick to activate myself; It took me 30mins. (because I lost the signal in my cell) since I opened the box I installed it,I activated it and changed the Network's name & passwords.Finally: the signal is always strong.Thanks to the people behind Spectrum,they do a 💯👌👍👍job!

When a simple process turns into a 30 minute mess. Trying to log in so I can update my auto pay. It wants me to update my password, so I go through the steps and it tells me "We're sorry, something didn't work quite right." I try to contact them and get another error message. Get your act together.

Only 4 not 5 since spectrum took off the time any device logged off the wifi network and being able to label the device a phone, tablet or laptop. I use to be able to see this "time" feature before but not anymore
I pay my bill on it . It reminds me when i forgot. And tells me outages . Recommended
I am very grateful for My Spectrum app. It is easy to use and helps me to take care of My business. Thank you
It's easy to control the things I need. I even had total access to activate my upgraded equipment without having to wait for someone to answer a call in these desperate times. Thank you!!
Finally put a save your screenshot. Makes it easy to pay my bill. Could use a push notification feature like "your bill is late". I'm not 100% sure but I don't think it has one.
Crashes. Login errors. Therefore, cannot use/not functional at all.
I love being able to pay my bill quick with app. Chat support is always helpful and if there is an issue they can't help you with, they'll connect to somebody that can right away.
Definitely the best idea for this spectrum! Lots of good deals!
I highly recommend this app for paying your spectrum internet bill your cable bill or your cell phone bill it is a very good program

The internet sucks. Supposedly have 100 mb, but if I'm on my computer on the wifi, I get kicked off or trying to stream movies on my tv, it steadily buffers. Cant hardly watch anything. I think they say 100 mb but some where they are constantly slowing it down. As much they want you to pay, it sucks.

I can't give any stars because off the rip this app is garbage so I choose 1 star & in my mind it represents 0. I forgot UN & PW & when I push those 2 options it ask to verify and I do so by my ph #, then I push next and it keeos going back to the verify myself screen👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽
Convenient, especially to find out there is an outage every night
Love it,fast and quick way to manage your account on the go

I love this app! It helps me clear photos off my phone to save space and it keeps unlimited amounts of my photos. I also love that I will get random "stories" that it creates to relive special times. It also sends me notifications to look back on special days from years past. I have not had any problems with it and I've used it for years. The prints are great and easy with fast delivery. Thank you Amazon!! I wish you could save more videos (w/out upgrading) but still, this is a great app!!

Good app and great service. App needs polishing. The app doesn't behave as smoothly as Google Photos does for example. Going full screen on a photo makes it "jump" on the screen, the animations are not consistent (swipes to open a photo and zooms out to go back?), some gesture don't work all the time (like swiping down to close a photo : only works if the photo is fully loaded ?!?). Works great but isn't a smooth experience.

Great app . Like the idea that it backs up my photos . So if I were to lose my phone there all back up . Just like Google photo app or Google drive for backing up file . but this app is great for photos , if you wish u can back up files as file . Makes u make different folders as well . Thx keep up the great work hope they add more features in the future.

I absolutely love Amazon Photos with one exception. First, let me say that I have a Google 3a (I know don't laugh). I have always loved Google until I got the phone. Don't get me wrong, I still like Google BUT don't get me started on Google photos. They SUCK and I'm not stupid, they just don't work! Anyhoo (lol), the only thing in Amazon Photos is, if you create an album and move pictures to it they still show on the home screen. When deleted /hidden they disappear in the album too.

I'm from Ukraine. Few days ago my Photos plan, which I was purchasing for several last years, has expired. It has happened accidentally - I didn't want this to happen, just missed. Now I want to re-purchase the plan again, however neither web-browser version nor the app allows me to do this - it doesn't show me any plans at all. In addition, there's no way for me to contact the support (at least, I can't find any way to do it). Everything this is more than ridiculous!

I like that the app uploads automatically and has a family vault. The app does not delete pics from the app when the same pics are deleted from the phone. I guess they do it in case you are just clearing space on your phone and want to keep the pics, but it can be annoying having to delete them from two different places if you just don't need that screenshot of a cat anymore. :) Overall it's probably better to be safe than sorry as far as pic deleting is concerned, so I'm still happy.

I would've given 5 stars if Amazon didn't delete my photos after I declined to buy more storage. Apparently prime only gives you a limited amount and if you go over and don't pay for extra, photos are wiped from your phone. Thank god I have my photos backed up. I get it, why buy the cow if you can get the milk for free.....ayeee!! But other then that I do like how easy it is to organize my photos and when I'm looking for a certain date or album that too is easy to find.

I would give this app no stars, if I could. Since installing, it has randomly uploaded some, but not all, photos from my phone and has messed up what's left. Where I should have photos, I have screen after screen of blackness or a grey triangle with an exclamation mark in it in their place. I thought this App just backed your photos up to the cloud but it has left me without so many memories. I'm gutted. In addition, it fails to connect for any length of time and only transfers a few photos

Very happy! Amazon photos backed up all my photos from computer and cell phone quickly, keep them well organized, easy to access, look up. And saved lots of space. The best part is storage of photos is unlimited. I took thousands of photos on each touring trip. No longer worry about lack of storage!

Nightmare to navigate. Can't easily sort between photos on device vs what is already uploaded. Folders are automatically added to backup, even after being removed repeatedly. Overall just a pain to use for something that should be intuitive. No, I dont want to back up EVERY folder. And I want to be able to see what is where and sort accordingly.

Excellent for seeing all my photos backed up to the cloud! I have backed up about 7 years (40,000+) worth of photos. Family vault is great too. Note: the app pulls the photos from your phone but you need to ensure its backed up to the cloud (see cloud symbol on photos). I can access from any device when signing in. Improvements: Better option for selecting bulk photos at once - instead of selecting each one individually. Customize the upload/backup to not include screenshots, documents, etc.

Excellent backup, free with prime membership and lovely reminders for photos taken on this date in years past. Have tagged family and friends and Amazon now recognises these when future photos are taken - can search by date, name and if geotagged by location. Faultless sharing selected images with friends and happy to remove photos from my phone knowing they are safe 'in the cloud' 5 stars!

Amazon Photos has collected the pictures of my life that I had thought I'd lost over the course of my life and when I signed into the Amazon Photos app, I found things that I had thought lost forever. This app really made me smile and I am really impressed with this product and would recommend it to anyone who is hooked into the Amazon system, music, photos, Kindle, Audible, all of the applications for Amazon. And this one saved my photos. Thank you very much!

Amazon fulfills my needs as a reader & a photo editing nut. I enjoy the books provided, the editing app for pictures as well as prime video. However, after loading the apps it can be difficult to open them requiring more than one try. While streaming videos can be frustrating when they keep freezing up or won't rewind/forwarding. Books are sometimes hard to download & open up to read. Nevertheless photo editing is a smooth running app I use daily & storing the pics w/sharing are the cat's meow.

Downloaded this app last week, I've been out for 2 walks and wondered today why all of my mobile data has been used when I have only left the house twice and not used it. Turns out this app has been running in the background using data and sucked my whole months data while out on my two 1 hour walks!

This recent release version has problems on android phones. There is no option to select folder to link to upload/ auto save. No photos are getting loaded. Shows incorrect folder but no way to deselect, save and select new folder. Please look into it. Fyi - Previous version was working better.

So far, so good. I'm hoping I don't lose any photos if my plan runs out. I don't remember how I have it set (automatic payments or what), but I'll look into it later. I saw the reviews mentioning this could happen, and that worries me. There's too much to keep up with on the Internet. If things remain good with this app, I'll raise it to 5 stars.

I really enjoy this app! I wish you could organize the photos a little better but it's a great place to upload everything. I like that I am able to have it upload photos every night so I am not worried about remembering to back up my photos after so long.

I love the photos I have printed but the last 2 days I'm to edit some I have ready to print and it takes me to a screen that says oops lost connection try again or cancel. It will not let me edit a photo at all, please fix this or let me know what is going on.

I use this app far more than I'd originally thought. For years I've done even the simplest edits in PS, using the crop and text tool alone is worth using the app. Since I have Amazon across virtually every device I own (even my MotoG6 us Alexa enabled lol) the photo app is Handy as He*l 😉.

I love that my photos automatically sync up. The best part is that my husbands photos sync up too, so I get access to the ones he takes too. The pictures I have ordered have been great! The place I was ordering from was cutting off the image and coming back blurry. Amazon prints have been flawless so far.

Does what it is supposed to do. Helps by giving daily anniversary of photos so you can recall photos you've possibly forgot about. Can switch on and off backing up. Ties in with other Amazon photos apps that you have on other platforms so you can find your photos in the cloud

The best photo sharing app out there. Great for both videos and pictures. We have Andriod and Apple devices. Works perfectly across both. Great to see memories from the past. Easy to share pictures with family as well. Great design and great application. Highly recommend.

All in all it's a good app the only thing missing is when uploading pictures it needs to open options to gallery or something similar that makes it easier finding the pictures you looking for if you have alot of pictures you will end up looking for the pictures you want for a long time

A great place to store photos, videos as well as organize albums and create prints. However, I can't add my SD storage to back up so most of my photos are still stuck on my phone. Although Amazon Photos has more features, Google Drive will back up all photos and videos no matter where they are.

I love the idea that my photos are all in the same place on Amazon. If I download from any device I know where to go track them down. In the past I would have the on disc and thumb drives and then have to take them to be uploaded this is so so much better. Win win for me

I love the automatic backup of all my photos! I wish that Amazon would include video storage as well without having to pay extra on top of my Amazon membership. It only backs up my photos, but I still love it!

Insists on displaying every image file on the device being used (eg everything sent to you on WhatsApp etc) and not just uploaded photos. Cannot seem to resolve this and makes it unusable on my phone to view my uploaded photos as i have to scroll tbrough so many other images.

Just downloaded this app. to get 6k free spins on CoinMaster. It has not worked yet so I decided to rate this site based on that. When I get my points I will change my rating. However, thanks for saving my pics to the cloud, i have lost many pics from broken phones and phone company deleting.

I love this app for all the memories on my TV to share with any visitors. I also like the ease of use, the ability to order pictures. I haven't even learned all that it can do yet. I look forward to discovering more and more.

I think it's good that you get updated when an upload is complete along with options to delete from Amazon Photos and/or device. It really helps to keep on top of storing rubbish images. I like the memory pop ups too.
It works great at backing up my photos. Automatically. I also enjoy my photos of the day. It's like a glimpse in history. I have Prime, so I have unlimited storage. I'm not sure about other plans.

Great with the Pixel 4XL, I use this for automatic backup of my photos at full resolution, something that Google no longer offers for free with the Pixel series phones. Sharing to customers at work is also a breeze with public sharing via the app.

It's nice that you can auto backup, but I wish it would jeep my photos organized how they are on my phone. For example, all my photos go into an album, but then I have to remake the albums in Amazon Photos which is tedious.

Took forever to transfer my thousamds of photos but it finally happened. App does a good job of organizing them and even sends me daily reminders of my photos taken on that day in history. App would merit a perfect score if it stored more than just a minimal number of videos.

The app is good and when you go over the free limit, the additional price for storage is affordable. The one feature I cannot find is when you orders prints, etc., how to remove. It ask do you want reorder but no remove. Thanks
Great app, I love that we can use our photos as a screen saver on the fire stick connected to our TV. Sending the photos to the fire stick is easy and quick. Thank you.
Every picture and video is uploaded automatically when I am on wi-fi. Very intuitive. Enjoy the "Memories" feature. Also, you can order prints and photo gifts from app!

Sweet app if you're a prime member, unlimited storage and great photo organization and people identifier. Crashes and slows down sometimes on older devices, all in all a must have for the firestick screensaver slideshow setup.

App is frustrating to use. Constantly jumps back dozens of photos when scrolling, defaults to showing you photos on your phone even if you don't back them up, downloads the full res version very slowly. Only using the app for quicker viewing than the Amazon Drive app.
I love how it gives me alerts to photos that happened this day a year ago and so on. Fun to look back and remember those memories. It's easy and quite fast to use and organize albums.

Love having the option of backing every photo up to an unlimited folder! I just wish it wouldn't immediately back them up... I've got about a thousand duplicates from when I crop photos or edit them...
Never ever have to worry about losing photos is what I love about Amazon photo. And easy to use. All i had to do was install the app, Amazon does the rest. Perfect.

It's good but you can't see your videos in amazon photos you have to get amazon drive. I wish I could get back all of my videos that I deleted permanently. It's not going to happen even though they are probably archived somewhere.
Great for sending photos to my grandma without having to go to the store. Upload photos to Amazon photos from my phone, then order the prints on the Amazon app!!! So amazing and convenient!
It's easy to use. The editing is also easy to sharpen the photos. You can make albums to highlight individual events. I think it's great would highly recommend. 🏆

I should have an option to only view photos I have uploaded instead of seeing all of theocal photos on my device. Very cumbersome and why are photos unlimited but videos almost $2000 for the top plan? No one in their right mind would pay that.
I love this app. I've lost so many pictures over the years on my cell phones but now I've put all of them on my Amazon app and they are always there. Cherished memories should never be lost 🥰
A real good app. I have broken so many phones and could have lost so many photos and memories. It's just a case of remembering the password and it's like it never happened.

When I make a album to be displayed on Alexa I don't need Alexa to show photos that I deleted off Amazon photo. Delete means just that..Display album means just that..It doesn't mean display and show what you want to show display 😡😤
This is a good picture app. I wish it had ways to catalog your pictures for easy retrieval of photos. I have to scam through all the photos. Got to be a better way...
Very easy to use once I take a picture it goes right to Amazon photos, no need to figure out how to do anything or remember anything, very simple!
Great way to back-up photos and easily order prints. Upload is a little slow at times but it goes in the background so it isn't noticable.
The app is good. I like the security of knowing my pictures automatically upload. I don't like the fact that the facial recognition is off and there's no way to correct it.
I use Amazon Photos as well as Google Photos. I like that I can have two places for photo backups. Amazon has a different look and I appreciate that look.
Fantastic service! Really easy to use, and view photos. Love having the auto save setting on, so I know every photo I take is automatically uploaded over Wifi.
Easy to use and included with Prime. I like how it is automatically when I'm on my WiFi. The yearly flashbacks are an added bonus.
I love that it's unlimited but I have videos of grandkids, things like that. I have to really watch them close because if they get over a certain amount (I think it's 5G) they charge.
It uploads photos automatically. If you decide to delete a photo the app asks whether to delete it on the cloud, or on the device, or both.

Love the options you get with Amazon photos and I love seeing them appear on my tv screen while using Amazon prime which I love dearly for all the superior tv shows, films and other ranges of programmes.
