This is a great way for teachers to quickly remind students and/or parents of items needed or meetings. Our Cheer Coach uses it to remind them of which outfit or items needed for class or events. She also let's us know to check for an email. The Special Ed teacher uses it to remind kids of missing assignments or meetings. Parents get copied on all messages.

I would like to be able to enter contact name as I see fit, Such as "Suzy's Mom Alice" or "JP's Dad Byron", but there is no way to do that. So I have to access a parent name/student name document when I want to message individual people. Also, there is no way to access phone #s --EVEN THO the app is phone # based! I have to look at my phone # list to call a parent. They only let you use a VERY small number of characters. I wld pay for upgraded features but it is a NEVER AGAIN for me.

This app can be a little frustrating at times. If you want to look up a teacher from your children's school you can't. I'm also sure everyone in the whole class can see what your saying to teacher. Very decent app but there's certain limitations if weren't there would make it better. Limitations on characters in announcements is stupid. Great for sending out messages to large groups. I really like see the delivery report immediately. Just needs to be easier to join for those who are not so tech savvy. Can't upload videos of routines or plays from a game, only 9 people per conversation (when you don't want to do an announcement), no calendar available to mark events and set reminders, difficult to navigate communication threads when part of many groups, and there is not an easy way to share documents (you have to take a picture and then upload that picture) you can only upload one picture at a time. I have used much better apps but this is the only one approved through the school district.
Helpful keeping in touch during traditional School Attendance AND Remote Learning. As parents, my husband & I LOVE this app. Makes keeping in tough with teachers so much simpler.

It is nice to use as a basic chat app with your classes, however it is EXTREMELY limited. Announcements, which are how you talk to your whole class, are limited to an extremely small number of characters, voice messages are ridiculously limited to like 15 seconds.
Constantly freezing. Messages do not go through right away. They idle sending for a long period of time. Can not delete conversations.

LOVE this app! It keeps us up-to-date with school assignments, is easy to contact the teachers and simple to use! Definitely an essential app to have if you've got a little one in school. So neat! The only thing I don't like is you cannot use special characters and I believe you can't insert emojis into the messages because I keep getting an error message when I try to. It doesn't notify me consistently, the teacher missed messages from me as well. I know it's not my connection because we have high speed internet at home and data while out. I wish our teachers didn't use this app. It makes it tedious to try to contact them and I cringe everytime I have to open this app.

Its amazing. I dont know what we would have done without this app when all the schools closed and we had to start the digital learning for my 1st grader. I absolutely love this app! I'm a high school student, and I have quite a few honors/ college classes, and I do lots of extra-curriculars. This app is good, the only negative that I find is that it has a character limit and I have to send 10 messages to get my message across to parents. I like this app because I can communicate with my students without giving my number out. However, not all notifications push through. As a teacher I love this app. I just post the code on my board at the beginning of the school year and ask my students to join the class Remind. Easy to use and teacher response time is not long at all. I use Remind for spur-of-the-moment communications with my university students. It works perfect in these kind of situations. My only complaint is that part of Remind could be geared toward college and university students. For example, the icons are clearly geared towards primary and secondary education. Unless I haven't figured out how, which could be the case, I would love it if things like the icons could be personalized or have more options that could be for college-level students.

I have used Remind for several years and it is an awesome way to connect with the families I serve without giving my personal information. I am able to share information in the families primary languauge instantly. During the Corona Virus Pandemic it has become the best tool to update families on where to access food as well as share other pertinent information. I would give it 10 stars if I could.

I love this app. It's like GroupMe specifically for the school community. It never glitches, no ads and I'm always able to contact my child teacher. I would however like to see a feature for phone conferences with teachers added. That would be a great addition to an already wonderful app

Awesome! It always allows me to communicate and stay connected with teachers and the outside world! Have had no problems with the app and have been using it since my son is in kinder who is now in 3rd grade, along with my other littles who are in school. Makes all the information easily managable as everything is sorted out and in one place!

I love this app! I am able to connect with all my students at once. I also coach, and Remind makes it easy to contact my athletes and parents with any updates and information in one simple announcement... my team group includes 103 participants! I cannot say enough good things about this app! I don't know how I survived without it before!

Mostly, it is great! Sometimes, the message ends up going to a wrong person! That is very frustrating and embarrassing! The message goes to the last person I was chatting with, instead of the new person I opened. So, the problem is with individual messages.

There are a lot of times that a notification from the school district shows, but when I try to see the msg in the app all I get is a blank page. This can be a real problem because weather related cancellations & early release msgs are sent thru that account. Also, would be nice if the app could be saved to my sd card rather than the phone memory.

My experience with this version and the apple version were completely different. When i am typing the last few messages is hiding behind the keyboard. Not only that the app doesn't really send me reliable message notifications, yku can expand but if it's longer than the first line it won't show, it also doesn't show if they're read. Messages don't appear when the notification does. It's a very frustrating experience and I would like it if it were fixed.

This app could be a lot better. If you are in multiple different groups/classes, it doesn't allow you to push text notifications on which ones you want. You either get notifications via text for every single group you're in or none at all. Super annoying as I don't want nor need texts to be pushed through for every group I'm in! When you email tech about this or anything else, they're super unhelpful and won't actually address anything you asked about . Truly wish I didn't have to use this app!

Love this app it's the best way to keep in touch with your child's teachers and stay updated with your child's work and homework everyday and if you ever need to speak to one of there teachers right away well with this app there on click away I love it the most because as a busy working mom or three kids one in highschool almost in college and another moving on up to the highschool you know this is that time you need to be on top of everything and anything so they excel.

I LOVE THIS APP!!!! I'm a youth pastor & we use this as our primary communication with our students. The REMIND platform makes all communication accountable & teachers don't have to worry about students sending inappropriate content to our personal cell phones. Also no more group text/SMS responses "blowing up" my phone. I also appreciate the feature that allows me to set the hours that I'm available/unavailable to my students. Boundaries!!!! Yes!!!!😊😊😊

As a teacher, I love the fact that I can message my parents and staff without the need to go directly to the app. Super reliable and easy tobise.! Only downside is that in my classroom announcements, I can only text certain amount of words.
Love this app. It's a great way to communicate with my sons teacher and for both of us to stay informed and updated.

Difficult at times to send group messages to class. Their servers might be overloaded during this distance learning happening across the country. Limitations on number of character makes it difficult occasionally to send important messages to students at once.

To date, this app is awesome. I would not say I'm a "power user", but it's been flawless for me so far. 5 stars and going. It has really helped me stay "in the loop" with my church family and that means a great deal to me on a personal level. Thank y'all so very much.

I love this ap! It is so easy to stay connect with teachers and is a fabulous tool to remind teachers or parents of all class activities even when there is closures. Its a quick reminder for assignments, etc. Easy install. All parents and teachers should use this!

Love this app. Makes communication with my son's teacher very easy. Easy to use and understand. I wish that every teacher would use it!!! UPDATE: Second year using this app. I STILL LOVE IT! Communication is so easy. I'd highly recommend this app to anyone who is part of a large contact group. You are also able to send private messages.

Perfect for teachers to communicate with their students without having to exchange numbers or information. I use it for announcements and reminders for due dates and tests. Can separate and organize the classes however you like, by subject or period, and message multiple classes or certain students from different classes at once.

Another poorly written app!!! Try and reset your password and the text it sends with a confirmation code do not work. As usual for this type of company there is no support just a web page with a form that does not work. If you registered with a phone number the support form will not allow it. Stay away! I will be contacting our school district on this and recommend dropping the usage of this service!!

Great way to communicate parent to teacher. My son uses it, to stay on top of assignments and get help outside of school hours. This was his first year of high school and this app made this transition much easier going into high school. This app is a must!!!

The character limit makes things very difficult when doing announcements. I would definitely pay more to not have a character limit. But that does not seem to be an option as an individual only as a company or entire school.

This is a nice app for being able to privately connect with teachers and other parents without having to give your phone number out to everyone. We've been using it for quite a few years. There's a lot of things I wish the app would do differently like with some of the notifications. However it's definitely good enough for 4 Stars.

Used for school and dance class. It's nice to have messages in the appp so reminders and other communication doesn''t get lost in my email box. If it's a remind message, I know specifically that it is something related to schooling/classes.

Its an incredibly helpful app, however it is incredibly frustrating how slow it is to send messages to teachers. Even with my own personal data, with good connection, it takes really long. I hope they fix this, or the whole purpose of communicating with teachers fast is not happening.

This app is CONSTANTLY glitching. I use it to remind students of assignments, to bring materials and now recently for the work from home due to school closures. Every step of using this app has been a nightmare. Both phone and computers have bugs galore from creating classes to posting announcements for students. I am avidly searching for some other app because this is another headache. I would advise against this app at all costs.

Great classroom tool especially during distance learning...however, I feel it is just limited that during this time of COVID-19 and the challenge that it presents to educators that you are unwilling to expand character counts on Remind as it is a necessary tool in my life right now to keep in touch with a portion of my students!

Love it so far. Only thing I didn't like was I sent a message to a wrong teacher from a totally different school when I first signed up and it wont let me delete that message now so it's just on there all the time. Other than that I love it

Remind has made communication with families so much easier, especially during the stay at home order. I'm so glad I had Remind already set up at the beginning of the school year, it made this difficult transition to remote learning just a little more palatable.

Great tool for classroom and individual communication, and easy to use. Some Spanish speaking parents find it a little difficult as user interface is English, but the directions in multi-languages helps!

Great application for keeping up with students. Wish there was a more seamless way of organizing participants in the list. Has been a great communicative tool used with students through virtual learning.

Lowsy I can't get it to work. When it sends me the code I can't get back to the boxes to put it in and went thru this mess at least 10 times and finally got the pad set and it said it isn't valid for this several times and I keep having the same problem. This process is not anywhere near user friendly. It is totally frustrating. I cant even give it 1 star
Extremely helpful to stay in contact with the teachers and benefits the students.

I wish messages within Announcements could be longer....also would like to be able to send video clips to students. In that regard, it's a little limited unless you post a link. All in all, app is helpful and works well.

I would appreciate if you don't delete my rating again. There is no way to delete past conversations and was told by developers there will never be a way to hide them nor delete them. I belong to 2 classes yet I see at least 10 whenever I go to check the notifications (because they don't work most of the time). This app therefore is completely unnecessary since I am forced to use sms anyway.

I love this app. My sons teacher is able to send us info with out a bunch of notes that you know kids will lose. She also was able to let me know how my son was doing throughout the day when he went back to school with a broken hand. We are able to communicate easily a out any questions we have. I wish all teachers would utilize this app more.

I liked class dojo more. This app is not as user friendly to me. You should be able to enroll/join in your child/children's classes through their names and birthdate instead of codes from every different teacher. It'd just be easier if I could join all his classes at once with his information. Positive note you can reach out to another parent in your child's class.

I love the app. It helps me stay in contact with all of my students and vice versa. Text messaging is much easier to use and get a response from students and parents. Plus, students don't need to share their personal phone number with me to use it.

This app is amazing. It is a great tool to keep in constant communication with my son's teacher. Even in this difficult time I am able to keep in contact with her and she sends educational videos I can use to help my son to retain and further his learning.
Great to communicate with students and parents as a group of directly with one individual, it's great that one may share docs, date and time stamps in order to keep a long as well as the history

It has been a great app to keep in contact with all of my kids teachers, including the gymnastics gym and music conservatory, both school bands and our overall school district. I can use it to text them directly and has come in very handy when planning field trips and class parties!

Not a great app! You cannot delete any old messages. I still recieve updates from when my student was in junior high school. He's a junior in high school. It's frustrating honestly. Not a great app at all but I gave it one star only because this is the app that my student's teachers are using.

As an app, really poor mngmt options, but good for communication w/ lg grp. Non-existent message mgmt as a classroom non-owner. eg: can't set default view; can't display only classes with new/recent/unread messages (any would b nice); can't sort classes in "Messages"; can't remove classes I've left, frm "Messages" (3 kids, my view is soooo long, it's difficult to find class I want or review what I may have missed across class). Well, I couldn't figure out how on my own nor find info in "Help."
So far no issues and it's easy to use and glad her teacher responds quick!

I have 3 boys in different schools. This app helps me keep in touch with all of the teachers in one simple place. Every school should use this. My high schooler also uses the app to get important test dates and study reminders from his teachers. It's a great way to communicate without having to exchange numbers.

My experience with this app is TERRIBLE. I've lost many important messages, I rarely get important push notifications. It constantly says that it can't be connected to the internet right now. This app SUCKS and I've missed out on so much important stuff because of it. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.

It doesn't allow you to correct any mistake from logging on. I don't want to sign up as a teacher, but as a student to join the group I need to be in. There arent any options to update your information nor change any status. Not good! I'll change my rating once this is improved.

I love staying in touch with families, and this is an easy way to send a quick message or reminder. I love that families can message me with questions or comments. The only downside is the limited amount of characters per message.

Constantly doesn't send messages, thinks it's not connected to the internet when the phone is, notifications are awful, clicking on them doesn't take you to the message, tons get lost. Really awful app
Great app for reminders and easy to access. Love it.
Nice to be able to connect with my child's teachers anytime. Especially now with virus stay at homes. But even when my child was in school, it was nice to communicate with her teacher one on one.

I originally loved the app, but now with having to use it a lot, it leaves me frustrated. If you attempt to scroll back to see a previous post, Good Luck! The program loads so slowly, it just keeps repeating the past few days adding an additional post every 5 minutes.

I think remind app is a good app for school however there is one problem that really bothers me as a teacher is that there is a class limit of 500 now this is fine has a regularly class room but if you wanted to do a class with all the seniors and there is more than 500 then you are out of luck.

Love this app! I use it as one of my main forms to communicate with parents. The only reason on why I gave it four not five stars is because I wish there is no limit on announcement messages, without paying for it!

There was no benefit to using the app, compared to communicating with emails. A waste of digital space on my phone and waste of time. I don't recommend it and wouldn't encourage others to use it. Big thumbs down and I don't do many reviews but this required my effort.

We have had a great time with this app.👍 The teachers are able to inform us with updates and assignment notes easily.🥰 It gives me 2 notifications so I can n ot forget or miss i😉t. On is in Remind the other is a text.🙌

Great ap to communicate with parents and students without revealing your phone number. However, the only flaw is that it only allows me to write 150 characters per message, limiting me to one to two sentences.
Very difficult to use! Wanted to join as an instructor to an existing group and was not able to...at least not intuitively. Very frustrating. This app is worthless.
Sending messages take like 5 minutes. It's not my connection as my other messenging apps send fine. I tried it on another phone, same thing. Maybe it's not optimized for Android?
It doesn't send messages consistently, won't let you delete messages that don't go through. I would use another app if I could, but the times it does work it's nice.

Needed to set up a class quickly. Effective tool. Not easy to delete temporary groups, so I have these old, inactive groupings in the list that are annoying. Was impressed with audio and pic functions.

Great app to reach out to students for updates and announcements!! It is great for student recruiting and retention. It was great before but now, since COVID-19, this app has been invaluable. Thanks Remind!!!!

Decent way to communicate with teachers. The GUI is a bit simplified to me, but that's just because I'm a computer tech with years of experience and college degree in computer electronic and have taken courses in database development, so know my way around these things more than others.

We use this for the kids for school it's an awesome way to communicate with the teachers back and forth after hours . I feel great about sending my child to school knowing the teacher can contact me in the middle of the day on a moment's notice without having to leave the classroom if anything urgent pops up.

Not Recording Points - I normally love this app, but I just realized today that all the points I've been giving my students this week for turning in their online assignments haven't been saving. It makes the ding noise and their number of points change, but then after exiting the app the points don't save. Nothing has saved since 4/27. Did something change? Now I have to go back through everything and figure out what points I missed. Not happy.

I want to love this app, but the more I use it the more frustrated I get with it. I'm not sure if this is an android problem, but the app doesn't let you upload photos at all (there isn't even a portfolio option), I can't upload photos from my laptop, & even when I try to upload photos/videos from the mobile site, half the time the screen goes black & the other half it tells me that it won't load files I'm adding. Then all the assignment photos/videos are set to selfie mode - makes no sense.

App works ok at best, biggest complaint so far, is that we cannot see the teacher's comments on our childs work. We're having to then log in online in an internet browser just to see the comments that we should be able to see in this app, so therefore it kind of makes this app redundant. I had hoped the update I just performed would have fixed that issue, but no....

Thank you for creating a way to facilitate kids' learning away from school. However, it would be better if it was possible to select the date whose contents you wish to load, rather than the app automatically loading everything from the beginning of the term. It's slowing down the app, the slides needed for the day take time to open as it's trying to load ALL the slides on the screen, and it's consuming our data unnecessarily.

It is a good tool for teachers to keep in touch with parents and students at the same time. Rates three stars, because my daughter's teacher posts a lot of videos (especially with the covid-19 thing going on) and the video playback is just awful. Sometimes the videos don't load. You can't make it full screen. If you touch the screen to prevent a timeout, then the video stops and immediately restarts, so you have to try and find where you were in the video.

This app use to work, I have a teacher accounts, parent account and my child account. I use to be able to navigate them with no problem. Now I can't get in, I can only navigate the parent account. My child has missed numerous assignments. And I had to use another platform for my teacher aaccount. Very disappointing, I dont know what updates were done but it was working very well before.

This is my 3rd year using the app. The last 48hrs have been a headache. I've tried it all to get this app to work smoothly and restarting my phone is the only way to send and receive a messages. I'll get message notifications but in the app the message wont appear until i restart my phone. I didn't get my child's attendance question on time and we got our first absence. What is going on? Update: the app does not load at all.

I loved this app. Its amazing to be able to stay in touch with my sons teacher especially right now. But after the new update it won't show me the new notifications/messages I have. It just keeps saying "that didn't work" and "unable to retrieve notifications". I need this app in order to help my son finish this school year as this is the only thing his school uses. I can't get into it at all now so I have no idea what my child's teacher messaged me.

I've tried "unplugging" and "plugging" this app back in a dozen times and still can't access my sons account. We're now behind on assesment submissions because there's no way to submit work to his profile. Not happy Jan. Contacted support before the term started, only one reply basically advising just to update and hope for the best. Still waiting on a reply from almost a week ago.

I'm having trouble with the app ...in that older posts disappear... so i get new posts, i see them, but they disappear in about 24 hours and as new posts arrive. Although the posts from 43 days , 123 days and 147 days ago still appear in the app....Yesterday's post s by the school have all disappeared . I don't know what to do about it. I approached the IT dept in the school which directed me to sign out and back in- which i did several times now and it hasn't fixed the problem. Please help.

Frustrating UI. While trying to watch videos, my phone screen will eventually go to sleep (it's possible to make apps keep the phone awake, but dojo doesn't). If I try to slightly scroll up or down to keep the phone awake, the video resets. I also can't find any way to maximize a video to full screen playback. Meanwhile, in the web based platform, there's no way to share photos with teachers. Really seems like an incomplete platform.

I have rated this 3, because it needs some work. It is not user friendly right now. It keeps "signing" me out, but I have an account (parent and child to be exact). Hopefully that can be fixed. I only downloaded this, because one of my daughter's teacher has this app in place to stay in contact after hours during this quarantine.

The app is ok for what it does. Three interface is clean, and it provides an easy way for teachers to interact with parents. Regardless of three advertising, it's not really a kid friendly app. That said, the low rating I'm giving it is because the service has started spamming me with offers for their paid services. Like most parents, I use the app because my child's school uses the app.

This app is helpful in communicating with parents in my class and school. It is easy to create and add rewards for pupils and review work via Portfolio. However, the biggest complication at the moment is that videos can only be uploaded via the app and it takes several attempts to upload even short clips. Also you cannot select all parents to message and then choose which parents to review or make a second list for a send all message.

I like the idea of this app but it does not work functionally for us at all. It will never switch from my parent account to my kids account so that we can upload things to their profiles. It just endlessly loads. I should be able to access my kids profiles and upload things there from my parent account, I shouldn't have to switch to theirs. And on the computer class dojo has so many issues as well.

On my tablet I can't like or comment on my teachers posts and I can't update my account or send and receive messages 😡 I'm trying to pick a different photo but it doesn't work also I can't send a class request to the teachers every single thing it says "oops something went wrong try again" I recommend not to download it but they only possitive reviews at the top

The app was working fine. It's never been an app to get excited about, it is nice to see the teachers thoughts and comments about my child's progress, but I only have the free version, as I don't see why I should pay for an educational communication app. However, the latest update seems to have messed it up, as it now asks me to log in everytime I open it, but automatically logs me out again, rendering it a completely useless app.

Seen my app updated but issues have NOT been fixed! 🤦‍♀️ This is a great app to keep in touch with the teachers but all of a sudden my notifications won't turn off, I open them and they remain there like I haven't opened them. Been like this for like a month now, very annoying! Please fix this issue asap, thanks!

A social media type platform for teachers, parents and students to communicate with each other. The worst feature of this app is that there is no way to edit or delete posts or comments you make, like in Facebook. So once you up upload a photo, or write a post, it cannot be deleted, spelling mistakes and all. It's a very unforgiving platform. Notification badges within the app also cannot be cleared, even when you swipe down on the notification page, or even tap on them individually.

Horrible app. Hardly anything available on the free version. From what i see of the full version its not worth $13 per month. I get 2 notifications for everything one for the app and one for the email it sends. That to me is overkill.. This is an overpriced, unintuitive, poorly designed app that needs a major overhaul before I'd even consider putting anything toward it.

The Android Class Dojo app is terrible especially during COVID19. Our kid's school is posting all homework on Class Dojo and because the Android App is so bad, it has caused very frustrating issues with not being able to see posted assignments. The Web Version and ipad/iPhone versions seem to work fine. Also, the Class Dojo app takes over if you want to take a picture in the app to show completed homework and it takes bad pics the focus & brightness are way off. Please fix!

Not getting any notifications because it signs you out of the app eveytime you click away from it! Also school stories are disappearing faster than I can read them. Things that are only hours or days old are gone yet there is still random stuff there from like 52 days ago!! Not helpful at all when all your children's work is done through dojo during lockdown!! Please can this all be fixed!

Worked fine as a teacher communication tool for about a year, now completely crashes on my Samsung s10e. Won't let me log into my parent account any more. Can't even type in the password. It just freezes. Assignment submission is clunky, and the video feature has never worked.

Has always worked well until now. Recently, since I've updated the app, it keeps logging me out of my accounts and I then miss notifications from parents (I'm a teacher). I don't realize it's logged me out once again until hours after a message has been sent. Needs to be fixed.

Latest update broke the parent interface. One of my daughter's teachers keeps using it to message me, but the parent part is white with the spinning load icon. It has been loading for 10 minutes. We've used this off and on for years, but now it is non-functional.

Hey, remember when the app notified you of messages and you didn't have to use three screens to log in just to see if you have messages, because now you're not even getting emails about messages, just emails about posts? You know how useful it would be right now, while the world is down, to get actual notifications of messages??? Please fix your junk so I stay signed in and get notifications again.

For the last 2 weeks I am able to read messages from the kid's teachers, I have 3 different accounts for 3 different grades, and I can read replies from other parents and see that they liked the messages. I on the other hand, don't even have an option to like, reply or add a comment on any of their accounts. Im not sure how the option changed or how to fix the problem. I had to uninstall AND reinstall!! Its fixed!

I'm having an issue. As soon as I open the app, it says choose - "I am a teacher, parent, student, etc". I choose "I am a parent" and it looks as though it let's me log in but reverts me back to the previous screen. It says I was logged out but there is no option to log in. Please help!

Dojo is a great app, but uploading videos takes forever which is disappointing. A video has been uploading for over 30min! Would also be great to upload pdfs related to the same subject...English to English and Maths to Maths instead of loading on this the news feed separately. Otherwise it's a great app to get feedback from children and see their work while under lockdown.

Updated 04/28/2020: So there are still nags all over the app to try and get me to spend money, and I can't turn any of them off. I'm also apparently being told I only have 3 points left? At this point it's almost worth it to tell my kid's teacher to just not use dojo to communicate with me, because this app is going out of it's way to try and trick me into subscribing every chance it gets.

App not working after update. Can't even log on to my kids portfolio. I could before but not after update. After April 16 that I updated everything works great. Gave 2 stars because iOS has option of saving videos and pics but android does not. Sadly my videos are now gone and only way is to download but like I said iOS is the only one that has the option. 🙄

Was quite impressed with this app. Not the easiest to navigate the info sent from school, but manageable. And never had any real issues. Until today..... it logged me out and will not let me log back in. All I get is 'oops that didn't work'. Not very helpful. Would have been 4 stars otherwise!

I can understand the app would be a little congested because of the quarantine but I have been forever getting a message pop up telling me oops that didn't seem to work! Like what isn't working that message I have been getting for months and I am missing out on messages and notifications! Please fix that bug!

This app consistently logs me out. It used to work fine and I would get notifications, but now I have to log back into the app every few hours. Because of this, I miss messages from my kids' teachers as I do not get a notification of a message. I only see it when I have time to go sign-in to my account.

Updated version is awful! I got a new phone and the new version is harder to navigate, plus I can not longer message the teacher. Being able to directly communicate with the teachers was the most important part of this app, and now I can't. Not happy.

Love this app. But ever since new updates like a month ago. I do not get notifications and everytime I close the app it logs me out when it never used to. So I never know when teachers post or message me until I check in on it manually. Please fix.

This app is not very organized. The organization is needed in this app please fix it can you put the subjects in columns like English one column math the other column and etc. My daughter is has the dojo and her teacher puts her working but it looks so sloppy and messy so you have to go all the way down and all the way up to look different subjects.

I am unable to open up the attachments and view or complete most of the assignments that the Teacher is posting., via Google Classrooms. This is frustrating, as we are not able to submit the completed assignment electronically. The system has to be more user friendly.

It's ok. When I access the app on my phone, I can't like/comment, but can upload work. When I access it on my laptop, the reverse is true so between the two devices, I can do it all, but what a faff! Uninstalling and reinstalling the app hasn't helped.

It's was a bit glitchy and I had to reinstall it back at the begining of April... But is all squared away now... Could have just been an update to their servers when the US started the quarantine... But a heads up or notification would have been great...

This app is quite amazing.Teachers would love this!My class uses this app for online school.The only thing tho is that you can't like hand in anything and make the students do it.You can only say it in the Stories and the students have to do them.And you also have to take a picture and then send it to your teachers. I know it's not that big of a deal but it really bothers me.But I reccomend this for teachers that are looking for a online school app.

In mobile app Notifications are still indicating that they haven't been opened or are still waiting attention even after viewing them. Messages will sometimes repeat or duplicate themself. App has been unistalled and downloaded again. Problem still persistent. This is frustrating because it gives the impression of messages that aren't there or have already been viewed.

Was good until recently. I can't send a message to the teacher, nor will it load correctly. I am trying to switch to parent acctdrom my child and will not let me. I am over this app and all the bugs. Needs to be fixed!!

Doesnt allow me to log back in after logging out. Also if I chose to swap to daughters profile it changes her profile to me.. Also on website you can't upload anything as profile page covers it.. Seems to be a good way of keeping in contact with schools if and when it works but seems to be a bit glitchy in places.

Not kid friendly for my first grader, which means parents have to fully be in charge of navigation, no big deal except the teacher seems like she wants the kids responding when in reality the parent has to do it all. It Eats your internal memory quickly and glitches on the phone and desktop often. Video loading takes forever and if it doesn't go through oh well just try again. Too many learning curves.
The notification tab in the app doesn't work anymore any new comments, posts, ect no longer show up. I've been going back and forth via email for over a week with no resolution or attempts to fix.

The fact that I cannot stay logged in has been bothering me! Before I used to be able to stay logged in. And I would get notifications from my sons teacher. He's missed alot because I always thought I was logged in. PLEASE fix this. I would like to stay logged IN.

I love the app. It's easy to use and has a lot of resources. But I'm unhappy that I can't send videos with the android app. It keeps crashing when I want to upload videos. I can't upload videos and it's frustrating.. Pls what do I do. Thanks

I hate the fact that I downloaded the app for my children's benefit since it's the lockdown when downloading the app I was offered a free subscription trial which was said I needed to unsubscribe before it ended... I sent an email as I read up on the help desk menu that if u are having trouble unsubscribing you should send the email. To my disgust a substantial amount of money has been deducted from my account. This is a great educational app! I do three of my school subjects on this, and it makes learning easy. They have great informational videos, and quizzes to apply what you've learned. I also think the app layout is great as well. The ability to pin courses is really nice. One thing I wish they would have kept was the jump to the "up next for you" lesson/task button that would allow me to get to my course material faster without having to scroll through all of it. Regardless, still a great app!

Best educational app out there and entirely free. With a bunch of explanatory videos, exercices, step by step explanations. Just perfect. The only thing I want to point out is that the videos get stuck sometimes (but that's okay because you can also watch them on Youtube, where they run just fine) and that the answer windows have bugs sometimes, but that's quite rare. It's still a very enjoyable and incredibly helpful app.

This is a mind blowing app. It just has everything I need. It has also cleared my doubts. The videos are very good and the bookmark section is the most useful section. Now I can nearly solve each and every question. And one of the best things I realised was that it teaches just like teachers. One more thing I loved was the selection of subjects. It helps me to focus more. One thing which I did not understand was the nandages. Can you plz tell what is it for and for what is it useful.

It is an amazing app for students of any class. Unlike other apps where you have to subscribe for a full course, this app is completely free and has amazing explaination and visuals as well. The language of the teachers is also easily comprehendible and very clear unlike other apps where the teachers are very confused about what to say. You can find a large amount of study material. It is definitely a must have for all the students and whatever you listen you remember it immediately.

This app has helped me quite a bit. I feel like I can stay on track and have a free tutor outside of my college classes and refresh what I forgot in highschool. The English and grammar lessons are easy to remember and well built, and although the math lectures can be slow, they make it easy to understand the material and focus on harder concepts one at a time. You can work on the go without having to have a computer standing by, or at a PC at home. Perfect for my needs!

I prefer the 2017 version, it was more intuitive an the bugs were negligible. Now I download lesson as before, but the videos doesn't load. And also it's by far slower compared to previous versions (when the logo was a leaf). Hope you fix it :) I love Khan Academy. Edit: I recommend returning to the previous version :( there was no fatal bugs, never, I don't know exactly when, but since the app icon changed, bugs appears suddenly

This app is amazing in so many ways. Not only is it free, it also covers a wide array of topics that encourages you to feel as if you're in an interactive classroom set-up that allows you to learn anywhere. Khan Academy has helped me with my studies so much, and it's truly inspiring to be able to have this lovely tool aid in my learning.

Absolutely stunning experience with pen on Note smartphone. Opened in split screen with notepad and calculator floating in the window. Reason why not full 5 stars - there is no percentage on quizes. I always have to go on the web, check where to go next (where I don't have 100%) and then return to app.
Very nice app to study during lockdown and it gives good explanations of every subjects accompanied with basic questions without any cost ........ But only some contents are in hindi language

I really like the Khan academy website, but the mobile app does have a few flaws. First of all, the home page only displays your last videos, not your favorite courses or progress. Secondly, my profile's energy points are not updated regularly, and my progress is not shown in the user page.

I feel frustrated by the app as it crashes as soon as it starts instead of just running smoothly which has wasted a lot of my time, moreover, I have reinstalled the app a couple of times but the problem still persists to exist and as a prospective user this is quite an awful experience for me. It would be kind enough if you just fix it so that others like me wouldn't have to face the same problem.
The best learning app I have never seen before. I really like this app. It even have videos that teach and I understand the teaching very good Excellent 👌

I really like Khan Academy, it's a LOT better than what our school is providing! I'm so mad at our school, they send out optional work that can't even be turned back in or checked! Khan Academy gives good educational grade work...it's checked for correctness, and most of all it's free! With that in mind, it's the one educational program of a very high caliber that is affordable for me! Thank you Khan Academy, for helping me educate my granddaughter during this time of historical global crisis!

I really love this app, but there're a few problems that I've encountered so far. Firstly, sometimes the audio of a video is very bad, the sound is like from underwater. Secondly, in the section Addition, Subtraction, and estimation (3rd grade) there's a lesson that doesn't work. More precisely, in the lesson Subtract on a number line I'm supposed to tap on a dot to choose a number, but when I tap on it, nothing happens. There are no digits I can tap on, consequently I can't finish the task.

I am a home school parent who LOVES the courses offered at Khan Academy and I can easily incorporate it into my curriculum on Google Classroom. My only issue is that when I try to use my tablet, the app seems to have me as a student , and I am not able to pull up the courses to check work turned in or assign new work. If i cold find a way to do that, this would be a perfect experience.

This is the best app ever. I wanted to brush up on high school math I struggled with and found a wealth of information designed for anyone and any topic. I rarely leave the site in need of further instruction or clarification. This app exceeds all expectations, and has almsot everything the website does

I always use Khanacademy as my online learning platform. Therefore, it'd be nice to see if my points were regularly updated. Even if it's approximate rather than being 100k points off like it is right now. Not bc I'm greedy for points but bc sometimes, I really doubt whether I saw that video about the Harlow monkey experiment. But other than this, I have no other complaints with the app. Khanacademy rocks!!

Khan Academy is overall a good learning app, but sometimes the quizzes are really hard and they don't explain how to do them in the videos because they use easier examples instead. And sometimes I would get the answer correct, but it still told me I was wrong, even when I use the hints and type in the answer again. But it's still almost as good as being in an actual classroom. 3 stars for me!

Due to the prevalent pandemic, I am now relying on this app for most of my classes. The app is good, but my biggest problem is how the assignments are displayed. They are all shown in a list. I have at least one hundred assignments and it is very time consuming trying to find the specific assignment that I want. It would be nice if the assignments were grouped under the specific course they originated from.

After the update app is closing by itself when i try to load home page i.e when home tab at the bottom of the app is selected... Other than this search, bookmark tabs are all working fine... It is a great app kindly resolve the above issue fast.. now i am not able to view the home page to see the contents topic wise.. so iam giving 3 stars once this issue is resolved i will give 5 stars for this app.. very very useful app..

Getting to have 100+ free courses with no in app transitions unlike other apps without time limit is absolutely stunning. I thought itd be having a free trial abt a week or 2 but no its completely free.The only thing needed is a internet connection and ur done. Thank u for sich a wonderful app.😍😘
There is no problem at all but i cannot understand why can't i chane my avatar in the android app. Please do fix it ....
Wonderful app for learning and practice. Basics concepts are explained very well.

I saw a lot of reviews saying that text is cut off, and indeed when I first opened the app it was for me as well. To fix this go into your phone's settings and choose customization. You should at least have 2 options depending on your make of phone. I switched mine to the default font 'roboto' and now all the text shows clearly in the app.

Simply the best app. This app has made such a difference for me especially now during Covid-19 I don't have to worry about failing school. Because this app had everything I need. To go onto the next grade, with school appropriate lessons and it's free. This app is also lag free, download this app today. To help with your online schooling!!💕💕

This app is ok but there are a few flaws. Now my parents go by minutes to see how much I did but it always says I did less than I really did. But overall I really like this app and think it is nice. Also when reading the reviews be careful and look at the dates because some of them are out dated and old. The app has changed a lot and is ok and helps a handful of students considering it is free. It also helps schools that have been shut down by this virus (COVID-19) and doing its good deed helping humanity at a scary time like this.

It's blowing my mind that this app is free and it's by a non profit but the quality is ridiculously good. I don't think people realize how many bad kid games our out there; even ones that drive kids to click ads. This is so well done and I'm so thankful for the time that was put into this app. Thanks for all you do!

I really love Khan academy. But the app stops responding 😑 and it blanks out after working for few days. It has major issues but I love the website. Major fixing is required for this app as it doesn't load. I had to uninstall few times still this goes on. App needs major fixing!! Thank you Sal and team for all this free content.

Very good initative and content is awesome and clear to understand..........Cool feature is that it is free and a non-profit education app....... You guys deserve a ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐(5 star) rating......

It works for me and i like how the tutor gave me several ways to approach the problem given. Its also accessible to everyone in my house, and its free. I'm very grateful to you developer because i can get smarter even if i don't have the money to go to tutoring and such. So thank you very much

The search option should be developed more. The thing we search we donot find it. But after Searching in google. I found it and it took me directly to the app. By why we cannot go searching through the app??

I want to give it 5 stars for the content, idea and mission... however i can not find on the app autoplay option for videos, even worse there is no one click to go to the next video in landscape mode (like there is on youtube), which wastes a lot of energy and time, especielly while exercising (e.g. stationary bike). I will revise my review if there is an autoplay option. I am using android on samsung note phone.

Love the app. The content and UI is really great. Some more features could be added though, like manually selecting video quality while streaming and downloading because sometimes the quality is so low, I cannot understand the audio and video. Also, dark mode for nighttime would really help.

Love the app, I love studying , I'm a nerd like that. I'm having trouble with the videos, the sound is fine but visually it's all wrong, I can't see what's going on. I realise this is probably the fault of my phone, I just wondered if you'd heard of this issue before and would be able to help?

The Content is great and the lessons easy to follow but the app is always slow to load booknarks even when they are downloaded and offline. There also isn't an option in the settings menu to download higher quality boomarks

Very good! But the only problem is that I cant draw on my assignment. I can do that on my computer, but my mouse doesn't draw things well. I only downloaded this app so I can draw my work out! Why can I do it on my computer, but not on my phone?

If you have another gmail account on the device this app is loaded on, it will not let you log into the student account. You have to completely log off with the non school account. What an amazing application! The amount of information and interactive challenges are brilliant. Thank you for this masterpiece and for allowing people to learn!

There must be a option to choose the quality of video, just like in the website. I think by defult it is 720p quality on the app. Although this deserves 5stars(for its contents), it must be optimised for older android device, and must function buttery smooth even if in weak cellular connection.

I like it really helpful. I can easily do it on my phone!🙃 my only problem is the fact they only let you watch a video after you get the problem wrong. Please change this! I want to watch a video then do the problem so I know what to do! Besides that I really recommend getting!!!😄

Fantastic app and content. My kids surprise me with things they learned on their own from watching. If I could request one further feature, it would be casting and/or NVidia Shield TV support, so we can watch the videos on the TV more easily.

Excellent app to learn any different sciences such as math, physics, chemistry, mechanic and computer sciences, it's teach with excellent way with video lessons and exam for every single lesson, i liked it and i recommend it.

This app is incredible it explains things better than my teacher and I am very grateful this is free to use because now all good learning apps you have to pay for. I am very satisfied with this app and I hope it continues to be free.Thank you.

I really like the concept of this app. The fact that theres an pandemic rn, but i like this app You learn, get to study, and review. Its like a online Class but its offline and the concept of this app is better I lovr it Keep up the good work

Absolutely has saved my college career and has had immeasurable benefit in my personal life. Fantastic app with excellent content. I love that I can skip the videos for tasks i know but can watch and rewatch them for concepts I'm struggling with.

Learned a lot from this, but is it possible for the videos to have a more percise written counterpart? With each consept or topic can be linked to a specific point of the videos in case the written text is not that much understood. I believe that would be more efficient for me.
Its the best ever especially that there are no subscriptions and the like. Its the best for all ages.

I really love this app it really does help me when I get stuck on a problem because all I have to do when I get stuck on a problem is get on Khan Academy thank you people who works for the company you people/guys/and girl's are the best of all.

Love this app.. it really is great to be able to learn about all the things that they offer and for it to be free is extra great

I don't normally review apps but this is amazing. It's such a good resource for learning and the fact it's accessable for free means an easy 5 star rating. I will be using this with my kids.
It is a mindblowing app it just have everything I need to practice for my final and all the resources are so usefull and have cleared much of my doubts. It just have everything I need.

Exceptional app. It simplifies rather abstract concepts for people like me to understand. I'm glad I came across it.

This is an awesome app because it was soooooo helpful with work. Now my daughter understands hard math really well.
I'm an adult re-learning middle school math just for fun. I wish they had this when I was younger. I love the visual aspects and clarity.

I love this app! But I suggest a pen so that when I am learning I can work math out on the screen.

Very helpful. After just a couple of days of using this app to study for the math portion of my TABE test I passed the test the first time!!

Terrible app would NOT recommend it makes you completely restart of you get a question wrong and if you get a question wrong you have to completely restart everything quiz and all of your work. You literally have to get everything 100% just to move on

Seriously this is a marvellous app, now with the COVID-19 I strongly recommend it, it will keep you up with the school work and I'm sure you will learn a lot!
